story:
Hi, I'm Yasin. A writer, podcaster and board game designer based in the UK. The aim of Qasaaro is quite simple - to bring the kids, Hooyo and Aabo, Adheer, and anti-social teenager around one table for a joyous, and educational experience. 

How often do we speak to our family? According to recent reports, the average family spends 34 minutes together a day.

In comparison, the average person will spend 116 minutes on social media, with teens spending up to 9 hours a day browsing through the likes of Facebook, Instagram and twitter.  

As important as tradition is, spending time with your family is even more important. In addition to technology playing a major part in our lives, we have first generation parents and their second generation kids who just don't have anything to relate over. They have different interests, speak different languages, and hang around in different spaces. 

This isn't a one step fix for all of these issues - it is merely our way of taking a step in the right direction by giving people something they can relate over. 

 

We're currently aiming for 1000 copies of Qasaaro to begin with. The fundraising will go towards the design, implementation, manufacturing, shipping and distribution of the product, which would work out to roughly £10,000.   

The Qasaaro Contributor 

£20 will get you the status of a Qasaaro contributor! You will receive one copy of the board game before it's official release date 

The Super Contributor 

£35 to become a super contributor! Not only will you receive a copy of the game, you will also receive a limited edition Qasaaro poster as a token of our appreciation

Join the Gang

Become a member of the Qasaaro team - your name will be listed as a credited contributor, you will be added to a mailing list where you can give feedback during the game's design phase and you will also receive a copy before it goes on general sale. 

Success with funding is only the first step Insha allah

 Phase I consists of Qasaaro could be what you consider its birth - the aim will be to fully design and manufacture the game.

this is where things really get interesting. Phase II consists of gathering your feedback, what you liked and didn't like, and designing more board games around Somali culture. We want to release board games centred around history, tradition, clothing, language, and many other categories. 

We then want to establish ourselves in the market as a provider of alternative board games, and hopefully extend the concept even further. 

Just like anything else worth having, Qasaaro isn't without it's risks and challenges. We have sat down to identify the biggest risks and challenges that we might have, so that we can best put measures into place to mitigate them. We've identified:

  • Not achieving funding target - although we're quite optimistic about this, we do understand there is a chance that we fail to hit target. In such case, we will be self funding the remainder of the game as best we can, as well as looking for sponsors in the process. This would unfortunately mean our timeline would take a hit 
  • Shipping and delivery issues - we've looked into possible delays, as around Christmas time the postal service is quite strained. We've identified a good time frame for getting the board games shipped, however if your order coincides with a busy period we do ask that you're patient with us as it's out of our hands. 

If you're as excited about this as I am, please share this as far and wide as possible! word of mouth, Hooyo's whatsapp forwarding messages, and every other platform you can think of!

story:
Systems Malfunction is a one-of-a-kind, stand-alone Science Fiction Tabletop RPG that combines the best of such inspirations as "System Shock", "Dune", and "Aliens". This amazing RPG has already been funded and is in production - but we need your help to take this rulebook and its stunning art from black and white to full color.

"Why is the game called Systems Malfunction?"

Because the best possible future is inherently much less interesting than one where everything goes horribly wrong.

"We're now up here alone; it's terror on the intercom, can someone save us. Systems Malfunction, blast it this damn machine; over and out, captain."
- Coheed & Cambria, "Delirium Trigger"

DOWNLOAD A PDF PREVIEW HERE!

Why Do I Care About This Game?

Maybe you look at this and you think that is generic Science Fiction RPG Crowdfunding Campaign #3116 and why should you give half a frag?  There are so many good answers as to why you should care that it's hard to restrict myself to just 20 or so. But let me try to limit myself to 3, while cheating egregiously.

1. Your character. Hi character!

MAYBE you're one of The Fallen, "a domestic terrorist" with Extra Lives (CLONES!). Sure, they call you a terrorist, and of course, they would. Who's "they?" All the theys. The Colonial Confederated Republics (oppression, authoritarianism, nationalism - a "Confederation" ruled by a dynasty of Presidents for life). Great House Yamamoto, Great House Dresden, Great House Dallas (robber barons, one and all, just with different cultures and different colored war machines). 

Don't agree with them? Fine, they know what to do with you. Are you a manufactured Replicant? Shut up toaster, you're property. Are you a transhuman Celestial? Shut up, you're just a sleeper cell for the GAIA. Are you an alien Xel? You don't even LOOK human. 

It's a shitty world, and no, the arc of history does not either "bend toward justice." Justice comes out of the barrel of your gun. 

And it just might work out that way - you've chosen your cause and you've got the inside track, the knowledge, and the firepower to make it happen. You've already decided to die on your feet, not on your knees. But even if the cops, the goons, and the agents can't stop you, you might tear yourselves apart when the quick decisions have to be made. 

Good luck with that.

Except no, I LIED. You don't have to be one of the Fallen, and in fact, you shouldn't. In fact, you should probably do everything you can to stop them, because they are omnicidial maniacs lead by an immortal posthuman monster, bent on destroying the Galaxy. As a matter of fact, maybe you're one of the "cops and goons" that are trying to SAVE THE GODDAMN WORLD(S). As a Republic Armada Colonial Marine or Jackhammer pilot, you don't care if the Fallen die on their feet or their knees as long as they die until they run out of clones. As an RIA Agent, you don't want them dead at all. You want them in cuffs and in custody... and you want them to flip. Except that just like you've got moles in their organization, you've got moles in yours.

Good luck with that.

As a proud partisan of Great House Dresden, Great House Dallas, or Great House Yamamoto - the inheritors of enormous cultural wealth and worldly power - you obviously don't want the Fallen to burn down the Galaxy around your ears. You also don't want to remain a client state of the Republic forever. The only other problem is the other two great houses.

Good luck with that.

And it's not a matter of which side you join. It's a matter of which sides you join - because very likely, you belong to more than one of the above factions, as a double or triple agent.

Good luck with that!

And then of course there are the Redeemers... (but more on that later.)

2. The Game Itself

It's called The Singularity System, I wrote it, and we published it in 2013. If you back this Indiegogo at any level in the double digit dollars, you absolutely won't need to buy it separately. 

Just one thing to say, from which all the rest flows: this game has no safety net for plot, and no safety net for your character. Except the clones, that is, but those run out too.

The micro version is, of the core rules you roll a number of six sided dice equal to your Skill or Attribute. Every die that comes up a five or higher is a hit, unless something's Easy - then 4s count too - or Hard - then only 6s count. The more dice you have in a Skill or Attribute, the more hits you're likely to roll, the better chance of success in whatever you're trying to do. 

PCs are special. They have Advent. This represents that they've been chosen by destiny to change the galaxy - it is NOT a guarantee that they'll survive doing it, not even with their "extra lives", but it is a chance to be BIG DAMN HEROES and to ACTUALLY CHANGE THE GALAXY, leaving the GM scrambling to figure out how to deal with the various factions' response to the fall out of your PCs destroying a fucking planet--or failing to prevent one from being destroyed.

Advent are not "FATE Points". They are not "Bennies". They are most similar to Edge, from Shadowrun, but they're not exactly that either. 

Advent lets you post-hoc reroll all the dice on a test you failed. It lets you add a bunch of dice to a test before rolling. It lets you maximize your initiative in combat. It lets you declare a test to be 'Easy' before you roll it. It provides a ton of tactical options, but you have a limited amount of it. And the GM gets his own Advent pool too! 

3. Experience the fractured future of post-diaspora humanity as you've never seen it before:

Be a cybernetically augmented human, a human psionic, an assimilated psychic alien, or one of four choirs of posthuman "angels" perfected by the AI that has abandoned them.  

No matter what your Origin, you're not confined to a class-and-level system, but can construct your character freely: for those who don't feel like going into that much depth, there are package deals ready to go for augmentation, gear, or vehicles.  

The Republic struggles to maintain the Status Quo. The Fallen are out there waiting to burn the system down. The three Great Houses want to maintain the status quo, but not as much as they want to come out on top of each other. Any given party could nominally all belong to any one of these factions, while each member SECRETLY belongs to another faction. Your conflicting loyalties WILL cause you to betray each other. These betrayals WILL be made more complicated by the following.  

(Your first) death is not the end: YOU HAVE A FINITE NUMBER OF CLONES, I.E. EXTRA LIVES.  

Characters are made awesome by Edges. Edges are acquired during character creation by having Problems that complicate their lives, by taking on Secret Allegiances (see above), and by selling back Clones (i.e. extra lives).  

These awesome characters then engage in espionage, intrigue, and the most tactical, visceral, personal and/or vehicular combat you've seen in an RPG.

The game doesn't take sides, but you must.

It is the year 556 R.T. (Republic Time) and humanity has long since fled a doomed Earth. A desperate exodus aboard a space station controlled by a mad Artificial Intelligence left humanity – along with the technologically enhanced “Celestials” and the alien Xel – stranded in a cold and empty galaxy. 

Always resilient, humanity has survived, colonizing dozens of inhabitable planets, moons, and asteroids throughout several solar systems. 

And all these worlds fall under the jurisdiction of the Confederated Colonial Republics. 

A state of perpetual cold war exists between the three Great Houses, often erupting into small armed conflicts, large scale industrial espionage, and proxy wars. The Unificationist Church of Undying Faith, a monotheistic religious organization led by the living immortal messiah, Lady Mariah, draws in followers by the thousands each day to Bethlehem Sector.  

Terrorist groups continue to plague the worlds of the C.C.R., including a violent anarchist/secessionist movement seeking to overthrow the Republic: The Fallen. 

The destruction of the G.A.I.A. ended humanity's First Exodus: she was destroyed by one man, Armand Carter - forever enshrined as humanity's greatest hero - and one monster, Sigmus The Fallen, one of her Greater Celestials gone rogue. Armand Carter's descendants lead the Second Exodus to the Galactic Capital of Avalon, and have since ruled the galaxy in an unbroken line of democratically elected "Presidents For Life".

But men and Xel and Celestials and Replicants - the former two changed forever by Her, the latter two created by Her - have whispered in the five centuries since that the GAIA, fragmented into four distinct personalities, lives on. A secret high tech cult, lead by Celestials but including among its ranks men and Replicants and more, known as the Redeemers, bide their time and await Mother's return, to make the Galaxy whole. They know that in new forms they may not recognize that She is coming.

They are right.

The End, Incomplete

Please help me make the greatest science fiction roleplaying game and setting the world has ever seen into one big, beautiful, FULL COLOR book, and you will get that book, and my eternal thanks!

<End Transmission>

story:
Chess Cubed Puzzle

Greetings ! Earthlings, Muggles, and Sports fans.

We bring you the Chess Cubed Puzzle - a fully functional chess set that is also a puzzle - becoming a cube in dozens of different ways. It comes in a nice cubic box, which unfolds into a chessboard, and folds perfectly back into a box. How cool is that! It's all in the ½ cube head design - each non-pawn piece can combine with itself to form a 3x3 L-shape. The rooks and knights can combine with each other, kings and queens are interchangeable, and bishops go both ways.

Warning - you'll want one

You'll want one the moment you see it. Everybody wants one; for themselves, for their nerdy cousins, and their kids, each of them …

So, in order for this to happen we've set our goals loftily. Please contribute now - you can always come back and contribute more. In the meantime please let a dozen of your best friends know about this - send them this link

https://igg.me/at/frivolix

especially those in the next town, out of state, or abroad. You are invited to contribute, share this info, alert local chess clubs, and baffle the rubes in Peoria. We wish to create a ripple around the world - just for the hell of it - and watch the interference patterns.

Timeline

We'll post updates as they occur. Currently, we're estimating that perks will be processed in April, we'll begin taking orders for Chess Cubed Puzzles in May, and sets will ship this August (2017).

Wot use is it?

 

It's terrific for just playing chess - and it's very portable at just 3x3x3 inches.

As a solved puzzle you can impress your friends that there are 11 ways of arranging 6 squares that then form a cube, but only three of them can make the double folding cube box. As an unsolved puzzle - how many ways of (0) arranging the 32 chess pieces into a cube (1) whilst keeping the two colors separate, (2) cubing non-pawns in maximal 3d contagion, & (3) having the most interesting patterns on the cube faces such as a checkerboard pattern. Completely useless, just like the best mathematics or algorithms. (My brother says it'll never catch on – it takes too long to put away.)

Puzzles are relaxing & de-stressing

If, like most cool people, you find yourself involuntarily obsessing about global warming, the economy (do you know why it is called the dismal science) or politics (from herrings of mass redness to electile dysfunction), then relax, revive, and rejuvenate. It is thought (by me) that puzzles are as good as knitting and coloring books at healing, relaxing, and de-stressing.

Just having the Chess Cubed Puzzle gives you that warm fuzzy feeling. It's as satisfying as having an unusual multipurpose tool like Dr who's sonic screwdriver or a time machine. You just feel naked without one.

Chess Cubed Puzzle options

The chess set you'll receive is black and white. When we've sold enough black and white sets to order a new run, well add pink and blue, chartreuse and purple, and clear with luminous swirls in cream and mocha, and other colorful exotic renditions as suggested by feedback from you.

Other options may include wood, as I find carpenters willing to mass produce them, exclusive metal sets in brass and steel, and 3d printed sets in any and every material offered by Shapeways including ABS plastic in numerous colors.

Our prototypes have been made in the following sizes – hella-tichy (sub-micron), small (5/8 inch), medium (¾ inch default size), whopping (1 inch), patio or garden variety (3½ inches), and quite big (about 17.36 lightyears).

Where does all the money go?

Into my whopping pockets … err … - overhead - design mold and tooling costs and fees, & shipping and such. Once the overhead is taken care of, then we can manufacture in vast quantities.


And … who are you?

I'm just some guy with lots of ideas – I'm from this planet - I have dyslexia of the third kind (where you confuse up & down and occasionally float off).

Is it patented?

We're working on it.

What if we fail?

As a card-carrying member of the alife community, we are "doomed to succeed". The following options apply:

$100π ($300) or less => Throw a failure party

$πK ($3,000) => Complete tool design and go to plan B, and upload 3d printer files to Shapeways.

$10πK ($30,000) => make Chess Cubed Puzzle sets and ship!

$0.1πG ($300,000) => Offer free shipping to Martian colonists

Why not kick starter

It's an east coast/west coast thing. & we're on the best coast (along with Elon Musk, Silicon Valley, & flying cars).

When we've sold enough black and white sets to order a new run, well add pink and blue, chartreuse and purple, and clear with luminous swirls in cream and mocha, and other colorful exotic renditions as suggested by feedback from you.Other options may include wood, as I find carpenters willing to mass produce them, exclusive metal sets in brass and steel, and 3d printed sets in any and every material offered by Shapeways including ABS plastic in numerous colors.Our prototypes have been made in the following sizes – hella-tichy (sub-micron), small (5/8 inch), medium (¾ inch default size), whopping (1 inch), patio or garden variety (3½ inches), and quite big (about 17.36 lightyears).Where does all the money go?Into my whopping pockets … err … - overhead - design mold and tooling costs and fees, & shipping and such. Once the overhead is taken care of, then we can manufacture in vast quantities.And … who are you?I'm just some guy with lots of ideas – I'm from this planet - I have dyslexia of the third kind (where you confuse up & down and occasionally float off).Is it patented?We're working on it.What if we fail?As a card-carrying member of the alife community, we are "doomed to succeed". The following options apply:$100π ($300) or less => Throw a failure party$πK ($3,000) => Complete tool design and go to plan B, and upload 3d printer files to Shapeways.$10πK ($30,000) => make Chess Cubed Puzzle sets and ship!$0.1πG ($300,000) => Offer free shipping to Martian colonistsWhy not kick starterIt's an east coast/west coast thing. & we're on the best coast (along with Elon Musk, Silicon Valley, & flying cars).

story:
Space Cats allows you to travel to the edge of the universe, going where no one has ever gone before, exploring new planets, fighting vile creatures, meeting strange and wild galactic animals. Yeah, you read that right! In a faraway future or a distorted past—it doesn’t really matter—animals dominate an entire galaxy, with their eccentric craziness, their cuteness, and their courage. Take your ray-gun weapons, your light swords and fasten your seat belts, for we are about to embark on a journey at warp speed to Animalaxia, where animals rule!

Space Cats is a complete RPG for children, inspired by classic sci-fi movies and shows, like Star Trek, Star Wars, Lost in Space, etc. Space Cats uses a simplified version of Fate Accelerated, published by Evil Hat. Rather than using Fate Dice, Space Cats uses tokens and provides rules of engagement for group work, friendship, and brotherhood.

Space Cats was initially created to raise funds in an attempt to help sick kittens that were abandoned on the streets. With this project, we have been able to donate to NGOs dedicated to animal welfare causes here in Brazil, such as AARG in Gravatá, Pernambuco, and Pata Voluntária in Maceió, Alagoas.

The game is already in English, and I count on the help of some friends to do the initial proofreading. This campaign will help me create the following art-work, edit and pay a professional proofreader to improve the text quality, but I have a particular destination for some of the Money.

 

I love animals, but I live in a small house in a country town. I'm not part of an NGO or anything, but I have rescued some kittens from the streets and this has sent my bills through the roof. I work as a freelance illustrator and I am now writing for RPG games (especially for Fate).

With this project I intend to pay my increasing bills so that my cats can have food, medication, and visit the vet in the next few months, while I work on the artwork for this book.

Also, as extra goals, I will include values for donations to NGOs that care for animals in Brazil.

 

  • About 50 to 60 pages of original content, size A5 (15cm x 21cm or 5.83" x 8.27")

Space Cats has an original and fun scenario so you can create and play uncountable adventures with your group.

  • Complete rules: You don't need any other book to play the game

Space Cats has everything you need to play. The book presents six chapters that explain the scenario, character creation, the gameplay rules, the role of the storyteller, how to create your adventures and finally, a full introductory adventure.

  • A complete adventure so you can start to play quickly with your group

Space Cats contains a ready to play adventure that serves as an example of how the game works. You can play this adventure with any player, regardless of their age.

  • 20 full-color original arts

Space Cats will be published as a full-color PDF.  It will also be available as  print on demand with the following features; both softcover or hardcover, black and white or colorful so everyone can have access to the book. All artwork is original and has been created by the author of the book.

Images merely illustrative

 

My name is Fábio Silva, I'm a Brazilian graphic designer and author. I love animals, music, art, comics, books, and RPG. In 2017 I created the Space Cats project in Portuguese to raise money for kittens that I had rescued from the streets of my small town in the Brazilian countryside.

Today I work as an illustrator and write my ideas for RPG, especially for the Fate system.

Contact me at: twitter, instagram, facebook

You can know some of my work here:

Fate Plus: www.patreon.com/fateplus

Pluma Press DriveThruRPG: www.drivethrurpg.com/browse/pub/12578/Pluma-Press

 

Cezar Capacle is an architect, tabletop game designer, musician and overall an inquisitive nerd. He's really into minimalistic games and joined the Space Cats project after an overload of suggestions that meant  he was finally granted co-authorship of this project. He's in charge of Not A Giraffe Studio, an independent game design effort with titles published in English, Portuguese and French.

More about me at:
www.fb.com/notagiraffestudio

 

I do all of this because I love it and it's fun. But I hope to help some that cross my path.

When I created Space Cats it was just an idea. I was not planning to open a company. I like to write and draw and things got together especially when I was needing  money to save some of my cats. They got sick and the treatment it was expensive.

But things went well. I was able to donate 90% of the profit from the first crowdfunding and since then, 10% of all the projects that I launch. I intend to continue to do so. Let's play some RPG and help those who need it.

There are some costs involved in producing this book. Although Space Cats is an independent book, I need to make sure my cats are okay for the next few months so I can continue to work on my artwork. The Space Cats team is small, so there is a lot of work to be done.

Fábio Silva: I am responsible for the translation, artwork (cover and internal) and editing (layout) of the book.

Cezar Capacle: co-author, game designer, and proofreader.

The book will be produced by Print on Demand, and backers will either receive a PDF or a PDF + Print at Cost Coupon to print the book over DrivethruRPG.

 

All backers get immediate access to the book's draft text (see the first Update of the campaign). By helping us make this project real, you can receive:

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

If you want to know more about Pata Voluntária, click here.

 

 

If you want to know more about Esdras Protetor, click here.

 

Crowdfunding seems more complicated than buying a book at a bookstore or online store, but actually, it is simpler than you imagine. It also allows creators to strive towards their objective of creating a better quality product.

The risk is minimal because the text is already done and you will all have access to it. And since it’s Print On Demand, there are no risks associated to production. Now, it’s only the artwork that is left to be done.

 

In addition to contributing, you can share the URL of this campaign on your social networks, talk about the project with your friends, relatives, animal lovers or at the game store in the city where you live. The more people know about it, the more likely we are to be successful and maybe we can make donations if we reach the extras goals.

 

This project will be fulfilled through DriveThruRPG platform. PDFs will be sent as a coupon to add them freely to each contributors account. Contributors who pledge for print copies will receive a coupon to print their books at cost at DriveThruRPG website. The "at cost" estimate prices are indicated in the descriptions of the pledges above. It's important to notice that contributors will also have to pay for shipping.

story:
In a very short summary, King of Thought is a game about telling the right vocabulary from a hint on cards. That's it. 

For children, King of thought can help them improve their language development and build up the linkage between vocabularies.  For adults, besides having fun and improving thinking and imagination.

King of Thought can be used as a practice tool for people who have language and thinking problems such as having difficulty of finding words, or people who have brain injury affecting on language capacity.

This game is for 2+ persons, age 5 to 99+, 5 - 10 mins to play each round.  

 

We provide seven different options to play the game in the instruction manual but you can create other options and play it in your own fun way. Below video clip shows you how to play King of Thought in eight different options. 

(Yes, eight! we just add the eighth option to play not long ago).  

The box contains 52 different word cards in various categories and instruction paper with two languages ( Thai and English )

 

We are a team of engineer and speech-language pathologist from Thailand. We want to create a media that help children learn new skills that make them live a proper life for each person in the future.

We designed the learning media in the form of games and toys so children can learn the skills effectively along with the fun. One of the skills that we give priority to is communication skill which is an important weapon to keep children growing up and living in society happily.

We are so excited seeing kids laugh and learn while testing our game. We believe that every kid will love our game too. So, we would like to share King of Thought with kids all over the world as much as possible in every house school or orphanage.

We create this campaign on Indiegogo with a hope that you and other people around the world can get and share this game easily. We are trying to hit a funding goal for quality manufacturing in case that we need to produce more game copies.    

 

 

About the Perk

This is a Flexible campaign on Indiegogo. So everyone who contributes will surely get their promised Perk and kids will surely get their gift too even though this campaign does not reach the goal. The game will be sent within two months of the end of the campaign. The printer is ready. We just need your help to make it happen!

 

[Pawn] Perk, you will not get a game or some part of the game but for every 10 Pawn Perks claimed.  We will donate one box of King of Thought game with the special card  (see example below) in an anonymous style. With this perk, you can help kids in Thailand to have a new good quality language-educational toy.

 

[Super Pawn] Perk, you donate 1 box of King of Thought game that has the special card with your name and your country (if you want, please add detail in Other Contribution Appearance in this pattern [your name from your place]) to a school or an orphanage in Thailand. 

 

[Knight] Perk, you get 1 box of King of Thought game.

 

[Bishop] Perk, you get 1 box of King of Thought game for your own and we will donate 1 box of King of Thought game to a school or an orphanage in Thailand. Both boxes have the special card with your name and your country (if you want, please add detail in Other Contribution Appearance in this pattern [your name from your place]).

 

[Rook] Perk, You get 2 boxes of King of Thought game.

 

[Queen] Perk, you get 2 boxes of King of Thought game for your own and we will donate 2 boxes of King of Thought game to a school or an orphanage in Thailand (1 box for each place ). All four boxes have the special card with your name and your country (if you want, please add detail in Other Contribution Appearance in this pattern [your name from your place]).

 

[King] Perk, you get 10 boxes of King of Thought game for your own.

 

[Emperor] Perk, you get 30 boxes of King of Thought game for your own.

 

For every perk claimed, we will also show your name and country on our website as a credit.

 

Example of the special card in a donated version. LEFT is the special card in a general style. MIDDLE is the special card in an anonymous style. It is for Pawn Perk or in case contributor does not want to show his/her name or we do not have contributor information. RIGHT is an example of Mr.Somchia Saichom from Thailand special card.    

 

Example of school in Thailand where we will donate.

We would like to share King of Thought with as many kids as we can. Please help us get the word out about this campaign.

Support us on this Indiegogo and get extra copies. 

Follow us on facebook or www.craftercave.com

Share this campaign with friends or anyone else you think might like.

Please email us with any questions cc_contact@craftercave.com

story:
Introducing the Teacher-Gamer Handbook

The Teacher-Gamer Handbook is a resource for educators to lead Role Playing Games (such as Dungeons and Dragons) in the classroom, in homeschool and online. It contains a full semester of robust lesson plans and the pedagogical infrastructure to last years that teach 36 life-skills to players with pre-created adventure suggestions, narrative arcs and prompts.

The main premise is: you can’t learn something unless you notice it. The purpose of the RPG Skillset is to generate multitudes of continuous opportunities to notice things within at least 36 major domains of self-development. The possibilities are endless.

My name is Zach.

Here is a brief history of how the Teacher-Gamer Handbook came to be:

  • 1982 played Dungeons and Dragons for the first time - my character died in the first 10 minutes, it was so fascinating and unlike anything I had ever experienced... I was hooked! I have been playing RPGs for thousands of hours and almost 4 decades. Some would call me an O.G. (Original Gamer).

  • 1990’s adventuring in life, school, work, music production, becoming Canadian and starting a family steered me in new directions. 
  • 2002+ raising two boys with my wife Sophie, I was teaching and studying by day, hangin' with the family and playing RPGs when I could on weekends.
  • 2006 enrolled in an MA program in Education to better understand the “how” of teaching and learning.
  • 2010 finished my Masters in Education focused on authentic learning and life-skills curriculum development.
  • 2012 realized that role-playing games (RPGs) in Schools was an untapped resource. I began working on the Teacher-Gamer as an extension of my Distinct Self well-being program. 
  • 2014-2016 brought RPGs in Schools curriculum into the classroom at Green School Bali
  • 2015-present Wild Mind Training workshops blending RPGs in Schools with mindfulness ramps into wilderness trips with Wildlife Conservation Society.

  • 2020 Teacher-Gamer Revolution! - happening offscreen on tabletops everywhere! Let’s get radical about balancing EdTech and AI coming into schools by bringing our teacher’s hobbies into life-skills classes that enrich youth with socio-emotional and literary skills while maintaining the distinctly human teacher-student relationships that cannot be replaced by computers.

What We Need & What You Get

I started this campaign for three main reasons:

  1. It is time to put the Teacher-Gamer Revolution on the timeline, now, globally. It is so important to take what you have inside you and put it into the civic sphere. I urge all educators to make the world a better place by combining their passions with their pedagogical skills and make them available to the public.
  2. Self-publishing the Teacher-Gamer Handbook (TGHB) will launch this new step of my career with all the support of my colleagues, friends and anyone who likes the idea that robust off-screen game-system-learning (engaging face-to-face life-skills development) is a viable initiative to balance the influx of technology into schools. 
  3. The TGHB is my calling card, a beacon, an organized methodology that I can put into the hands of people I meet at conferences, conventions and school boards wherever I go.  

I took a calculated risk and have already borrowed the money to: 

  • finish the book 
  • have it typeset in the style of a role-playing game handbook 
  • make videos to explain how teaching RPGs in schools works
  • build a website with a private interactive forum. 

I also plan to use the momentum and connections I make with so many people around the world to take the curriculum to the next level.

My ultimate goal is to hit at least $60,000 so that I can spread the methodology online and hit the road when the world opens up again to safe conferences and in-person education.

Here's the Teacher-Gamer Revolution plan for the funds raised on IndieGoGo: 

  • Hard Copy prints of the book for everyone!
  • Hit our stretch goals and produce additional resources for Teacher-Gamers to accompany the Handbook.
    • Newsletters with practical activities
    • Instructional videos
    • Teacher-gamer website features celebrating educator success around the world  
    • Weekly Webinars for online outreach and support 
    • Teacher training workshop deployment to implement new full-scale RPGs in the classroom programs.
    • Head to Conferences and speaking events to grow the community and gain traction.
    • Continued customization of RPGs in Schools curriculum in community centers, school boards, correctional facilities and homeschools far and wide.
  • Finish the next three handbooks full of additional lesson plans, classroom activities and teaching strategies.

Benefits for the Educators

  • help schools transition into more life-skills programs that prepare youth for adulthood
  • build progressive opportunities for face-to-face off-screen courses in schools
  • maintain positive attitudes about the future of schools
  • work to make life-skills more prominent in schools for the subject teacher who is getting pushed out by tech 
  • Strengthen relationships with students through gameplay

The last thing a teacher wants to feel like is “obsolete”. There is some hustle each teacher must do to remain fresh, viable and relevant in their community, but if teachers are trying to battle incoming tech or are being asked to do more tech type roles, they will have to find ways to shift the consciousness of the institutes they work in or be moved around or pushed out. 

This is a call to teachers to take their passions- or at least an opportunity to pick up this methodology to teach games- and deploy life-skills into their learning environment.  

Stretch Goals

$25,000 - First Stretch Goal 

$35,000 - Second Stretch Goal (TBA)

$45,000 - Third Stretch Goal (TBA)

$55,000 - Fourth Stretch Goal (TBA)

$65,000 - Fifth Stretch Goal (TBA) <--- This is our ideal goal to hit and we have LOTS of goodies when we hit this level! This is the amount needed to really get this campaign rolling!

$80,000 - Sixth Stretch Goal (TBA)

The Impact

By contributing to the Teacher-Gamer Handbook, you are doing more than just buying a book or helping it get printed, you help:

  • establish the printing, distribution and sale of the book
  • the off-screen Teacher-Gamer Revolution gain traction and take flight
  • bring viability to the TEACHER-GAMER profession 
  • subject teachers to collaborate with their peers to build robust game systems into learning opportunities
  • wilderness survival teachers establish classroom simulations of safety and role-playing through authentic learning narratives
  • bring a whole new piece of curriculum to holistic education
  • make in-roads for RPGs in Schools to become a discipline unto itself that helps youth process the multiverse of systems, franchises, worlds and cultures that are coming at them at high-speed through the internet and media.

The Story

The Teacher-Gamer Handbook has been over 8 years in the making! 

The RPGs in Schools program was originally developed as an extension to a Personal and Social Development Local Programme course cycle in Canadian public school – a well-being curriculum program of life-skills electives at The English Montreal School Board in Quebec. Since then, the RPGs in Schools program has been adapted into the Wild Mind Training resiliency program for youth, 10 years old and older in schools and camps in Indonesia and the UK where I have been working over the last 6 years.

Starting in 2014, Green School Bali was an early adopter of the RPGs in Schools Program where I ran Introduction to Dungeons and Dragons as an English literacy course (creative writing) in high school and as an English literacy course (communication thematic) in middle school.

Every child surveyed in Green School reported that they liked the RPGs class and over half of them considered it their favorite class!

As I went along, I started realizing that all the life skills (21 basic and 15 advanced) that I was teaching could be dialed in to meet various curriculum goals and that if I put learners on a narrative cycle such as the Hero’s Journey, they would begin to recognize so many more thematics, symbols, motifs and literary forms as they relate to so many of the stories, books, films, TV series, mangas and other sagas that they follow.

Re-branded as Wild Mind Training, over the last 4 years. I have been experimenting with more mindfulness, wilderness conservation and improvisational theatre elements. As a home school aggregate on the weekdays and a weekend workshop for day school children, I have ironed out the kinks of three different levels of Introduction to Life-Skills through 3rd edition Dungeons and Dragons courses. 

As with any pedagogy delivery system, the context and content (ie. role-playing game being used) can be adjusted into the area of study or subject. What matters most is that the learning system is authentically motivating and delivers opportunity after opportunity to acquire literacy, socio-emotional and life skills.   

When teacher-gamers, homeschool parents, mindfulness trainers, socio-emotional counselors and wilderness survival instructors get a hold of this book they will find it easy to use and with plenty of insight around teaching and practical techniques of classroom management. 

Not only is the book $10 cheaper through the campaign, access to the book’s forum is half price and if we meet our initial stretch goal will be boosted an additional 6 months.

 

Risks & Challenges

Getting the book printed is only the first step. I’m taking a huge financial risk of my own even if the project does not get funded. In order for it to succeed, I have to get out there and hit the road to show people how the methodology really improves the learning experience for the students and teachers.

I’ve got to hit trade shows, book speaking events, and still create workshops to help teacher-gamers really kickstart this program. 

Let’s keep it real: this is an alternative learning method that requires adaptation. There may be backlash as conventional school systems are entrenched in “standardization”. I have to keep pushing this body of work as a complement to curricula by expanding the resources for teachers. 

Gamification has brought games into education, but have also made the teachers gatekeepers to the computer. The negative result is that kids will be on their best behavior just to be allowed to get on screen. We need to bring value back to the teacher-student relationship, also making the teacher-gamer an exciting part of education - off-screen!

The Teacher-Gamer Revolution is on!

And I am ready. The time is NOW. If not us, then who?

As a network of early adopters it is YOU that will help me carry this forward and YOU that by belief in this project, will help extend the reach of the Teacher-Gamer Revolution. 

We have some goals to hit, and time is of the essence. There has been so much learned by going for it and I am so excited to turn this guerilla-style launch of getting the first Handbook off the ground and into teachers hands everywhere.

  • We will try to get questions answered as soon as possible, just know we are also trying to get the book to print BEFORE the end of the campaign and have a lot going on.
  • That being said, we are GOING TO PRINT and get your copies to you as SOON as possible. Depending on your location this could take some time as we are a GLOBAL movement with community around the world, but can only afford to print in ONE location at this time. 
  • Print and delivery is scheduled for June 15th and getting copies in your hands by July 1st. But again, your patience is much appreciated and we will update you every step of the way!

Thanks to you for all your patience and getting involved.

Zachary Reznichek

Life. Skills. Adventure! 

Please copy the links and share them in your community and with teachers everywhere.
story_txt:
Introducing the Teacher-Gamer Handbook

The Teacher-Gamer Handbook is a resource for educators to lead Role Playing Games (such as Dungeons and Dragons) in the classroom, in homeschool and online. It contains a full semester of robust lesson plans and the pedagogical infrastructure to last years that teach 36 life-skills to players with pre-created adventure suggestions, narrative arcs and prompts.

The main premise is: you can’t learn something unless you notice it. The purpose of the RPG Skillset is to generate multitudes of continuous opportunities to notice things within at least 36 major domains of self-development. The possibilities are endless.
My name is Zach.
Here is a brief history of how the Teacher-Gamer Handbook came to be:

1982 played Dungeons and Dragons for the first time - my character died in the first 10 minutes, it was so fascinating and unlike anything I had ever experienced... I was hooked! I have been playing RPGs for thousands of hours and almost 4 decades. Some would call me an O.G. (Original Gamer).
1990’s adventuring in life, school, work, music production, becoming Canadian and starting a family steered me in new directions. 
2002+ raising two boys with my wife Sophie, I was teaching and studying by day, hangin' with the family and playing RPGs when I could on weekends.
2006 enrolled in an MA program in Education to better understand the “how” of teaching and learning.
2010 finished my Masters in Education focused on authentic learning and life-skills curriculum development.
2012 realized that role-playing games (RPGs) in Schools was an untapped resource. I began working on the Teacher-Gamer as an extension of my Distinct Self well-being program. 
2014-2016 brought RPGs in Schools curriculum into the classroom at Green School Bali
2015-present Wild Mind Training workshops blending RPGs in Schools with mindfulness ramps into wilderness trips with Wildlife Conservation Society.


2020 Teacher-Gamer Revolution! - happening offscreen on tabletops everywhere! Let’s get radical about balancing EdTech and AI coming into schools by bringing our teacher’s hobbies into life-skills classes that enrich youth with socio-emotional and literary skills while maintaining the distinctly human teacher-student relationships that cannot be replaced by computers.

What We Need & What You Get

I started this campaign for three main reasons:

It is time to put the Teacher-Gamer Revolution on the timeline, now, globally. It is so important to take what you have inside you and put it into the civic sphere. I urge all educators to make the world a better place by combining their passions with their pedagogical skills and make them available to the public.
Self-publishing the Teacher-Gamer Handbook (TGHB) will launch this new step of my career with all the support of my colleagues, friends and anyone who likes the idea that robust off-screen game-system-learning (engaging face-to-face life-skills development) is a viable initiative to balance the influx of technology into schools. 
The TGHB is my calling card, a beacon, an organized methodology that I can put into the hands of people I meet at conferences, conventions and school boards wherever I go.  

I took a calculated risk and have already borrowed the money to: 

finish the book 
have it typeset in the style of a role-playing game handbook 
make videos to explain how teaching RPGs in schools works
build a website with a private interactive forum. 

I also plan to use the momentum and connections I make with so many people around the world to take the curriculum to the next level.

My ultimate goal is to hit at least $60,000 so that I can spread the methodology online and hit the road when the world opens up again to safe conferences and in-person education.
Here's the Teacher-Gamer Revolution plan for the funds raised on IndieGoGo: 


Hard Copy prints of the book for everyone!
Hit our stretch goals and produce additional resources for Teacher-Gamers to accompany the Handbook.

Newsletters with practical activities
Instructional videos
Teacher-gamer website features celebrating educator success around the world  
Weekly Webinars for online outreach and support 
Teacher training workshop deployment to implement new full-scale RPGs in the classroom programs.
Head to Conferences and speaking events to grow the community and gain traction.
Continued customization of RPGs in Schools curriculum in community centers, school boards, correctional facilities and homeschools far and wide.


Finish the next three handbooks full of additional lesson plans, classroom activities and teaching strategies.


Benefits for the Educators

help schools transition into more life-skills programs that prepare youth for adulthood
build progressive opportunities for face-to-face off-screen courses in schools
maintain positive attitudes about the future of schools
work to make life-skills more prominent in schools for the subject teacher who is getting pushed out by tech 
Strengthen relationships with students through gameplay

The last thing a teacher wants to feel like is “obsolete”. There is some hustle each teacher must do to remain fresh, viable and relevant in their community, but if teachers are trying to battle incoming tech or are being asked to do more tech type roles, they will have to find ways to shift the consciousness of the institutes they work in or be moved around or pushed out. 
This is a call to teachers to take their passions- or at least an opportunity to pick up this methodology to teach games- and deploy life-skills into their learning environment.  

Stretch Goals

$25,000 - First Stretch Goal 
$35,000 - Second Stretch Goal (TBA)
$45,000 - Third Stretch Goal (TBA)
$55,000 - Fourth Stretch Goal (TBA)
$65,000 - Fifth Stretch Goal (TBA) <--- This is our ideal goal to hit and we have LOTS of goodies when we hit this level! This is the amount needed to really get this campaign rolling!
$80,000 - Sixth Stretch Goal (TBA)
The Impact

By contributing to the Teacher-Gamer Handbook, you are doing more than just buying a book or helping it get printed, you help:

establish the printing, distribution and sale of the book
the off-screen Teacher-Gamer Revolution gain traction and take flight
bring viability to the TEACHER-GAMER profession 
subject teachers to collaborate with their peers to build robust game systems into learning opportunities
wilderness survival teachers establish classroom simulations of safety and role-playing through authentic learning narratives
bring a whole new piece of curriculum to holistic education
make in-roads for RPGs in Schools to become a discipline unto itself that helps youth process the multiverse of systems, franchises, worlds and cultures that are coming at them at high-speed through the internet and media.

The Story

The Teacher-Gamer Handbook has been over 8 years in the making! 
The RPGs in Schools program was originally developed as an extension to a Personal and Social Development Local Programme course cycle in Canadian public school – a well-being curriculum program of life-skills electives at The English Montreal School Board in Quebec. Since then, the RPGs in Schools program has been adapted into the Wild Mind Training resiliency program for youth, 10 years old and older in schools and camps in Indonesia and the UK where I have been working over the last 6 years.

Starting in 2014, Green School Bali was an early adopter of the RPGs in Schools Program where I ran Introduction to Dungeons and Dragons as an English literacy course (creative writing) in high school and as an English literacy course (communication thematic) in middle school.
Every child surveyed in Green School reported that they liked the RPGs class and over half of them considered it their favorite class!

As with any pedagogy delivery system, the context and content (ie. role-playing game being used) can be adjusted into the area of study or subject. What matters most is that the learning system is authentically motivating and delivers opportunity after opportunity to acquire literacy, socio-emotional and life skills.   

When teacher-gamers, homeschool parents, mindfulness trainers, socio-emotional counselors and wilderness survival instructors get a hold of this book they will find it easy to use and with plenty of insight around teaching and practical techniques of classroom management. 
Not only is the book $10 cheaper through the campaign, access to the book’s forum is half price and if we meet our initial stretch goal will be boosted an additional 6 months. Risks & Challenges


Getting the book printed is only the first step. I’m taking a huge financial risk of my own even if the project does not get funded. In order for it to succeed, I have to get out there and hit the road to show people how the methodology really improves the learning experience for the students and teachers.
I’ve got to hit trade shows, book speaking events, and still create workshops to help teacher-gamers really kickstart this program. 
Let’s keep it real: this is an alternative learning method that requires adaptation. There may be backlash as conventional school systems are entrenched in “standardization”. I have to keep pushing this body of work as a complement to curricula by expanding the resources for teachers. 
Gamification has brought games into education, but have also made the teachers gatekeepers to the computer. The negative result is that kids will be on their best behavior just to be allowed to get on screen. We need to bring value back to the teacher-student relationship, also making the teacher-gamer an exciting part of education - off-screen!

The Teacher-Gamer Revolution is on!
And I am ready. The time is NOW. If not us, then who?
As a network of early adopters it is YOU that will help me carry this forward and YOU that by belief in this project, will help extend the reach of the Teacher-Gamer Revolution. 
We have some goals to hit, and time is of the essence. There has been so much learned by going for it and I am so excited to turn this guerilla-style launch of getting the first Handbook off the ground and into teachers hands everywhere.

We will try to get questions answered as soon as possible, just know we are also trying to get the book to print BEFORE the end of the campaign and have a lot going on.
That being said, we are GOING TO PRINT and get your copies to you as SOON as possible. Depending on your location this could take some time as we are a GLOBAL movement with community around the world, but can only afford to print in ONE location at this time. 
Print and delivery is scheduled for June 15th and getting copies in your hands by July 1st. But again, your patience is much appreciated and we will update you every step of the way!

Thanks to you for all your patience and getting involved.

Zachary Reznichek
Life. Skills. Adventure!

story:
When your 5 elements are balanced, you will experience flow, health and happiness.
 

5 elements card game

The game will be produced, yay! I am absolutely thrilled, as we have reached our goal of €5.000,-. Partly via Indiegogo (66%) and via Paypal & Tikkie (44%). Besides pre-selling 150 card games, it was amazing to receive so much positive reactions. Good vibes and willingness, thank you so much! 

It is still possible to order the game via Paypal

Important for receiving the game is to click HERE to email me your name and address.

We will deliver it to your doorstep in October.

Meet us on Facebook

Share your thoughts on our Facebook page. And please like the page while surfing there :-). Let's all keep on sharing and caring on our socials. 
 

Have fun and educate yourself while enjoying beautiful art!

We created a card game to learn about the five elements, in a fun and playful way. It is my big wish to implement the five elements more in our modern Western lifestyle and language. The 60 beautiful cards are all hand-painted by Clara Scheibe. It is truly art from the heart.

Wood – spring
Fire – summer 
Earth – late summer 
Metal – autumn
​Water – winter

 

Hello

I am Karlijn Eickmans (35), an Amsterdam based entrepreneur in events, event education and above all a passionate shiatsu practitioner. 5 years ago I set foot in a shiatsu practice and I had never imagined I would find my passion there. I am finishing my 4 year Shiatsu education and this game is my passion and graduation project.

Living in sync with the seasons, the 5 elements, is one of the core principles in Taoism, and Zen Shiatsu. The elements are everywhere, in nature, and also represented in your own body-mind.

Being more balanced with my 5 elements, made me very excited to 'spread the word' about how this changed my life. But hey, nobody likes a smart ass talking for hours about Taoism and stuff.  So this card game will help you get more familiar with the elements. 

 

A game for you

  • Family time: bring the five elements into your home and play it with your loved ones. Learn about the five tastes, emotions, colors and seasons. The game is suitable for children 7+, and all other happy faces. 
     
  • In your shiatsu or TCM* practice: this card deck is a low key way to make conversation about certain subjects, like food and emotions.
    *TCM: Traditional Chinese Medicine.
     
  • Fun learning:  great teaching tool for shiatsu and TCM* schools.  In my experience this is much more fun than reading a book. It is also very useful for schools and practitioners of martial arts, tai chi, qi gong, etc.

 

Recommendations

"This is the kind of project we need in the Shiatsu world. I think you may a have a winner on your hands."  
Chris McAlister (teacher in TCM and President of the ESF and EFCA) 

"In all my teaching I try to make the learning as full of games as possible because it’s the best way to learn, so I think your project is great and I will tell my colleagues about it.
For anyone teaching students about the Five Elements, your cards would be a very useful teaching tool.”  
Nick Pole, teacher at Shiatsu College London, author of Words that Touch.

"Concerning our school: We definitely would buy and use your cards. Maybe you could think of a German version as well." 
Mike Mandl, International Academy for Hara Shiatsu.

 

Quintet game

In Dutch and German it is named 'kwartet', 'quartett' or 'Ablegspiel', in English it also goes by 'Quartets', 'Go Fish' and 'Happy families'. 

How to play?
Normally you would collect 4 cards belonging to the same category. But in this game, it is about collecting 5 cards per category; a quintet. Each element has its own card within the quintet. 

We created 12 quintets / categories: seasons, yin and yang meridians, acupressure points, emotions, sound in the voice, spirits, guardians of the cardinal directions, virtues, time of day (organ clock), energy & movement and taste & food.

Fun for newbies and experts 
- newbie = play by color (frame of the card)
- intermediate = 5 elements by name and color (frame of the card)
- expert = knowing each item (word in the right column)
You can even mix the different levels per player within one game.

It is a game of memorizing, guessing, looking each other in the eyes and having a good time with family and friends. Collect most categories and you are the winner!
 

 

Pre-order the game

The card game includes:

  • 60 playing cards: 12 categories of 5 cards
  • good quality materials and premium printing
  • a luxurious box to keep these art pieces safe
  • produced with a sustainable mindset

​
Be part of this creation:

  • Buy the card game, € 5,- discount when pre-order before July 1st.
  • Donate as you feel: pink button on this page, or use PayPal or Tikkie. 
    Donate more than € 15,- and you will receive a lovely surprise.
  • Share this page on social media and Whatsapp.
  • Massage-loving backers, can book a shiatsu treatment.
  • Art-lovers can choose personalised art by Clara.
     

Funding
Next to own investments, at least another € 5.000,- is needed for production and distribution for the first batch of 500 games. 

When the funding will exceed the €5.000,-, it will be used for building the website and optimal sustainable production of the cards. The website provides a webshop, explanations of the cards, Do It Yourself exercises and tips to balance your five elements. Lovely!
 

Art from the Heart

Clari (Clara Scheibe) and I met in the Himalaya's last year. She was drawing and humming in the flower garden, while my inspiration for this card game winded up again. We connected instantly.

Clara Scheibe does Art since her childhood. She is an artist that explores different forms of expression, mainly illustrations, liberal arts and tattooing. She’s inspired by her travels that bring her around the globe, connecting to different cultures and understanding human nature through insight, deep listening and free impulses.
Her art plays in a refined, flowing, feminine and fantastic way.
You can find her art here: www.instagram.com/clari.ba and www.clariba.bigcartel.com.

 

The impact of playing with the 5 elements

When you balance your elements, you will experience a natural flow in your actions, social and working life; health and happiness. It helps you to do more self-care and how to contribute to your environment, community and family. Life. 

 

Risks & Challenges

  • The designs are almost finished. What you see in the pictures are home-printed test cards.
  • Printing and shipping will be secured by reliable companies.
  • Production will start a month after we've been funded.
  • We are confident in our ability to deliver a great product, on time. However, unforeseen events can occur in any business. In such a case, we are committed to work day and night in order to resolve any issue, and we will be 100% transparent. 
     

Questions?

Check out the Frequently Asked Questions for your questions regarding the game, crowdfund and practicalities. ​Any other questions; feel free to contact me.

 

My tao

This is my tao, my path. Getting people familiar with the five elements (wu xing) by this beautiful designed card game. 

In the spring, projects blossom, in summer time we are all exuberantly outward-looking. We harvest our fruit in late summer and when the leaves fall from the trees, we see what we still need and what remains. What is important to you and which seed do you cherish in the wintertime? The seed of essence. The seed that will be watered again in spring, and blossoms.

I am proud to present this seed to you now,
Thank you for helping me water it,
To blossom and flourish.

...

story:
The Golden Age of Hollywood is a side project from the maker of The Beatles Tarot and The Shakespeare Tarot. With years of research behind it, The GAofHT  is a distillation of celebrity and film from the classic era of the Hollywood studio system. The images used are by and large culled from movie posters from the introduction of the talkies in 1929 to the first HUAC committee and the Anti-Trust verdict brought against the major studios in 1949.

 The Minors are divided between the major studios of the day - as there were 8, each suit is comprised of 2. The Aces indicate both studios, as well as a film which exemplifies each respective suit's style. The traditional Swords suit, for instance, here is the Suit of Spades, comprised of Warner Bros. and Columbia Pictures and epitomized in the film The Maltese Falcon.

 The Court cards are comprised of celebrated movie stars from the era, with attention to their enduring legacy as well as their real-life relationships with one another. Katharine Hepburn and Spencer Tracy represent the suit of MGM & 20th Century Fox - Coins, while Humphrey Bogart and his wife Lauren Bacall represent the aforementioned Spades. Carole Lombard and her husband Clark Gable are the Queen & King of Cups, while her ex-husband William Powell is the Knight of Coin. Powell's constant on-screen spouse, Myrna Loy, is the Knight of Spades. The Knaves are all comedians, for instance Laurel & Hardy for the suit of Cups -

 The Majors represent larger concepts and behind the scene intrigues of the Studio System. The Magician is The Director, The Emperor is The Mogul, The Hierophant is Will Hays and the League of Decency, the Hanged-Man is the lowly screenwriter, the Devil is the HUAC Commission and the Red Scare during the McCarthy era.

 The cards have been proofed and corrected thanks to an initial test run, and are ready to be printed by the manufacturer. A separate book with extensive analysis of the cards and overflowing with classic Hollywood history is ready to be printed to accompany the deck. This is not a typical tarot "booklet", but rather a specially designed 8x10 book crafted by the deck's creator. Essentially, the funding needed is to cover the printing and shipping costs of this special first run of The Golden Age of Hollywood Tarot.

For a contribution of $50 US, the contributor receives a 78 card First-Run deck; shipping to the US and Canada is an additional $10. For residents elsewhere in the world, the total price including shipping is $70 US.  For a contribution of $70 US, the contributor receives the 78 card deck as well as The Golden Age of Hollywood Tarot Key - an indispensable companion book to the GAoHT and an object of art in its own right.

The cards are large format, 3.5"x5.75"; the stock is 300gsm;
each deck comes individually shrink-wrapped.

While the target funding amount is low, if it fails to be met, what money garnered will be put to printing as many decks as possible and shipping them to those who contributed. 

The full deck can be viewed here.

Thank-you for your interest, and please share with anyone with an appreciation for the Tarot, Classic Film, or popular art. 

For anyone interested, a companion Tarot deck called The Silver Screen Tarot, based on silent films, is currently being created and will be released early in the new year.
story_txt: The Golden Age of Hollywood is a side project from the maker of The Beatles Tarot and The Shakespeare Tarot. With years of research behind it, The GAofHT  is a distillation of celebrity and film from the classic era of the Hollywood studio system. The images used are by and large culled from movie posters from the introduction of the talkies in 1929 to the first HUAC committee and the Anti-Trust verdict brought against the major studios in 1949. The Minors are divided between the major studios of the day - as there were 8, each suit is comprised of 2. The Aces indicate both studios, as well as a film which exemplifies each respective suit's style. The traditional Swords suit, for instance, here is the Suit of Spades, comprised of Warner Bros. and Columbia Pictures and epitomized in the film The Maltese Falcon. The Court cards are comprised of celebrated movie stars from the era, with attention to their enduring legacy as well as their real-life relationships with one another. Katharine Hepburn and Spencer Tracy represent the suit of MGM & 20th Century Fox - Coins, while Humphrey Bogart and his wife Lauren Bacall represent the aforementioned Spades. Carole Lombard and her husband Clark Gable are the Queen & King of Cups, while her ex-husband William Powell is the Knight of Coin. Powell's constant on-screen spouse, Myrna Loy, is the Knight of Spades. The Knaves are all comedians, for instance Laurel & Hardy for the suit of Cups - The Majors represent larger concepts and behind the scene intrigues of the Studio System. The Magician is The Director, The Emperor is The Mogul, The Hierophant is Will Hays and the League of Decency, the Hanged-Man is the lowly screenwriter, the Devil is the HUAC Commission and the Red Scare during the McCarthy era. The cards have been proofed and corrected thanks to an initial test run, and are ready to be printed by the manufacturer. A separate book with extensive analysis of the cards and overflowing with classic Hollywood history is ready to be printed to accompany the deck. This is not a typical tarot "booklet", but rather a specially designed 8x10 book crafted by the deck's creator. Essentially, the funding needed is to cover the printing and shipping costs of this special first run of The Golden Age of Hollywood Tarot.For a contribution of $50 US, the contributor receives a 78 card First-Run deck; shipping to the US and Canada is an additional $10. For residents elsewhere in the world, the total price including shipping is $70 US.  For a contribution of $70 US, the contributor receives the 78 card deck as well as The Golden Age of Hollywood Tarot Key - an indispensable companion book to the GAoHT and an object of art in its own right.The cards are large format, 3.5"x5.75"; the stock is 300gsm;each deck comes individually shrink-wrapped.While the target funding amount is low, if it fails to be met, what money garnered will be put to printing as many decks as possible and shipping them to those who contributed. The full deck can be viewed here.Thank-you for your interest, and please share with anyone with an appreciation for the Tarot, Classic Film, or popular art. For anyone interested, a companion Tarot deck called The Silver Screen Tarot, based on silent films, is currently being created and will be released early in the new year.

Why this project?

We need your help to construct all models ready, this takes a lot of time and is also very costly.

Why should I support the project?

Be the first to receive the files. Some files will be downloadable later in the shop but not all. The packages will be more expensive than here, so save them now and save up to 35%. The models are high quality and highly detailed. You can all models print with ABS or PLA. The mostly parts can be printed without Supports.

and

unlocked stretch goal #2: wooden archway with Roof / sketch - (model may differ)

Next:

By 1500 € for the crowdfunding community.

more coming soon...

Scales:

Our buidings / scenery comes in 28mm scale, but you can rescale it.

For 28mm scale do you need a printbed of 15 x 15 x 15 cm (6"x6"). Example Scale factor:

 10mm = 40 - 45 %
 15mm = 65 %
 20mm = 75 - 80%
 28mm = 100 %

All files are not for commercial use!

More downloadable 3D printfiles can you find under www.3D-Printfiles.com Anyone looking for ready-to-play scenery can find many models on www.EsloTerrain.com.

story:
The Crystal Oracle Card Deck

crys·tal

noun | ˈkristl/

a piece of a homogeneous solid substance having a natural geometrically regular form with symmetrically arranged plane faces.

or·a·cle

noun | ˈôrək(ə)l/

a priest or priestess acting as a medium through whom advice or prophecy was sought from the gods in classical antiquity.

“In a crystal we have clear evidence of the existence of a formative life principle, and though we cannot understand the life of a crystal, it is nonetheless a living being.”

Nikola Tesla

At Terra Luma, we gain inspiration through connection, movement, stillness, and solitude. Our interests include crystals, consciousness, numerology, astrology, metaphysics, yoga, and the elements. Co-founders Audrey Simper and Mackenzie Sullivan have spent the past few years weaving these interests into a humble and concise oracle card deck and accompanying booklet.

The co-founders of Terra Luma have witnessed, first-hand, how illuminating oracle cards can be as tools for self-awareness, introspective growth, goal setting, and problem solving. We are two young seekers of (and believers in) the power of truth, magic, love, and unity. Until now we’ve had to depend on others’ decks for insight. During a brainstorming session three years ago we decided it was time to start creating our own deck. Between the two of us, we had the skill set and drive to make an aesthetically appealing deck incorporating our interests that we could both use daily for guidance. However, as we got deeper into the flow of our project, our hearts alerted us that this was a gift to be shared with others. We believe that each person is made of stardust. Our oracle cards contain a spark of magic that, when ignited by the starseed, provoke cosmic transmutation.

 

Terra Luma envisioned creating a sleek, unique, contemporary take on the Oracle card.

We wanted to construct a deck that we would be drawn to in a store and excited to have displayed on our coffee table. The creative process began by photographing the crystals on a white backdrop. These images were then edited to generate a watercolor-like effect, giving the cards a more cohesive and artistic aesthetic. We hope you appreciate the uplifting feel of our cards, intentionally yet subtly emphasized through enigmatic font, gender-neutral colors, and the pop of color that the crystals provide against clean, grey tones. 

Our logo represents the cardinal directions, mirror symmetry, and the 8 limbs of yoga.

These three constituents are symbolic of our human journey as spiritual beings.

 

Our cards pack a lot of punch without appearing overwhelmingly involved.

The simplicity of our layout allows for the user to pull from the attributes that they're drawn to without being distracted by the elements they aren't. We believe that oracle cards should be a personalized experience and look forward to hearing how our integral components supplement your readings.

Terra Luma Crystal Oracle Deck - includes box holding deck and book.

This is our baby. We are very excited to offer the world an Oracle card deck based on the energies of various crystals. This deck includes 54 cards and comes in a tuck box. The deck also comes with an in depth guidebook to offer different spreads, additional insights on readings, and what the symbolism of the cards translate to. All of this will come beautifully packaged with our custom design, making it a great keepsake or thoughtful gift! *does not include pictured crystals*

Two is Better Than One Gift Set - includes two boxes holding the deck and book.

Maybe you’d like a box set for yourself, AND a crystal loving friend? Then this Double Gift Set is perfect for the occasion. Get two boxes for a discounted price.*does not include pictured crystals*

Deck Cleansing Kit - includes quartz crystal + satin pouch.

When we were brainstorming the idea for our crystal oracle cards we thought it was important that we also include an actual crystal! Your cards will hold on to the energy you infuse them with each time you shuffle. That’s why it is important to cleanse your cards after each reading. There are several different ways to cleanse your card deck. One of those ways is with a crystal. Quartz crystal absorbs energy around it. So keeping your cards in the satin pouch with this crystal will help keep your deck clean! Quartz crystal helps with amplification therefore it will amplify the cleansing process. One of our favorite ways to do this is to place your quartz crystal on top of you deck, leave it outside in the sunlight for “sunnier” readings or bathe it in the moonlight to absorb the insightful and intuitive energies of the moon. Additionally, keeping your deck in a white satin bag also aids in the cleansing process. The color white has one of the highest vibrations and repeals darkness and negativity. The energy surrounding it is pure, light, angelic, fresh and clear of emotional clutter. *does not include pictured deck, deck sold separately*

Terra Luma Crystal Oracle Deck & Oracle Card Reading & Lesson from Audrey via Skype - Includes box holding deck and book and a crystal card reading from co-founder Audrey Simper.

Do you have a burning question you’re seeking an answer to? Are you currently pondering your direction in life? Do you have a difficult decision to make wondering which path to choose? Maybe you’d like more insight on a relationship. This perk is for those of you who are interested in experiencing a reading with the Terra Luma Crystal Oracle cards from one of the creators. You will choose one of the spreads offered in our book (past, present, future/relationship/clarity/etc.) and Audrey will perform a reading based on your question via Skype/Facetime/Whatsapp. A reading will give you more insight, wisdom and clarity and will help guide you towards your highest potential. This will be a 30min session, Skype and/or Facetime/Whatsapp as well as high speed internet are required.

8x10 Crystal Art Print - includes one loose 8x10 print

Get your favorite crystal card printed at 8"x10" ready to frame and hang on your wall!

Postcard + Custom Note - Includes One Crystal Oracle postcard, with a handwritten note from Terra Luma! Limited to US mailing addresses only.

Astrology Reading - includes a 30min natal birth chart interpretation by Audrey Simper with notes.

Audrey has been reading and interpreting astrological birth charts for the past two years. In this 30min reading Audrey will give you her analysis of different aspects within your unique natal birth chart. At the end of the reading you can ask two specific questions (i.e. relationship questions, vocational questions such as "Am I in the right field of work?" etc). Must know the time, date and location of your birth and have either Skype,  Facetime or Whatsapp.

Host an Oracle Party! - Includes card deck + guidebook set for each attendee as well as custom prizes.

Terra Luma co-founders will come to your house and read cards for you and your friends (up to 4 hours). We'll bring a few custom door prizes and a complimentary Crystal Oracle Deck for all attendees (up to 20 guests total). *Limited to Chicagoland area*

For your support.

We understand if monetary pledging isn't an option for you at this time. We would still love if you could share The Crystal Oracle Card Deck by Terra Luma with anyone you think would be interested. Like and follow us on Facebook and Instagram. We also openly welcome thoughts of success and abundance towards our campaign! We are grateful for your support in any and all ways and have heaps of gratitude for all of the love, contributions, encouragement, and positive thoughts that are helping us bring The Crystal Oracle Card Deck from our hearts and hands to the world's.

This is our first experience with crowdfunding so we run any first-timers risks and challenges that will hopefully prove themselves to be lessons for our personal and professional growth.

We have already taken the time to write and illustrate our guide book and card deck. Our focus now is printing to fulfill your orders, with the hopes of being able to offer our product in stores. We have a high quality printer for the card deck we are happy working with but we require funding before we're able to print. We are working hard to bring the best version of the guide book to you and we would need time figure out our best printing option for the book based off of the number of orders we have to fulfill. 

Your pledges will immediately fund:

Our creative vision, materialized
The printing of our 54-card decks to fulfill your orders
The printing of our companion guide books to fulfill your orders

If we surpass our goal, your funding will help with:

Copyright/legal fees to start our business, Terra Luma
The design and launch of our website
Marketing endeavors and outreach
Getting our product onto shelves in stores!
Production and shipment of gift decks to our role models
Improvements to our current design

We will be as transparent with you as possible, every step of the way. If we run into any issues during the production process, we will make it our responsibility to update you in a timely manner.
