story:
Short Summary:

Afros and Audio was born out of a desire to amplify the voices, impact and visibility of Black and Afro Latinx podcast creators, and create opportunities for more original podcasts and industry careers in 2019 and beyond.

My name is Talib Jasir Fleming, a dual certified Life Coach to artists and entrepreneurs, author, fiction podcast creator and creative who envisions a world of community engagement, collaboration and creating opportunity for others.

Afros & Audio Podcast Festival will work to bridge the information, access, and equity gap between Podcast Creators, Professionals and the Podcast industry. The aim of Afros & Audio, LLC is to provide year round resources for Podcast Creators and Professionals of Color, including, but not limited to, sponsorship, podcast development and support for nonfiction and fiction shows, and professional services and careers.

Our two-day event promises to be a fun and inspiring weekend with informational workshops and breakout sessions, with topics to include content creation, editing, launching, marketing, etc., lively panels and discussions, as well as a commemorative keynote address.

When audio entertainment reigned, during the “Golden Age of Radio”, Black people were not invited or welcomed to the party. Afros and Audio wants to ensure that voices of Black and AfroLatinx people of all sexual and gender identities, nationalities, social and economic backgrounds, politics and faiths are given an opportunity to leave a legacy in the growing industry of podcasting. Our mission is to design lanes that intersect all spaces and opportunities within the Podcast Industry. 

What We Need & What You Get:

Our campaign request is $50,000 (approximately 1/3 of what's needed):

In order to plan a two-day festival in Brooklyn, NY for attendees and participants to share in an experience that will create opportunity, provide resources for the sustainability of Podcast creators and professional services, and impact the quantity and visibility of active podcasts by Black and Afro-Latinx creators, we will need your support.  Your purchases will cover:

Equipment rental - Chairs, vendor tables, live streaming and replay equipment, stage, etc.

Event Team benefits - Afros & Audio festival wouldn't be possible without the commitment and dedication of a few leaders who jumped in voluntarily. These folks deserve their travel and expenses paid and compensation for their hard work!

Venue Costs - BKLYN Studios placed us on their calendar because they believe in the vision and mission but most importantly want to host our inaugural event for the community and for the culture. The venue and location couldn't be more perfect for a summer weekend in downtown Brooklyn, NY. Check out the following links for more information about Afros & Audio Podcast Festival's home, an insane food market, and hotels within walking distance for our traveling guests

Speaker Travel and Expenses - Our festival will propel us beyond the event into the next day and the day after; as Black creatives at the precipice of a renaissance in all forms, genres, and mediums. Our guest speakers and key note speaker were carefully selected to inspire and encourage us to keep up the good fight with our voices, creativity and ingenuity. Their time is valuable and we want to provide market value compensation for their travel, time and talent.

Pre, Day of, and Post-Production costs - Event Planner, DJ for the after party, security, audio/visual services, clean up, vendor fees, etc.

Afros & Audio perks include the following depending on level of contribution:

Streaming & Replay Link for those who want to enjoy the weekend but can't attend in person

Exclusive Afros & Audio Festival Merchandise

Early-Bird 2 Day General Admission Ticket

Early-Bird 2 Day VIP Admission Ticket (Includes After Party ticket)

Even if we don't reach our goal - all funds will go to the festival costs, year round resources and podcast sponsorship. 

The Impact:

Our Afros and Audio Inaugural Festival will create space and opportunity to:

  • Acknowledge and celebrate our contribution to the medium of podcasting
  • Provide the latest industry news, technology and information for podcast sustainability and success
  • Build a foundation of long-term strategy for collaboration and community patronage and support

2018 Podcast stats:

  • Apple at WWDC confirmed over 550,000 active podcasts. (June, 2018)
  • FastCompany reported over 18.5 million episodes. (April, 2018)
  • Variety reported that Apple podcasts include content in more than 100 languages. (February, 2018)

As of 2019, less than 5% of active podcasts by and for people of the African Diaspora exist in the market. If this matters to you, than consider that percentage a Call to Action for creating and supporting podcasts by Black and Brown creators.

We need your help to support Podcast Creators and Professionals of Color with sponsorship, year-round resources, such as, production, quality tech equipment and software, increase opportunities, promotion/marketing and more.

The Difference your Contribution will Make:

INFORMATION, RESOURCES, EQUITY & REPRESENTATION for existing podcast professionals, creators and those looking for solid direction for developing and launching their podcast ideas and services.

Opportunity for culturally relevant networking, skill building and entertainment. 

Special focus on expanding the reach of POC podcast creators with a unique platform that will shape, shift and uplift the narrative of our voices throughout the industry.

Provide access, platforms, and funding for advertising and marketing to push POC podcasts through the ranks of the hundreds of thousands of podcasts currently in market.

We are here to spread a message of community, collaboration, and a commitment to do both to the world. Everyone involved in AFROS & AUDIO is coming from a place of uplifting each other and the Black and Afro-Latinx podcast community!

Risks & Challenges:

Creating a festival of this scale and ambition includes a lot of hard work, insane optimism, and a commitment to our vision. Thankfully, we have a team of passionate podcast creators, enthusiasts and creative professionals who have been working in their chosen fields for years. YOUR support will create a funding cornerstone for our festival and beyond. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute monetarily, you can still help by spreading the word and sharing this campaign. 

Share this campaign among your peers, family, friends, and various networks.

Please use the Indiegogo share tools!
story_txt:
Short Summary:
Afros and Audio was born out of a desire to amplify the voices, impact and visibility of Black and Afro Latinx podcast creators, and create opportunities for more original podcasts and industry careers in 2019 and beyond.
My name is Talib Jasir Fleming, a dual certified Life Coach to artists and entrepreneurs, author, fiction podcast creator and creative who envisions a world of community engagement, collaboration and creating opportunity for others.
Afros & Audio Podcast Festival will work to bridge the information, access, and equity gap between Podcast Creators, Professionals and the Podcast industry. The aim of Afros & Audio, LLC is to provide year round resources for Podcast Creators and Professionals of Color, including, but not limited to, sponsorship, podcast development and support for nonfiction and fiction shows, and professional services and careers.
Our two-day event promises to be a fun and inspiring weekend with informational workshops and breakout sessions, with topics to include content creation, editing, launching, marketing, etc., lively panels and discussions, as well as a commemorative keynote address.
When audio entertainment reigned, during the “Golden Age of Radio”, Black people were not invited or welcomed to the party. Afros and Audio wants to ensure that voices of Black and AfroLatinx people of all sexual and gender identities, nationalities, social and economic backgrounds, politics and faiths are given an opportunity to leave a legacy in the growing industry of podcasting. Our mission is to design lanes that intersect all spaces and opportunities within the Podcast Industry. 
What We Need & What You Get:
Our campaign request is $50,000 (approximately 1/3 of what's needed):
In order to plan a two-day festival in Brooklyn, NY for attendees and participants to share in an experience that will create opportunity, provide resources for the sustainability of Podcast creators and professional services, and impact the quantity and visibility of active podcasts by Black and Afro-Latinx creators, we will need your support.  Your purchases will cover:
Equipment rental - Chairs, vendor tables, live streaming and replay equipment, stage, etc.
Event Team benefits - Afros & Audio festival wouldn't be possible without the commitment and dedication of a few leaders who jumped in voluntarily. These folks deserve their travel and expenses paid and compensation for their hard work!
Venue Costs - BKLYN Studios placed us on their calendar because they believe in the vision and mission but most importantly want to host our inaugural event for the community and for the culture. The venue and location couldn't be more perfect for a summer weekend in downtown Brooklyn, NY. Check out the following links for more information about Afros & Audio Podcast Festival's home, an insane food market, and hotels within walking distance for our traveling guests
Speaker Travel and Expenses - Our festival will propel us beyond the event into the next day and the day after; as Black creatives at the precipice of a renaissance in all forms, genres, and mediums. Our guest speakers and key note speaker were carefully selected to inspire and encourage us to keep up the good fight with our voices, creativity and ingenuity. Their time is valuable and we want to provide market value compensation for their travel, time and talent.

story:
What is HILLMAN THE GAME?


HILLMAN THE GAME is a new board game that allows you to take on the roles of characters from the hit late 80's - mid 90's TV show "A Different World"!  2 to 8 players can take on the chance to move through the campus of the fictional HBCU, Hillman College and be the player with the most cash at the "Season Finale".  Whether you're familiar with the classic Black television show or you've never heard of a Dwayne Wayne in your life, you will have great time playing this game!

 

Where did HILLMAN THE GAME come from?

"A Different World" premiered in the late 1980's as a spinoff to the iconic "Cosby Show".  It was the first show that depicted life at an HBCU.  Since its creation and completion, the shows positive impact on the Black/African-American community is undeniable.  Some even attribute their desire to attend and graduate college to the show - and that's including those who were born after the show stopped airing! 

The show featured characters with extremely relatable situations and traits.  Characters like Denise Huxtable - the ambitious, unfocused and flighty middle child from a loving but demanding family; Kimberly Reese - the responsible, scholarly, workhorse with a rebellious spirit; Lena James - the intelligent, trendsetting, rough-around-the-edges hustler; and Mr. Gaines - the wise, crotchety, care-giver by way of food service with more advice than he had hair and many, many more are what made Hillman, albeit fiction, so real.  HILLMAN THE GAME had to happen.

The idea of creating a board game where you could act as characters that were iconic, inspirational and familiar to Black/African-American people came from the countless nostalgic conversations about the show.  Conversations that seemed to occur over and over regardless of location or venue.  Not to mention the severe lack of board games geared towards such a demographic so rich in culture, HILLMAN THE GAME was an easy choice to make when deciding which game a brand new table top board gaming company should make first.  

How do you play HILLMAN THE GAME?


In HILLMAN THE GAME you move through the board as either Freddie Brooks, Whitley Gilbert, Ron Johnson, Walter Oakes, Kimberly Reese, Colonel Bradford Taylor, Jaleesa Vinson or Dwayne Wayne.  HILLMAN THE GAME progresses through the mechanics of dice rolls where landing on a space may cause you to pay rent, receive salary, answer trivia questions or follow the instructions of certain events.

Each game may last anywhere from 20 minutes to over an hour based on the amount of players and breaks for conversation and laughter (this happens a lot).

HILLMAN THE GAME comes in Standard and Deluxe versions.  The Standard version features a the playable map of Hillman mounted onto a game mat while the Deluxe version features the playable map mounted onto a quad-fold game board.  In addition to the respective Hillman maps, HILLMAN THE GAME comes with


1 Six-Sided Die (D6)
8 Character Pieces and ID Cards
72 Event Cards
72 Trivia Cards
24 Answer Cards
Hillman Currency
Welcome Letter (aka game rules) *not shown in photo

 

Why does HILLMAN THE GAME need my help?

Creating a board game is no easy feat and it's definitely not a cheap one.  HILLMAN THE GAME needs help in the cost of manufacturing each individual game component as well as administrative and operational costs.  Such costs include, but aren't limited to, illustration fees, business registration,  rental space, utilities, materials and wages.  It isn't easy to start a company that creates board games for people that love board games but don't see themselves much in them but, it is necessary... and so is your help in funding this project.

Who created HILLMAN THE GAME?


My name is Tanisha Hall.  I'm a Brooklyn, NY native living in Columbia, SC.  I am happily married with 3 children in a loving blended family.  I've worked in industries from customer service to state government to bridal boutiques and so many in between.  In June 2017, I became unemployed and vowed never again to work anywhere that I couldn't pass to my children if I should die and decided to create a company to do just that.  Seriously.  One day, while thinking of a fun way to interact with television shows from the 80’s and 90’s, a conversation was started about creating board games that made you feel like your favorite characters while maintaining connections to African-American heritage.  With a few laughter-inducing conversations, In All Series-Ness was born. 

In All Series-Ness (IAS) is a table top board game company #fortheculture that is dedicated to bringing people together for good, old-fashioned board-gaming with a modern twist.    By providing quality games focused on positive Black television, cinema, pop culture and original content, we’re sure to put nostalgia right where it belongs...  with you and with a smile.
The illustrator for HILLMAN THE GAME is Quinn McGowan.  An African-American comics artist and designer of Legends Press, a company in which he owns in Memphis, TN.
When you look at one of my games you will know instantly who it is for, where it came from and why it was created in the first place.  In All Series-Ness is our culture without question.

Has anyone played HILLMAN THE GAME?


Yes!  There have been prototype playtesters.  Here’s some of their comments.
 
“I like how refreshing and easy the game is to play even for someone who has never watched the show.”
 
“It’s new and fresh with a totally different and interesting back story. The rules are also good and make it totally easy.”
 
“It's fresh. It's culturally appropriated and needed!!”


Risks & Challenges

Potential challenges for creating HILLMAN THE GAME are timeline in accordance with manufacturing since there are multiple for different components of the game.  In order to maintain a reasonable price of the full game, there was no one stop shop as far as producing everything HILLMAN THE GAME needs to function. Additional challenges are website development and funding for legal representation.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about this preorder campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools and follow our Instagram pages @hillmanthegame and @inallseriesness!

THANK YOU!!

story:
Ten Years of Freak'n Game Making

I have played games my whole life. A lot of games. I've played complete games of Risk, back-to-back-to-back with nothing but passion, warm Mountain Dew, and Dorrito crumbs as the only fuel to keep going. And that was before the age of 8. Seriously, what were my parent's thinking?

Like all avid gamers, I began to take note of what game mechanics really worked, and what didn't. As my life trajectory took me towards a career in the creative arts, it seemed natural to combine these two interests. The first thing I did was compile a list of the games I loved and what made them special. 

Okay, so where is this project at?

The great news is, it's totally finished! 

This isn't a project that I have a 'great' idea for and I just need money to complete it. It's ready for you to enjoy right now.

The biggest challenge, and it is huge, is the actual manufacturing of the game. It was a lucky mistake that I didn't know how costly chits, cards, and mats cost before I began, or else I would have ended up with a simpler version of Uno.

Right now, I'm hoping to raise 4300.00...give or take, that's about 60 games. I believe there is a critical mass threshold with games, where I'm hoping that it will be a big enough number and reach a broad enough audience to start gaining momentum through word of mouth. I fully understand that for this project to go anywhere, people who love games will need to share their experience with friends. And since I don't know all your awesome friends, I could never be as effective as all of us working together. There's no way I can do this alone and I am grateful for any supporter going on this journey with me. 

Hitting the goal will also guarantee that I will finish the first expansion set. I want to keep on working on this project, making more cool cards, and adding some elements that I think will be so exciting. In fact, I can prove that right now...in the game you will receive chits that you wont be able to use in this version. There are several multi-colored tokens, steal tokens, and Furball Rampage tokens. These can be used with the expansion set, and will add even more deviousness and strategy. 

Quite simply, the money from this campaign is going right back into this game so that you, the supporter, can get a copy within the next 4 months.

STRETCH GOALS

PERK ASSETS

Okay, so you probably want to know what kind of cool stuff you'll be getting...well here it, our really cool tshirt design.

THERE'S MORE!! 

This has been a huge undertaking. In many ways it has been exhausting, but ultimately I'm excited that it can finally be shared. Along this journey I've created so many cards, and card types, but sadly, not all of them made starter set. The cards included in this game provide the best well-rounded experience, and an endless amount of variety. However, as of right now, I have at least 30 more cards that are really exciting. (I sort of mentioned this above) They are more intense, crazy, and cause a lot of havoc and destruction, and they are a perfect addition for everyone that has already learned the game, and they will definitely be included in the first expansion pack, 'The Lost Vault.' I'm sharing this because this not just some project I tinkered on in my spare time, but rather, it is something that I hope to keep doing for a long time to come. 

For every supporter who purchases the Blast from the Past perk or higher, I will include an extra card that will never be given out again, nor will the card's special ability ever be used again...plus, the artwork is a good example of what you can expect in the The Lost Vault expansion set.

A successful campaign would be such a sweet reward to cap off a marathon of a project, and it would allow me to continue adding sweet new cards to the game! I really want to do this, I think you'll love it too! 

Risks & Challenges

None!! That's the great part. There have been so many risks and challenges along the way. Honestly, it would take too long to mention the personal financing I contributed, the insane amount of personal time, the frustrations, the learning curve, etc. 

That's all behind me now. I want to give you this game, and I hope that you love it.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know that not everyone is in a place to get this game right now. That's totally okay! If you know anyone who loves games, point them this direction. I really believe that game players will see the work that went in to Furball Rampage and will love mechanics as much as I do.

story:
This Project is a follow up to the Kickstarter campaign, we had a couple dice sets that didn't unlock that we wanted a second chance to have created.

The Story began with about dragons, adventure, friendship and love. Moonie's adventures were tales written for my son, and this project began with the desire to create a visual element for him. 

Working with Canadian artist, Amanda Busby, concept art of each of the dragons were produced.  This Kickstarter was created out of my passion for dice and my deep love for these stories. The dice were created with each dragon in mind, taking elements of their designs, personalities, and my own personal feelings on what represents them. The results are the stunning dice sets you see photographed below! You may even recognize a few of the dragons from my past Kickstarters.

This is a Canadian Project, each of the rewards will list the approximate conversion to some of the major currencies.  

 

All Dice Sets are an 11 piece RPG Set.

2 D20s, 4 D6s, 1 D8, 1 D10, 1 D%, 1 D4, 1 D12

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise $15,000 for the dice sets and the pin we need to raise an additional $3,500

To make it easier on everyone we will be raising funds for the dice first and then the pins.

All of the previous dice sets that were unlocked on the kickstarter are also available to order as well as most of our previous lines to save on shipping.

Goals to Unlock - Once we hit these funding goals they will be automatically available on backerkit.

Bones - 2500

Pig - 5000

Jellybean - 7500

Cheese - 10000

Spice - 12500

Ruby - 15000

Pins then become available to unlock

Bones - 15,600

Pig - 16,200

Jellybean - 16,800

Cheese - 17,400

Spice - 18,000

Ruby - 18,600

Bones the Dragon

Pig the Dragon

Jellybean the Dragon

Cheese the Dragon

Spice the Dragon

Ruby the Dragon

The Impact

  • Your contribution helps us fund more product lines to grow the business
  • I have had 3 successfully completed kickstarters and have done one pre-order project that was also delivered on time.
  • We own a store front in Brampton, but also our main webpage is www.littledragoncorp.com

Shipping

I will be collecting all shipping and additional pledges after the project ends through backerkit.

This is the template guide for shipping.

 

Risks & Challenges

There are always risks and challenges in any project. I'm confident I will be able to deliver within a year. I QA every 10 sets of Dice and tracking is included on all Canadian & USA Orders. International Shipping will have an option to upgrade to tracked.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • If you love the project but can't contribute please share and let all your friends know!
story_txt:
This Project is a follow up to the Kickstarter campaign, we had a couple dice sets that didn't unlock that we wanted a second chance to have created.
The Story began with about dragons, adventure, friendship and love. Moonie's adventures were tales written for my son, and this project began with the desire to create a visual element for him. 
Working with Canadian artist, Amanda Busby, concept art of each of the dragons were produced.  This Kickstarter was created out of my passion for dice and my deep love for these stories. The dice were created with each dragon in mind, taking elements of their designs, personalities, and my own personal feelings on what represents them. The results are the stunning dice sets you see photographed below! You may even recognize a few of the dragons from my past Kickstarters.
This is a Canadian Project, each of the rewards will list the approximate conversion to some of the major currencies.  
 
All Dice Sets are an 11 piece RPG Set.
2 D20s, 4 D6s, 1 D8, 1 D10, 1 D%, 1 D4, 1 D12

What We Need & What You Get
We are looking to raise $15,000 for the dice sets and the pin we need to raise an additional $3,500
To make it easier on everyone we will be raising funds for the dice first and then the pins.
All of the previous dice sets that were unlocked on the kickstarter are also available to order as well as most of our previous lines to save on shipping.
Goals to Unlock - Once we hit these funding goals they will be automatically available on backerkit.
Bones - 2500
Pig - 5000
Jellybean - 7500
Cheese - 10000
Spice - 12500
Ruby - 15000
Pins then become available to unlock
Bones - 15,600
Pig - 16,200
Jellybean - 16,800
Cheese - 17,400
Spice - 18,000
Ruby - 18,600

Bones the Dragon

Pig the Dragon
Jellybean the Dragon

Cheese the Dragon
Spice the Dragon

Ruby the Dragon

The Impact

Your contribution helps us fund more product lines to grow the business
I have had 3 successfully completed kickstarters and have done one pre-order project that was also delivered on time.
We own a store front in Brampton, but also our main webpage is www.littledragoncorp.com



Shipping
I will be collecting all shipping and additional pledges after the project ends through backerkit.
This is the template guide for shipping.

 
Risks & Challenges
There are always risks and challenges in any project. I'm confident I will be able to deliver within a year. I QA every 10 sets of Dice and tracking is included on all Canadian & USA Orders. International Shipping will have an option to upgrade to tracked.

Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
If you love the project but can't contribute please share and let all your friends know!

story:
Tentang Game Ini (About the Game)

Santai Aja Lagi diperuntukkan untuk kalangan remaja dan dewasa muda. Anak-anak di bawah umur 17 tahun tidak disarankan untuk memainkan permainan ini karena mengandung lelucon yang cenderung bersifat dewasa. Permainan ini hanya untuk lelucon belaka dan kami sama sekali tidak mendukung segala aksi apapun yang terbentuk dari kalimat-kalimat dalam permainan ini.

Permainan ini sangat mudah untuk dipelajari (maksimal 5 menit buat orang yang IQ-nya kelelep). Siapa yang paling lucu, dialah pemenangnya. Cocok untuk mereka yang senang berkumpul dengan teman, senang bercanda, nyantai, dan terutama tidak emosian / baper-an. Permainan ini menjanjikan suasana hari semakin ceria dan menyenangkan. 

 

Isinya apa sih? (What’s Inside?)

Selain kotak yang kalian lihat, terdapat 3 komponen utama di dalamnya.

  1. 1 Lembar Rule Book (Aturan Pemakaian)
  2. 100 Kartu Hijau (Pertanyaan)
  3. 500 Kartu Putih (Jawaban)
  4. Indiegogo campaign backers akan mendapatkan tambahan 4 kartu Hijau dan 6 kartu Putih (esklusif untuk Indiegogo backers!) untuk kalian isi dengan lelucon internal geng kalian.

Dimensi box 20x10x7,5 cm dan beratnya sekitar 1,2 kg (agak berbahaya memang jadi tolong jangan buat sambit orang).

 

Oke, terus gimana mainnya? (How to Play?)

Terima kasih masih nge-scroll dan ngebaca sampai sini. Cara mainnya sangat gampang.

  1. Setiap round, bandar akan mengajukan pertanyaan (kartu hijau) kepada peserta.
  2. Peserta dengan jawaban (kartu putih) paling pecah, dialah pemenang round tersebut.
  3. Siapa yang menang 10 round terlebih dahulu, dialah pemenangnya.

Gitu aja sih, gak ribet - ribet amat. Aturan lebih detilnya ada di Rule Book di dalam permainannya.

 

Ada contohnya gak? (Any examples?)

Ada kok. Ini beberapa contoh kartunya.

 

 

Kok mirip ya dengan game 'Cards Against Humanity'? (Looks similar to CAH)

Permainan ini memang mirip CAH. Tetapi si pencipta telah memberi tahu dan meminta izin kepada team CAH bahwa dia akan membuat permainan ini. Jadi tidak ada maksud untuk plagiat ataupun melanggar hak cipta (copyright) mereka.

 

Kayanya lumayan nih, cara dapetinnya gimana? (How to get it?)

Caranya mudah, kalian tinggal pilih diantara paket - paket berikut (buat kalian yang gak ngerti kurs, sekalian dimasukin Rupiah equivalennya):

Perks 1 (~ Rp 30.000) - Kami akan doakan semoga masa depan kalian cerah. Terima kasih.

Perks 2 (~ Rp 110.000) - Nama kalian akan ditulis di website kami sebagai 'Donatur Tanpa Pamrih'

Perks 3 (~ Rp 210.000) - 1 box 'Santai Aja Lagi' Indiegogo version dengan harga jatoh (ultra early bird price) LIMITED UNTUK 100 ORANG PERTAMA !!

Perks 4 (~ Rp 265.000) - 1 box 'Santai Aja Lagi' Indiegogo version dengan harga miring (early bird price)

Perks 5 (~ Rp 965.000) - 5 box 'Santai Aja Lagi' Indiegogo version dengan harga borongan! (reseller price)

Silahkan patungan dengan teman - teman kalian!

 

Saya mau pre-order, tetapi saya gak punya Credit/Debit Card. Ada cara lain untuk pre-order gak? (Any other payment methods?)

Untuk kalian yang tidak punya credit/debit card, tidak apa-apa. Kalian bisa transfer ke rekening BCA, tetapi akan kena sedikit biaya admin (Rp 5000 saja). 

Step 1:

Kalian tentukan ingin beli perks yang mana, lalu lihat harga di bawah. (Seluruh harga di bawah sudah termasuk ongkir)

Perks 1 - Rp 25.000

Perks 2 - Rp 100.000

Perks 3 - Rp 215.000 (Harga spesial untuk 100 Orang Pertama!!)

Perks 4 - Rp 270.000

Perks 5 - Rp 970.000

Step 2:

Transfer sejumlah Perks yang kalian inginkan ke rekening BCA 6040501612 (Timothy Santika).

Step 3:

Email ke santaiajalagi.team@gmail.com dengan format seperti di bawah:

Subjek email: PO SAL Cardgame BCA Transfer

Nama Lengkap Pemesan:

Alamat Lengkap Pemesan:

Perks Yang Dipilih:

(Lampirkan / attach bukti pembayaran kalian)

Step 4:

Setelah diverifikasi, nama kalian akan muncul di bagian daftar 'Backers' halaman ini.

 

Kapan kita dapat barangnya? (Release date)

Bisa lihat di bawah, apa saja kegiatan kami dari sekarang sampai release. 

Kami akan mengirim semua pre-order dari awal bulan Juli 2018 untuk para Indiegogo backers.

 

Kenapa harus sekarang? Tunggu keluar di toko - toko / online website saja. (Why don't we wait for release date?)

Kalian bisa tunggu tanggal official release (17 Agustus 2018), tetapi kalian akan mendapatkannya jauh lebih lama (Agustus lewat) dibanding dengan mereka yang pre-order (pertengahan Juli).

Edisi spesial Indiegogo version juga tidak dapat dibeli setelah official release. Harganya pun akan lebih mahal dibanding harga early bird dan belum termasuk ongkir!

 

Oke, pengirimannya bagaimana? (Shipping)

Untuk saat ini kami hanya melayani pengiriman lokal ke seluruh Indonesia menggunakan jasa JNE. Harga yang kalian bayar untuk perks 3, 4, dan 5 sudah termasuk dengan ongkir.

Untuk kalian yang tinggal di luar negeri, mohon maaf kami belum melayani international shipping. Sebaiknya kalian memakai alamat keluarga / saudara / kerabat yang masih tinggal di Indonesia. Kami akan update kalian jika kami menambahkan layanan international shipping.

 

Kalau mau kontak situ bagaimana? (Contact)

Pertanyaan apapun silahkan email ke kontek@santaiajalagi.com.

Website - https://santaiajalagi.com

Sekalian follow akun socmed kita ya!               

 

Tentang Kami (About Us)

Si pencipta adalah seorang entrepreneur muda yang sudah lama berkecimpung di bidang pendidikan. Suatu hari di malam yang sunyi, si pencipta tiba-tiba tersentak dari lamunannya untuk membuat game ini bagi masyarakat Indonesia. Dia tidak bisa tertidur malam itu karena dia terus memikirkan tentang game ini. Dia lalu mengajak temannya, si kreatif, yang juga seorang entrepreneur di bidang hiburan, untuk membantunya membuat game ini.

Setelah selesai dibuat, mereka mengetes game ini untuk dimainkan oleh beberapa orang. Respons yang didapat sangat positif. Si pencipta lalu memutuskan untuk memasukannya ke campaign Indiegogo untuk diproduksi dalam skala besar. Sebagian dari hasil penjualan akan disumbangkan untuk pendidikan anak - anak miskin di Indonesia.

story:
SteaMage ist ein Pen & Paper Rollenspiel, in dem in einer Welt voller Magie die industrielle Revolution beginnt. Dieses Fantasy/Steampunk Crossover bietet neben einer detailreich ausgearbeiteten Welt auch mehrere, spielbare Fantasy Rassen.

Diese Rassen umfassen Menschen, Waldelfen, die nomadischen Wüstenelfen, Zwerge und sogenannte Chimären, Mischwesen aus Mensch und Tier.

Aus einem Baukastensystem kann sich jeder Spieler seine eigenen Zauber erstellen und seine eigenen Geräte und Technologien entwickeln. Zur Inspiration sind einige Beispielzauber und Beispieltechnologien vorhanden.

SteaMage wird  seit 2012 von den Freunden und ehemaligen Studienkollegen Tobias und Christopher entwickelt. Im Frühjahr 2019 kam mit dem Neuzugang des Teams bestehend aus Illustrator, Setzerin und Lektorin neuer Wind in die Segel.

Das selbstentwickelte Regelsystem ist einfach und intuitiv, gut geeignet für Einsteiger und erfahrene Rollenspieler gleichermaßen. Mathemagie hat im Voraus dafür gesorgt, dass es für alle fair ist.

Das Team achtet außerdem darauf, eine inklusive Welt zu gestalten und Diversität in den bereitgestellten Abenteuern sichtbar zu machen.

Im Kampagnenvideo wird alles nochmal im Detail erklärt, also seht es euch an!

 

Das Geld aus dem Crowdfunding wird benötigt um zum einen den Druck des Regelwerks zu bezahlen und zum anderen alle entstandenen Kosten zu decken. Hier könnt ihr eine Aufstellung der Kostenverteilung sehen:

Da wir ein flexibles Ziel eingestellt haben, wird euer Geld auf jeden Fall für den Druck des Regelwerks und die Bezahlung der Mitwirkenden verwendet. Selbst wenn das Ziel nicht erreicht wird, werden alle geplanten Zusatzinhalte produziert, allerdings erst nach und nach und in einem wesentlich gestreckteren Zeitplan.

 

Das Grundregelwerk enthält 144 Seiten voll mit detaillierten Beschreibungen der Welt von SteaMage, den fünf Rassen (Menschen, Zwergen, Waldelfen, Wüstenelfen und Chimären), den Regeln sowie zwei Beispielabenteuer. Wichtige Aspekte und Kapitel sind in schwarz/weiß illustriert, das Cover und die Weltkarte, die als Vorsatz enthalten ist, sind in Farbe.

 

SteaMage spielt in einer Welt, die vom Europa des viktorianischen Zeitalters inspiriert ist, doch Ländernamen und Landesgrenzen sind stark verschieden. Ein weiterer Punkt, in dem sich die Welt von SteaMage von der realen Welt abhebt, ist die Existenz von uralter Magie, die die Gesellschaft schon immer durchdringt. Prinzipiell kann jeder das Zaubern erlernen, doch es erfordert viel Willenskraft, genauso wie jeder sich technischen Wissen aneignen kann, wenn er den nötigen Zugang zu Bildung besitzt. Zauber sind flüchtiger Natur, während Technologie kostspielige Einzelteile benötigt. Die industrielle Revolution, die in vollem Gange ist, vereinfacht den Alltag der Menschen und bringt Fortschritt, den jeder nutzen kann und der dauerhaft besteht. Magie und Technik stehen allerdings im Gegensatz - sie stören sich gegenseitig und nicht nur das Zaubern in Zügen oder Fabrikdistrikten ist schwierig und oft auch untersagt sondern Revolver und Dampfmaschinen haben in der Nähe von alten Wäldern und Magierakademien häufig Fehlfunktionen. Dieser Konflikt spiegelt sich auch in der Gesellschaft wider und Magier und Ingenieure liegen sich oft in den Haaren.

Die Existenz von Magie hat ebenfalls dazu geführt, dass es mehr als eine humanoide Rasse gibt, die sich zu einer Zivilisation weiter entwickelt hat: Neben dem Menschen, die den Großteil der Bevölkerung ausmachen, stammen Waldelfen aus Éire, Wüstenelfen aus Osmanien und Zwerge lebten ursprünglich unter Tage in den Alpen und anderen Gebirgen Zentraleuropas. Es existieren außerdem Chimären, Mischwesen aus Mensch und Tier, die als Helfer von slawischen Schwarzmagiern erschaffen wurden. Später wurde diese Praktik in anderen Ländern übernommen, so dass eine Vielzahl von Chimären entstanden sind. Manche von ihnen konnten sich fortpflanzen und es ist nicht selten, dass sie in abgelegenen Wäldern oder in den Slums verschiedener Städte frei geboren werden. Egal welcher Herkunft, Chimären haben einen niedrigen sozialen Status und es wird von der Gesellschaft in der Regel auf sie herabgesehen, was eine zusätzliche rollenspielerische Herausforderung darstellt.

 

Jede der 34 Fertigkeiten gehört zu einem von sechs primären Attributen. Diese sind Kraft, Ausdauer, Geschick, Bildung, Charisma und Wille. Für jeden Punkt im primären Attribut erhält ein Spieler einen sechsseitigen Würfel zum Werfen. Für jeden Punkt, den ein Charakter auf eine Fertigkeit besitzt, kann einer der sechsseitigen durch einen achtseitigen Würfel ausgetauscht werden. Gute oder schlechte Ausrüstung, Spezialisierungen, Zeitdruck oder Lichtverhältnisse sorgen dafür, dass weitere Würfel ausgetauscht werden dürfen. So kann ein Spieler auch zwölfseitige Würfel in seinem Pool erhalten, aber auch seine achtseitigen wieder durch sechseitige austauschen müssen. Mit dem Würfelpool muss der Spieler dann gleich oder höher einer vom Spielleiter gesetzten Schwelle würfeln, um eine Probe zu bestehen.

 

In SteaMage gibt es neben den vorgefertigten Beispielzaubern auch die Möglichkeit, sich seine eigenen Zauber zu entwickeln. Das gleiche gilt ebenfalls für Technologien: Es sind einige Beispielgeräte beschrieben, doch ein großer Punkt in SteaMage ist es, sich diese Technologien zu eigen zu machen, indem man sie modifiziert oder selber neue erfindet. Dazu stellen wir ein Baukastensystem zur Verfügung, aus dem die gewünschten Effekte herausgenommen werden und in einen Zauber oder ein Gerät eingefügt werden können. Der einzig limitierende Faktor sind Zeit und Erschöpfung, denn Zauber oder Technologien zu entwickeln ist sehr anstrengend. Da SteaMage in einem Fantasy und Steampunk Setting spielt, sind Erfindungen außerdem nicht an reale Physik gebunden und fliegende Städte sind ebenso denkbar wie dampfbetriebene Laufmaschinen.

 

Um uns zu unterstützen, ist eine kleine Auswahl an Perks verfügbar.

  • 10€ - A5 Print unserer Vorzeige-Elfin und unseres Vorzeige-Zwergs. (Auf 45 limitiert)
  • 15€ - Die PDF-Version des schwarzweißen Grundregelwerks mit farbigem Cover und farbiger Weltkarte.
  • 35€ - Die Printversion und die PDF-Version des Grundregelwerks.
  • 850€ - Deluxe Paket! Ihr erhaltet nicht nur Printversion sowie PDF-Version des Regelwerks sondern es kommt auch einer der Autoren zu euch, erstellt mit dir und deiner Gruppe Charaktere und leitet für euch ein One-Shot! (Auf 4 limitiert)

 

Wir haben eine Vielzahl von Add-Ons, die ihr zu den Perks dazu buchen könnt:

  • 5€ - Euer Name im Buch. Wenn ihr dieses Add-On auswählt, werdet ihr mit eurem Namen (oder ein beliebiges Pseudonym) als Unterstützer in einer Liste im Buch verewigt.
  • 10€ - Alle digitalen Zusatzinhalte. Mit diesem Perk erhaltet ihr alle PDFs und Bilder, die wir als Stretchgoals und zusätzlich zur Kampagne produzieren. 
  • 20€ - Eine in Handarbeit gealterte Weltkarte von SteaMage.
  • 100€ - Dein Charakter als NSC in einem Abenteuer! Schick uns einen von dir ausgearbeiteten Charakter mit Beschreibung und wir bauen ihn in Absprache mit dir in eines der Stretch-Goal Abenteuer ein! (Auf 4 limitiert)

  • 150€ - Eine Aquarellzeichnung deines Charakters! Unser Illustrator zeichnet dir deinen Charakter in Aquarell sowohl als Ganzkörperzeichnung als auch als Portrait.

 

Da wir ein flexibles Funding-Ziel haben, wollen wir euch schon vor erreichen des Hauptziels ein paar tolle Dinge anbieten:

  • 1000€ - Die Weltkarte von SteaMage als PDF zum selber drucken sowie als Desktop Hintergrund wird zusätzlich für alle Besitzer des "Digitale Zusatzinhalte"-Add-Ons verfügbar.
  • 3000€ - Ein zusätzliches Bonusabenteuer "Mord im Orient Express" wird zusätzlich für alle Besitzer des "Digitale Zusatzinhalte"-Add-Ons verfügbar.
  • 5000€ - Der Random-Character Generator, den wir zum Testen unseres Systems entwickelt haben und der zufällige Einsteigercharaktere ausspuckt wird für alle verfügbar. Gut für Gegner eurer eigenen Abenteuer und Kampagnen sowie als Inspiration für eure eigenen Charaktere.
  • 7000€ - Ein zusätzliches Bonusabenteuer "Der Grand Prix von Éire" wird zusätzlich für alle Besitzer des "Digitale Zusatzinhalte"-Add-Ons verfügbar.

Bei 8000€ sind alle Kosten für die Produktion der Printversion des Grundregelwerks und die Bezahlung von Illustration, Satz und Lektorat gedeckt! Jetzt können wir wie geplant und ohne Verzögerung mit der Produktion beginnen

  • 9000€ - 36 zusätzliche Beispielzauber und 36 zusätzliche Beispieltechnologien als PDF wird zusätzlich für alle Besitzer des "Digitale Zusatzinhalte"-Add-Ons verfügbar. Gleichzeitig wird "Von Dampfmaschinen und Magie" (ebendiese Zauber und Technologien als gedrucktes A5 Buch) als Perk und Add-On freigeschaltet.
  • 10000€ - SteaMage wird als Hörbuch produziert und ist dann als Perk und Add-On verfügbar.
  • 11000€ - Der offizielle SteaMage Spielleiterschirm wird als Perk und Add-On freigeschalten. Mit zusätzlicher, nie veröffentlichter Illustration auf 3 quadratischen Seiten als Cover, sowie nützlichen Spielleiterinfos im aufklappbaren Innenteil.
  • 13000€ - Die Kampagne "Elfen im Schwarzwald" wird zusätzlich für alle Besitzer des "Digitale Zusatzinhalte"-Add-Ons verfügbar.
  • 15000€ - ?
  • 17000€ - ?

 

Es existieren keine Risiken. SteaMage ist bereits komplett fertig und kann in den Druck, sobald das Geld aus dem Crowdfunding bei uns ankommt.

 

Auch ohne Geld könnt ihr unser Crowdfunding und SteaMage unterstützen: Schickt den Link zu unserer Kampagne an Freunde, Familie und Verwandte, teilt sie auf sozialen Netzwerken und Foren, in denen ihr aktiv seid!

Vielen Dank für eure Unterstützung!
story_txt:
SteaMage ist ein Pen & Paper Rollenspiel, in dem in einer Welt voller Magie die industrielle Revolution beginnt. Dieses Fantasy/Steampunk Crossover bietet neben einer detailreich ausgearbeiteten Welt auch mehrere, spielbare Fantasy Rassen.
Diese Rassen umfassen Menschen, Waldelfen, die nomadischen Wüstenelfen, Zwerge und sogenannte Chimären, Mischwesen aus Mensch und Tier.
Aus einem Baukastensystem kann sich jeder Spieler seine eigenen Zauber erstellen und seine eigenen Geräte und Technologien entwickeln. Zur Inspiration sind einige Beispielzauber und Beispieltechnologien vorhanden.
SteaMage wird  seit 2012 von den Freunden und ehemaligen Studienkollegen Tobias und Christopher entwickelt. Im Frühjahr 2019 kam mit dem Neuzugang des Teams bestehend aus Illustrator, Setzerin und Lektorin neuer Wind in die Segel.
Das selbstentwickelte Regelsystem ist einfach und intuitiv, gut geeignet für Einsteiger und erfahrene Rollenspieler gleichermaßen. Mathemagie hat im Voraus dafür gesorgt, dass es für alle fair ist.
Das Team achtet außerdem darauf, eine inklusive Welt zu gestalten und Diversität in den bereitgestellten Abenteuern sichtbar zu machen.
Im Kampagnenvideo wird alles nochmal im Detail erklärt, also seht es euch an!
 

Das Geld aus dem Crowdfunding wird benötigt um zum einen den Druck des Regelwerks zu bezahlen und zum anderen alle entstandenen Kosten zu decken. Hier könnt ihr eine Aufstellung der Kostenverteilung sehen:


Da wir ein flexibles Ziel eingestellt haben, wird euer Geld auf jeden Fall für den Druck des Regelwerks und die Bezahlung der Mitwirkenden verwendet. Selbst wenn das Ziel nicht erreicht wird, werden alle geplanten Zusatzinhalte produziert, allerdings erst nach und nach und in einem wesentlich gestreckteren Zeitplan.
 

Das Grundregelwerk enthält 144 Seiten voll mit detaillierten Beschreibungen der Welt von SteaMage, den fünf Rassen (Menschen, Zwergen, Waldelfen, Wüstenelfen und Chimären), den Regeln sowie zwei Beispielabenteuer. Wichtige Aspekte und Kapitel sind in schwarz/weiß illustriert, das Cover und die Weltkarte, die als Vorsatz enthalten ist, sind in Farbe.
 

SteaMage spielt in einer Welt, die vom Europa des viktorianischen Zeitalters inspiriert ist, doch Ländernamen und Landesgrenzen sind stark verschieden. Ein weiterer Punkt, in dem sich die Welt von SteaMage von der realen Welt abhebt, ist die Existenz von uralter Magie, die die Gesellschaft schon immer durchdringt. Prinzipiell kann jeder das Zaubern erlernen, doch es erfordert viel Willenskraft, genauso wie jeder sich technischen Wissen aneignen kann, wenn er den nötigen Zugang zu Bildung besitzt. Zauber sind flüchtiger Natur, während Technologie kostspielige Einzelteile benötigt. Die industrielle Revolution, die in vollem Gange ist, vereinfacht den Alltag der Menschen und bringt Fortschritt, den jeder nutzen kann und der dauerhaft besteht. Magie und Technik stehen allerdings im Gegensatz - sie stören sich gegenseitig und nicht nur das Zaubern in Zügen oder Fabrikdistrikten ist schwierig und oft auch untersagt sondern Revolver und Dampfmaschinen haben in der Nähe von alten Wäldern und Magierakademien häufig Fehlfunktionen. Dieser Konflikt spiegelt sich auch in der Gesellschaft wider und Magier und Ingenieure liegen sich oft in den Haaren.
Die Existenz von Magie hat ebenfalls dazu geführt, dass es mehr als eine humanoide Rasse gibt, die sich zu einer Zivilisation weiter entwickelt hat: Neben dem Menschen, die den Großteil der Bevölkerung ausmachen, stammen Waldelfen aus Éire, Wüstenelfen aus Osmanien und Zwerge lebten ursprünglich unter Tage in den Alpen und anderen Gebirgen Zentraleuropas. Es existieren außerdem Chimären, Mischwesen aus Mensch und Tier, die als Helfer von slawischen Schwarzmagiern erschaffen wurden. Später wurde diese Praktik in anderen Ländern übernommen, so dass eine Vielzahl von Chimären entstanden sind. Manche von ihnen konnten sich fortpflanzen und es ist nicht selten, dass sie in abgelegenen Wäldern oder in den Slums verschiedener Städte frei geboren werden. Egal welcher Herkunft, Chimären haben einen niedrigen sozialen Status und es wird von der Gesellschaft in der Regel auf sie herabgesehen, was eine zusätzliche rollenspielerische Herausforderung darstellt.
 

Jede der 34 Fertigkeiten gehört zu einem von sechs primären Attributen. Diese sind Kraft, Ausdauer, Geschick, Bildung, Charisma und Wille. Für jeden Punkt im primären Attribut erhält ein Spieler einen sechsseitigen Würfel zum Werfen. Für jeden Punkt, den ein Charakter auf eine Fertigkeit besitzt, kann einer der sechsseitigen durch einen achtseitigen Würfel ausgetauscht werden. Gute oder schlechte Ausrüstung, Spezialisierungen, Zeitdruck oder Lichtverhältnisse sorgen dafür, dass weitere Würfel ausgetauscht werden dürfen. So kann ein Spieler auch zwölfseitige Würfel in seinem Pool erhalten, aber auch seine achtseitigen wieder durch sechseitige austauschen müssen. Mit dem Würfelpool muss der Spieler dann gleich oder höher einer vom Spielleiter gesetzten Schwelle würfeln, um eine Probe zu bestehen.
 

In SteaMage gibt es neben den vorgefertigten Beispielzaubern auch die Möglichkeit, sich seine eigenen Zauber zu entwickeln. Das gleiche gilt ebenfalls für Technologien: Es sind einige Beispielgeräte beschrieben, doch ein großer Punkt in SteaMage ist es, sich diese Technologien zu eigen zu machen, indem man sie modifiziert oder selber neue erfindet. Dazu stellen wir ein Baukastensystem zur Verfügung, aus dem die gewünschten Effekte herausgenommen werden und in einen Zauber oder ein Gerät eingefügt werden können. Der einzig limitierende Faktor sind Zeit und Erschöpfung, denn Zauber oder Technologien zu entwickeln ist sehr anstrengend. Da SteaMage in einem Fantasy und Steampunk Setting spielt, sind Erfindungen außerdem nicht an reale Physik gebunden und fliegende Städte sind ebenso denkbar wie dampfbetriebene Laufmaschinen.
 

Um uns zu unterstützen, ist eine kleine Auswahl an Perks verfügbar.


10€ - A5 Print unserer Vorzeige-Elfin und unseres Vorzeige-Zwergs. (Auf 45 limitiert)
15€ - Die PDF-Version des schwarzweißen Grundregelwerks mit farbigem Cover und farbiger Weltkarte.
35€ - Die Printversion und die PDF-Version des Grundregelwerks.
850€ - Deluxe Paket! Ihr erhaltet nicht nur Printversion sowie PDF-Version des Regelwerks sondern es kommt auch einer der Autoren zu euch, erstellt mit dir und deiner Gruppe Charaktere und leitet für euch ein One-Shot! (Auf 4 limitiert)

 

Wir haben eine Vielzahl von Add-Ons, die ihr zu den Perks dazu buchen könnt:

5€ - Euer Name im Buch. Wenn ihr dieses Add-On auswählt, werdet ihr mit eurem Namen (oder ein beliebiges Pseudonym) als Unterstützer in einer Liste im Buch verewigt.
10€ - Alle digitalen Zusatzinhalte. Mit diesem Perk erhaltet ihr alle PDFs und Bilder, die wir als Stretchgoals und zusätzlich zur Kampagne produzieren. 
20€ - Eine in Handarbeit gealterte Weltkarte von SteaMage.
100€ - Dein Charakter als NSC in einem Abenteuer! Schick uns einen von dir ausgearbeiteten Charakter mit Beschreibung und wir bauen ihn in Absprache mit dir in eines der Stretch-Goal Abenteuer ein! (Auf 4 limitiert)


150€ - Eine Aquarellzeichnung deines Charakters! Unser Illustrator zeichnet dir deinen Charakter in Aquarell sowohl als Ganzkörperzeichnung als auch als Portrait.
 


Da wir ein flexibles Funding-Ziel haben, wollen wir euch schon vor erreichen des Hauptziels ein paar tolle Dinge anbieten:

1000€ - Die Weltkarte von SteaMage als PDF zum selber drucken sowie als Desktop Hintergrund wird zusätzlich für alle Besitzer des "Digitale Zusatzinhalte"-Add-Ons verfügbar.
3000€ - Ein zusätzliches Bonusabenteuer "Mord im Orient Express" wird zusätzlich für alle Besitzer des "Digitale Zusatzinhalte"-Add-Ons verfügbar.
5000€ - Der Random-Character Generator, den wir zum Testen unseres Systems entwickelt haben und der zufällige Einsteigercharaktere ausspuckt wird für alle verfügbar. Gut für Gegner eurer eigenen Abenteuer und Kampagnen sowie als Inspiration für eure eigenen Charaktere.
7000€ - Ein zusätzliches Bonusabenteuer "Der Grand Prix von Éire" wird zusätzlich für alle Besitzer des "Digitale Zusatzinhalte"-Add-Ons verfügbar.

Bei 8000€ sind alle Kosten für die Produktion der Printversion des Grundregelwerks und die Bezahlung von Illustration, Satz und Lektorat gedeckt! Jetzt können wir wie geplant und ohne Verzögerung mit der Produktion beginnen

9000€ - 36 zusätzliche Beispielzauber und 36 zusätzliche Beispieltechnologien als PDF wird zusätzlich für alle Besitzer des "Digitale Zusatzinhalte"-Add-Ons verfügbar. Gleichzeitig wird "Von Dampfmaschinen und Magie" (ebendiese Zauber und Technologien als gedrucktes A5 Buch) als Perk und Add-On freigeschaltet.
10000€ - SteaMage wird als Hörbuch produziert und ist dann als Perk und Add-On verfügbar.
11000€ - Der offizielle SteaMage Spielleiterschirm wird als Perk und Add-On freigeschalten. Mit zusätzlicher, nie veröffentlichter Illustration auf 3 quadratischen Seiten als Cover, sowie nützlichen Spielleiterinfos im aufklappbaren Innenteil.
13000€ - Die Kampagne "Elfen im Schwarzwald" wird zusätzlich für alle Besitzer des "Digitale Zusatzinhalte"-Add-Ons verfügbar.
15000€ - ?
17000€ - ?

 

Es existieren keine Risiken. SteaMage ist bereits komplett fertig und kann in den Druck, sobald das Geld aus dem Crowdfunding bei uns ankommt.
 
Auch ohne Geld könnt ihr unser Crowdfunding und SteaMage unterstützen: Schickt den Link zu unserer Kampagne an Freunde, Familie und Verwandte, teilt sie auf sozialen Netzwerken und Foren, in denen ihr aktiv seid!Vielen Dank für eure Unterstützung!

story:
Who are We and What We Propose.

I'm Mihai Irimescu, experienced game designer and Game Design Lecturer at The University of Architecture and Urban Planning in Bucharest. In partnership with my good old friend Patrick Moraras, fellow game designer and a passionate wood craftsman, I'm here today to present  a Four Walls, a board game that's Fun, Fast and Easy for all ages and for your family too.

This campaign is a vital milestone for us. It's our first venture into the world of board games where we intend to make a long career. Here where we can apply our knowledge of 20+ years in the video game industry.

Both Patrick and I have baby daughters. It was our life long dream to create a positive game, that can bring families and friends together, to foster this amazing feeling of warmth and fun with the dear ones. We wanted to design a game that is eco-friendly and safe for kids, as well as uses recyclable materials.

 

Why Support Four Walls?

Four Walls is a game like you never had before. A handcrafted wooden board game, a pleasure to play with, where you practically adjust your strategy after each roll of the dice. It was played and tested with our friends, kids and families (no joke!) while enjoying every moment. We tweaked the game until it was perfected and the rules were set in stone. This means that we have the game ready to be manufactured. It's done. No more development.

We are very excited to publish our first board game. If we get funded, it will help us start prototyping new board games that we have in store and to share our experiences with other people who want to create games. And last, but not least, this will help us produce Four Walls in as many copies as possible for all those who have faith in us.

 

What You Get is the Real Thing.

Funding Four Walls offers great value over money. Each time you play, there is a new situation you need to adapt your strategy to. Chance and Strategy go hand in hand and highlight one another. That's re-playability at its best. And when playing in 4 we guarantee that decisions will make you sweat, as 4 players need to find ways to cooperate between themselves while also  playing their individual best.

When you invest your money behind Four Walls you actually invest your faith in our 20+ years experience in video games design.

 

About the Craftsman

I'm Patrick Moraras, architect and designer. I have three years experience in creating and crafting educational games and objects for kids of all ages. Attention to details and aesthetic look are cornerstones in my workshop and Four Walls is no exception to this! You can see my body of work so far here: www.mormi.ro

 

Sharing is Caring

We appreciate your help in any way, even sharing our campaign. Thank You!

story:
Circles of Imora is an action packed, brand new and easy to learn 2Player Card Game. Construct an army for survival on Imora and strengthen your army with special boostercards. Game comes in a full playable deck of 100 cards. Are you ready to fight for your life on Imora?

- Edition available in English and German.

Circles of Imora is designed for 2 players (Age 13 and above), competting with their individually assembled armies. Each player is allowed to expand its deck up to 60 cards.

The game consists of successive, dependent fights. Each fight will take place in one of the 4 available skills. Additional bonus features can affect the game before, during or after a fight positively or negatively.

At the beginning of the game each player has 20 life points. After all the cards are played the final score decides who has won. If a player previously falls on 0 points he has lost the game immediately.

The cards refer to the eight nations and territories of the world of Imora. Each nation is associated with a colour and is given an individual symbol. This is designed to help with quick identification when playing.

In the seas, lakes and rivers, the climate is harsh. Lurking in the hidden depths are creatures of unimaginable danger.

For the inhabitants of the hemisphere the world of Imora looks no less dramatic. The sky darkens increasingly, the oxygen is scarce and food remains only for the privileged few.

On Imora there are numerous smaller and larger cities that serve as urban centers for part of the population. They are noisy, crowded and violent crime is abundant.

The sparsely vegetated areas on Imora - due to persistent overgrazing and a shortage of water, have become vast hostile deserts. Only the toughest creatures survive here.

In contrast to the other areas on Imora, the woodlands are still intact. The flora and species are numerous and offer many living beings protection. But beware, hiding in the shade of the trees are terrible inhabitants, willing to defend their habitat at any cost.

In the various areas of Imora countless animals live, with razor-shape teeth and perfect camouflage. Fighting in groups, the animals will feast on anyone incapable of defending themselves.

The machines come armed with cutting-edge technology practically in every area. They strive for domination over Imora and will fight for it to the bitter end.

As refugees of a destoried ancient world - people landed centuries ago on Imora and have been struggling to survive ever since.

Special cards can strengthen or defend your army during a fight. Also they can harm your enemy strongly. Choose your special cards wisely to give your self an advantage over your component.

The angel and devil symbols highlight the differentiate the good and evil characters. The life and damage points (+Life / -Damage ) are found next to these symbols.

Every nation has its different strengths and skills in the battle for Imora. The characters compete in the following skills:

It makes a difference whether a skill in attack or defense mode is used. The left digit signifies the attack strength, the right digit defense.

Bonus features can before, during or after a fight harm the enemy. They can also enhance the skills of the character, generate additional health points or affect the game in additional ways.

The Full Deck consists 80x playing cards of all occurring nations on Imora plus 20x Special Cards to strengthen your army.

 

Dominik Hanisch (CH) is the creator of Circles of Imora and owns his own company. He brings experience in product development, project management, marketing and business administration.

William Eardley (UK ) is the design head of Circles of Imora and has lived for several years in Switzerland. He has extensive expertise in web design, graphics and illustrations.

We also work with other professional graphic designers, illustrators and production companies to offer a great product for you to enjoy.

We've been working for over three years to invent, create, develop, design and test the game. Now we're ready for the roll out and it comes down to licence the illustrations, finish the look and feel and producing the game.

We wanted to put this project on Indiegogo because it's the fastest way for us to get the game into your hands and expand it as a community. We think this game is great and we need your help to finish it. So, if a world full of epic battles, is a world you want to live in, please back this project and help us build this game.

With best regards,

The Circles of Imora Team (Will and Dominik)

 

Risks and Challenges

Some of the pictures, characters and drawings in this campaign are drafts and may differ from the final product.
The cards will be printed by Cartamundi which also produce „Magic: The Gathering“, „Star Wars“ and many more well known card games. They are ready and guarantee the quality.

The biggest challenge for us would actually be if you blow us out of the water. That might could cause some delays. We're already working with our partners to make sure that no matter how many people pledge, everyone gets their Circles of Imora quickly after the campaign Ends.

 

As seen on

story:
Hey all, my name is Charalambos Kourouklaris, an artist and also the creator of the TATTOOink card deck

Being an artist and a card game player, I was inspired to create something different and unique, combining my passion for painting with ink and my love for skeletons and card games. Nearly a year ago, I started a creative journey that gave birth to a unique concept,''the TATTOOink Card Deck''. I’ve done the original paintings, by using  only tattoo ink on paper, a method I found truly fascinating and special. Who said that tattoo ink is to be used exclusively on skin?  After countless hours of work, I’m ready to present to you the final result of my project.

 

 

 Each deck consists of 54 top-quality finish poker size playing cards (310 gsm linen pocketed professional paper). The cards are very durable, with top-notch handling; the absolute best in quality on playing cards. Each card contains a black core layer centre to block light shining through.

 

https://ksr-ugc.imgix.net/assets/015/904/753/a3...

                               -walnut wood case-

 
 

                         -100 pages (21.5x14.5cm) 85 blank pages+15 illustrations-
 
 
 
  -All figures (prints or original), are printed or painted on 160gsm quality paper, 21x30(cm) dimensions-
 
SPECIAL THANKS to my friends Paschalis Panteli (camera) and Savvas Avraam (video editing), for helping me bringing this project to life. Check out Paschali's website, http://pa86ch.wixsite.com/paschalispanteli86, and support his amazing work! I would also like to thank ''So Far As I Know'' for their great music.
 
 

 

 

Risks and challenges

My initial challenge while working on this project was to present a truly unique concept, combining my love for tattoos and card games with my actual profession, painting. The big challenge was to present an authentic, honest, high quality final product to the market that is acceptable by many consumer groups like card gamers, tattooers, tattoo and art lovers and generally every one that will appreciate a handmade TATTOOink card deck. 
Finalizing the project, I had to face of course the challenge of production and since I wasn’t that familiar with that, I would like to thank my dear friend A. P. that truly help me to solve this issue introducing me to one of the best card deck production companies. I was also lucky enough to work with top notch professionals concerning the production of the wooden cases, the carton cases, the colouring notebooks and the printed paintings. 
Being honest I want to highlight that no matter how carefully and professionally I work and deal with this project, some risks might appear concerning, on time delivery and production delays. 
No matter what though, I am 100% confident that I can overcome any challenges and deliver the product ready and on time!
story_txt:
Hey all, my name is Charalambos Kourouklaris, an artist and also the creator of the TATTOOink card deckBeing an artist and a card game player, I was inspired to create something different and unique, combining my passion for painting with ink and my love for skeletons and card games. Nearly a year ago, I started a creative journey that gave birth to a unique concept,''the TATTOOink Card Deck''. I’ve done the original paintings, by using  only tattoo ink on paper, a method I found truly fascinating and special. Who said that tattoo ink is to be used exclusively on skin?  After countless hours of work, I’m ready to present to you the final result of my project.   Each deck consists of 54 top-quality finish poker size playing cards (310 gsm linen pocketed professional paper). The cards are very durable, with top-notch handling; the absolute best in quality on playing cards. Each card contains a black core layer centre to block light shining through. https://ksr-ugc.imgix.net/assets/015/904/753/a3...                               -walnut wood case-                           -100 pages (21.5x14.5cm) 85 blank pages+15 illustrations-     -All figures (prints or original), are printed or painted on 160gsm quality paper, 21x30(cm) dimensions- SPECIAL THANKS to my friends Paschalis Panteli (camera) and Savvas Avraam (video editing), for helping me bringing this project to life. Check out Paschali's website, http://pa86ch.wixsite.com/paschalispanteli86, and support his amazing work! I would also like to thank ''So Far As I Know'' for their great music.  
 
 
Risks and challenges
My initial challenge while working on this project was to present a truly unique concept, combining my love for tattoos and card games with my actual profession, painting. The big challenge was to present an authentic, honest, high quality final product to the market that is acceptable by many consumer groups like card gamers, tattooers, tattoo and art lovers and generally every one that will appreciate a handmade TATTOOink card deck. Finalizing the project, I had to face of course the challenge of production and since I wasn’t that familiar with that, I would like to thank my dear friend A. P. that truly help me to solve this issue introducing me to one of the best card deck production companies. I was also lucky enough to work with top notch professionals concerning the production of the wooden cases, the carton cases, the colouring notebooks and the printed paintings. Being honest I want to highlight that no matter how carefully and professionally I work and deal with this project, some risks might appear concerning, on time delivery and production delays. No matter what though, I am 100% confident that I can overcome any challenges and deliver the product ready and on time!

story:
A fun and interactive game for 1-4 players with 30-60 minutes of play time.

In Upkeep, your perfect and beautiful yard is being bombarded with unusual Autumn weather.  The stormy chaos is impacting the entire neighborhood, and each of your neighbors are struggling to cope.  Together or alone, and despite of the stormy weather, you intend do whatever it takes to return your yard to it's former glory.

Play with a group of friends, alone or cooperatively in this engaging and fun puzzle engine building game.  Upkeep combines beautiful artwork with a variety of mechanics to help you enjoy:

  • Very little downtime.  All players play at the same time.
  • Easily controlled difficulty.  Enjoy anything from Casual to Intense by adding or removing storms and calm weather cards.
  • 4 Unique and beautifully rendered yards provide variety to the eye and the game play.
  • Unique mechanics allow players to have their own distinct pattern of falling leaves, while still providing a balanced and strategic game flow.
  • A Special Casual (Cooperative) mode provides for a simpler game play for causal or players as young as 5-6 years old.

 

 

 

 

 

We are excited to offer Custom Friendly shipping to the following areas.

And discount shipping to most areas.  If you have any questions about a particular country that is not listed, please leave a comment, and we will see if we can get a better rate.

 

 

  • 100% Money back guarantee - If you decide Upkeep is not for you, simply return it for a full refund.   See our FAQ section for details.
  •  We Need Your Support - We believe in Upkeep, and have invested time and money into the development, art and design, but we need your help for manufacturing and fulfillment.  Without you we simply couldn't bring Upkeep to life.
  •  Suggestions and Input - We value your input and suggestions, and will always work hard to respond quickly to address concerns or questions.

 

Risks and challenges

Every project has its risks - there will always be issues and circumstances within and outside of our control that will occur during a project. However, we are dedicated to making sure this project is a success, and to that end have already completed most of the game artwork for Upkeep (except the artwork requiring backer resources), coordinated with Manufacturing and Fulfillment partners and enlisted other professionals who have experience with successful crowdfunding campaigns.

We have partnered with a high quality, reliable and well respected manufacturer of game components, and they have worked with us to provide realistic and achievable stretch goals and time frames that will minimize the time it takes to get the game to you.

We are also committed to being absolutely transparent about each step of the process and any challenges (as well as the successes) associated with it. We want you to be confident and enjoy the journey as much as we will. With the world struggling to manage the Covid-19 pandemic, we have been working extra hard to make sure timelines are realistic. We have added additional time for manufacturing, freight and fulfillment.

story:
Fantasy Fantasy Football

Fantasy Fantasy Football is the second game in the Fantasy Fantasy Sports series. We have an awesome base game with lots of exciting stretch goals to make your copy even better.

By acclaimed designers Daryl Andrews and J.R. Honeycutt, with art by Rob Lundy, Fantasy Fantasy Football transforms the fantasy football experience into just 10 minutes per player.

2-6 players; ages 10+, 20-60 minutes to play.

Please visit csegames.com for full details.
story_txt:
Fantasy Fantasy Football

Fantasy Fantasy Football is the second game in the Fantasy Fantasy Sports series. We have an awesome base game with lots of exciting stretch goals to make your copy even better.
By acclaimed designers Daryl Andrews and J.R. Honeycutt, with art by Rob Lundy, Fantasy Fantasy Football transforms the fantasy football experience into just 10 minutes per player.
2-6 players; ages 10+, 20-60 minutes to play.
Please visit csegames.com for full details.

story:
Climate Dice is storytelling dice game with a climate change theme.

A powerful tool to educate children about climate change and environmental issues, and to empower them to (RE)imagine an alternative better future where they can transform the climate crisis threats into new possibilities and opportunities for change. 

It's a great tool to talk to children about climate change, let them discuss their fears and hopes for a better world and address climate anxiety (eco-anxiety.

With every pledge, we will send a set of dice to you, and another set to schools in remote areas of the world,  to empower children to dream and (RE)imagine an alternative better future. A future they own and live, in peace and harmony with everyone on this planet!

After many months in the making, we have:

Designed an engaging and innovative storytelling dice game

Sourced reliable suppliers and eco-friendly and sustainable materials and Plastic Free packaging 

We know that young people are passionate about the environment, but they are also incredibly worried. Young people are worried about the impact that climate change will have on them when they are older.

Also, many young people don’t trust adults to be able to change things, and are very vocal about the fact that adults aren’t listening to their views.


We believe that a child’s imagination is a powerful tool in helping them to imagine an alternative, better future. Imagination can help a child to think about what they can do to improve things, giving them a positive mindset and a sense of control in their lives. If you can imagine it, you can achieve it.

That’s why we developed Climate Dice. These storytelling dice are a tool that provide  an opportunity to engage children on climate change issues, letting their imaginations explore without boundaries and providing them an opportunity to vocalise their thoughts and feelings.

Not only can the game be played among children, but when played with adults, it also gives young people a chance to voice their thoughts and feelings, whereas before they may feel too shy or intimidated to do so.

First off, we studied every aspect of Climate Dice to ensure the best possible sustainability practices were in place. From design through to the end of the product life-cycle, we ensured we limited waste and only ever used truly sustainable materials.

With that taken care of, we set about considering the different elements of the dice that were necessary for the game to be a success. 

We also wanted to simplify the game as much as possible, so there was no confusion as to what the different images on the dice were. Through extensive research we came up with the best combination of images possible. For example:

Through this simplicity, the game is accessible to young people of all ages and learning abilities. In order for change to happen, inclusivity in all levels of society is crucial.

 

 




 

The Climate Dice game can be played in many different ways, but at its simplest:

  • Throw the dice and tell your story using the illustrations on the faces of the dice and your imagination.
     
  • Players are in control of the story, and the conversation can go wherever their imagination takes them. There is no such thing as a bad story.
     
  • Each player can have their own story (with 6 dice) or players share a set of dice, take turn and gradually adding to the story, together.
     

We understand that sustainability education can be challenging, so we’ve created an educational model that makes it easier to translate complicated sustainability and social issues into entertaining engaging activities, using interactive language.

Our resources are designed to help children imagine an alternative, better future, showing how their daily choices affect the world around them and how they can make a difference through their decisions. Children love what we do because our dreams are closer to theirs, so we work with pupils who – like us – believe that anything that can be imagined is possible.

 

We have brought on-board ethical and reliable partners to make the perfect product. We  have had two rounds of prototypes and are thrilled with the quality and durability of the final production. With our supply chain tested and complete, the only missing element to the chain is you! 

If you believe in the power of imagination to improve children's futures, become a backer today. We have Rewards to suit all needs, including offers for distributors. The more backers we can secure, the more free dice sets we will be able to distribute to the schools in remote areas of the world.

Let's empower children to dream and reimagine a better future. A future they own and live in peace and harmony with everyone on this planet.

We believe we have achieved something amazing and we are very grateful to all the people who have made it possible for us to get here.

We also would welcome your support to spread the word and secure backers so we can turn the dream of Climate Dice into a reality. You can help us by spreading the word on social media. You can find us on all the main social channels @climatedice.

Risks and challenges

We’ve been working in sustainability and edutainment space for years and have been developing ClimateDice for a while. It has successfully completed the prototypes, pilot production process and beta testing of different dice size, different material and printing technologies with a diverse group of testers. We are completely confident that ClimateDice is now ready for mass production. With our current partner, we should be able to produce the sets sold on Kickstarter within 2-3 months after the campaign ends. However, we are well aware there’s always room for improvement, that is why we are still constantly receiving feedback from our testers, improving the product and exploring new ideas for adding new dice to the set as we go! If you have any questions or feedback, feel free to reach us

Reusability and recyclability

All materials used in Climate Dice (including package) are eco-friendly, and quite harmless for the environment, even if they end up in the landfill one day. Climate Dice are made of wood. Packaging is plastic free.

Sustainable materials

We are well aware of the problems caused by plastic. Every piece of plastic we consume stays in the environment for up to hundreds of years. So we've decided to eliminate plastic from our Storytelling Dice. For the very same reason Climate Dice is made of wood.
