story:
Website for Pied Raven Games & Hibernation

Online Store for Pied Raven Games & Hibernation

Watch the video above for a thorough explanation on the game

All who donate receive the Contributor Status perk.

CONCEPT

You’re a bear waking from Hibernation, slim & hungry. Time to prepare for next year’s big sleep. But alas, other bears in your surrounding ecosystem have become extremely competitive. You must race to gather as much of the available food as possible, while fending off foes along the way. To do this you will forage, frenzy, and even steal to stockpile your hoard of food. Better get going, winter will come fast.

 

OBJECTIVE

Hibernation is a Deck building game. Your Deck contains your means of finding FOOD. It starts out forlorn and bare, but you strive to make it a perfect library of FOOD collecting assets. Then, you eat your FOOD in proper portions to gain layers of fat.

The first one to achieve the 5 required layers of fat, via Hibernation tokens, gets to fall asleep - victorious!

 

CONTENTS

40 - FORAGE Cards (5 of each type)

28 - FOOD Cards (6 of each type & 1 of each type is a Damaged FOOD Card)

Cards will be printed on 300gsm Premium Quality Card Stock

1 - Fold-Out Rule Sheet

All contained in a compact, easy to travel with, tuck box.

REVIEWS

...what the Judges had to say (from participating in the Boston Festival of Indie Games 2016)...

"Love the theme. Smart take on a deck-builder."

"Having kids, I think that games that teach are far superior to teaching games, and this is a game that teaches."

"I've never played a game like this before, so it was refreshing."

 

ART

The art used in the game are digital collages of images altered and stylized with dreamy forest hues.

RISKS/CHALLENGES

The types of challenges I would face with this project are essentially production delays. I foresee most things going through without a hitch since all of the planning and designing has already occurred. The digital files are approved by the manufacturer, the packaging is planned and everything would simply await assembly and delivery (which will take months because of design verification, communication, pre-production, quality control, etc.). If there were a delay in this process, I would be sure to notify each backer, follower, and interested party. I would fully inform them of the issue, and establish a new date for the final production/shipment. If necessary, I would work with an alternate manufacturer, although I don't think that will be an issue. I have heard nothing but positive reviews about the current manufacturer. They have a stellar portfolio and have been excellent about communicating.

Additionally, the Flexible Goal is unique in that I do not need to reach my goal in order to receive the donated funds, but I assure all who donate, this project will persevere. If needed, I will be utilizing personal funds and seek investments to reach the final goal after the campaign has ended. It may cause a minor delay in production, but again, I would fully inform everyone of the issue and establish a new date for the final production/shipment. The donations made here allow me to create the game in a crowdfunding manner, giving back to those who donated with inexpensive cost and recognition.  Plus, you will have the game far before other consumers, as well as the great feeling of having donated to reach a larger goal!

story:
Chess has been a game that was part of our lives as we grew up. As long as we can remember, our parents enjoyed playing a game of chess with friends, while having a glass and telling stories.

Motivated by these memories, we decided to take a game that has been played for over 1500 years and create a set of uniquely crafted glass pieces that pay homage, but also add a new dimension to this iconic classic game. 

 

 

The process of developing the final chess pieces was as important to us as the result itself. From modern 3D printing, to an old school approach to glassmaking, our designs slowly progressed to a stage where we now partner with a factory that uses high precision technology to make our full set which requires no less than 72 simultaneous injection points. 

The result speaks for itself.

 

The Glass Knights are also a collection of the most refined shot glasses ever, that you can use to create a twist and a completely new playing experience, or simply flip the board over and you have yourself a tray of unique glass shots for your next party.

 

 

 

You asked yourself how come the drink doesn’t spill everywhere, right? We took care of that. The food grade silicone is placed on the end of the piece in less than a second and it creates a seal that ensures that not a single drop of your precious liquid escapes.

 

 

 

In addition to the fun element, we wanted to create a chess board that wouldn’t need to be hidden away when you’re not playing. 

Quite the opposite. In fact, we designed the Glass Knights board and pieces down to the most minute details so that you would be proud to display it in your living room or office.

Rest assured that almost every person walking in the room will stop and pick up the pieces.

 

 

We were ruthless in the engineering of each piece to add intricate details on the glass, while ensuring they are durable so you don’t have to worry about dropping them. That is why finding the right factory that could create such a quality piece of glass narrowed the search down to only a few that had the technology to manufacture the Glass Knights.

 

 

Aside from the visual aspect, we know just how important is the feel and the weight of each piece. The smooth surface of the glass and the intricate details, combined with just the right thickness, make from each piece an experience to play with.

 

 

 

The Glass Knights is created with kids in mind too! Aside from the fact that you don’t have to worry about your kids dropping the glass pieces because they are made from one tough tempered glass, the pieces can be filled with sweets or dried fruit. 

That will take their enjoyment of the game to the next level. The only downside may be that it’s your responsibility to go down to the store and get the tasty rewards. Once you’ve done that, you can have your free time while they play away!

 

Although we don’t recommend going around throwing your Glass Knight pieces, we did thousands of iterations and reiterations to create the ideal tempered glass that can be dropped and live to play another game. 

 

 

The Executive Set is the add on that can raise your game to the ultimate level.

We introduced the handcrafted wooden board that glows in the dark in a limited edition that will be capped at only 100 pieces. Each will have a unique serial number as proof of its authenticity.

If you decide to upgrade to the Executive Set, simply choose the appropriate reward level. The only thing left is for you to enjoy it. You deserve it.

 

 

When designing the Glass Knights, we wanted to go beyond any expectations from a normal chess piece set and make every element have at least one function.

That is exactly what we did with the thermoformed containers that house each glass piece, as well as double as ice cube trays.

Now with each full set, you will have 36 of the most unique ice cubes that are shaped as chess pieces! 

Getting the right dimension and weight is also something we looked closely at in order for you to feel the weight of each piece, while also ensuring the optimum thickness of the glass to make withstand pretty much all accidental drops from day to day scenarios.

story:
From humble beginnings your party must escape or perish in the dungeons of Durgesh prison. Survive and go on to the epic battles and mysteries in the lands of Phaya Nak! 

Players start with Level 0 characters, and advance as high as level 10 through 4 unique adventures and hours of play. Two additional bonus adventures have been unlocked and will also be included!

Phaya Nak: The Deep is a 5E compatible adventure that features: 

  • Over 150 full color pages of adventures
  • More than a dozen custom monsters, with illustrations
  • New spells
  • Unique treasure and experiences to build your character's back-stories with you
  • Alternate statistics for AD&D, AS&SH, DCC, and Magic Seekers
  • Custom character sheets for funnel (Level 0) characters in all rule sets
  • Detailed dungeon and wilderness adventure maps
  • Bonus side adventure in the lands of Theramour
  • Image files of key monsters and magic items to use in your Discord or other online virtual adventures

For supporters, we will also be announcing virtual sessions to play Phaya Nak with the author.

Custom Character Sheets

The first adventure in the series is what some rulesets call a "funnel" adventure, where characters start at Level 0. The Custom Character Sheet are for every rule set included in the module and are mini-character sheets, four to a page. You'll get one original in the book, and an additional four for your players! Not interested in a funnel adventure? The first adventure is just as easily playable at first level!

story:
This campaign should interest anyone who wants to make great-looking isometric maps (whether for their tabletop pen-and-paper RPG campaigns, or just as a fun creative outlet) and would like to use existing isometric assets (made by industry pros) to do so.

Did you know that there is a vast treasure trove of high-quality isometric mapping content freely available online, in the form of PNG assets from popular video/computer games? There are assets covering a wide variety of genres: modern day, near future, sci-fi, medieval, fantasy, cyberpunk, and more. 

Anyone with a LOT of time and patience can freely download these assets (they are not behind a paywall), and utilize them to make their own custom isometric maps, using their image editor of choice (Photoshop, GIMP, MapForge, Tiled, etc.).

The problem is that acquiring the assets is incredibly time-consuming and labor-intensive, since it involves manually loading and then downloading each individual asset (which requires manually editing each and every URL to get the full-resolution assets and avoid getting the asset in ".webp" format), and there are tens of thousands of assets.

It's a gargantuan task, and since I can't redistribute the asset collections directly (it's not my art),  I want to create an app that will automate all the asset downloading and store the assets on your hard drive. It will do the boring grunt work for you, saving each backer hundreds of hours of this painstakingly monotonous task.

This $5 app will be able to load Collection files (sold separately) which contain the download links for every asset in a Collection.  It will then proceed to iterate through this list of URLs until all the assets in the Collection have been downloaded, with a progress bar showing how far along it is in this task.

The app will work on Windows and on Macs. Linux users should be able to run the software using WINE or Virtual Box.

The Game Asset Collections offered

Via this Indiegogo campaign, I am offering five Game Asset Collection files (these are essentially databases of URLs pointing to image files) that will allow you to easily and quickly download the assets from the following isometric games, using the software that will be provided to all backers:

  •  Imperion (approx. 132 assets, sorted, $2.00)
  •  Settlers Online (approx. 1250 assets, sorted, $4.00)
  •  Forge of Empires (approx. 1740 assets, $4.00)
  •  Cityville (over 8660 assets, sorted, $23.00)
  •  Megapolis (over 15300 assets, $38.00)

As a general rule, pricing was determined as follows: $1 for every 400 assets, plus $1 if the collection is sorted (the artwork is organized into folders, for your convenience; this makes finding particular assets much easier and faster when you're making your maps).

 

Please watch the following videos (preferably in fullscreen mode, which is only possible when viewing on the YouTube site) in order to preview the assets contained in each collection. Because there are so many assets to preview, they go by pretty fast, but feel free to pause the videos anytime to get a better look at particular assets that interest you. Note that some assets will appear pixellated because they've been "upsized" to match the thumbnail size (don't worry, these assets look fine at actual size). Other assets are actually much higher resolution than what the videos show, since I can only show smallish thumbnails due to time constraints.

 Note that this first video covers two collections, Imperion and Settlers Online.

 
 
 

 

The various collections are available as Add-Ons to your pledge amount. Simply add the collection/s that you would like to your $5 base pledge. This will automatically increase the amount of your pledge by the cost of the Add-On/s you desire. If you would like all the assets from all the games (totaling well over 27000 assets), pledge for the "I Want Everything!" pledge level to receive a discount.

IMPORTANT! All of the assets offered in this campaign are strictly for Personal Use Only. They are not to be used commercially or included in published works (even free ones).

 

MapForge

Many of you may already have a preferred image editor, such as Photoshop or Gimp, for creating your maps. For those who find such programs to have too high of a learning curve, I suggest that you consider trying out my own MapForge map-making software, which is specifically tailored for map-making, provides a significantly lower learning curve, and offers support for isometric map-making with powerful and time-saving features. A slightly discounted MapForge license is available as an Add-On to your pledge, for those who would like one (but note that these are limited in quantity).

MapForge is map-making software that was successfully funded on Kickstarter in 2017. The program now boasts over 180 (!!!) content Add-Ons available for it from leading mapping-content providers. Twenty-one of these Add-Ons are specifically for isometric map-making.

For those new to MapForge, please visit the above links for more information about the software (it's simply too much information to repeat here). The FAQ for the original KS campaign is also a useful source of information.

The TL/DR version

MapForge is easy-to-use software for Windows and Mac OS that makes high-quality maps for printing, or for use in virtual tabletop software (e.g., Roll20, Fantasy Grounds, etc.).

Can be used for free (no license is required for low resolution output).

There are currently 47 free mapping content Add-Ons for MapForge (~2 GB), and many more free Add-Ons are on the way, thanks to this Patreon campaign.

You can download and try the software out for yourself, to evaluate it and see if the program is what you want/expect it to be.

I'll be posting videos in this campaign's Updates to show examples of the sorts of maps you can make with the assets being offered, and will be using MapForge for this.

Closing Thoughts

Whether or not you choose to make a pledge to this campaign, I would greatly appreciate it if you could mention this project to friends or family members who might be interested. I've made it easy to do so; just click on one of the buttons below. Help spread the word far and wide.

Last but not least, I'd love it if you would follow Battlegrounds Games on any or all of these social media sites, so you can stay apprised of all the latest news and developments. And consider signing up to the MapForge mailing list.

Follow Battlegrounds on                      Facebook             Twitter             Pinterest

Thank you for checking out this campaign!

Risks & Challenges

All rewards for this project are digital downloads, so shipping is neither a factor nor an added expense. Battlegrounds Games has over 17 years of experience developing and distributing software and other digital content. I will be using Google Drive to host/distribute the rewards, which provides a very robust and speedy delivery method with no bandwidth limits. All but one of my many prior crowdfunding campaigns have delivered on time, and in several cases earlier than expected.
story_txt:
This campaign should interest anyone who wants to make great-looking isometric maps (whether for their tabletop pen-and-paper RPG campaigns, or just as a fun creative outlet) and would like to use existing isometric assets (made by industry pros) to do so.
Did you know that there is a vast treasure trove of high-quality isometric mapping content freely available online, in the form of PNG assets from popular video/computer games? There are assets covering a wide variety of genres: modern day, near future, sci-fi, medieval, fantasy, cyberpunk, and more. 
Anyone with a LOT of time and patience can freely download these assets (they are not behind a paywall), and utilize them to make their own custom isometric maps, using their image editor of choice (Photoshop, GIMP, MapForge, Tiled, etc.).
The problem is that acquiring the assets is incredibly time-consuming and labor-intensive, since it involves manually loading and then downloading each individual asset (which requires manually editing each and every URL to get the full-resolution assets and avoid getting the asset in ".webp" format), and there are tens of thousands of assets.
It's a gargantuan task, and since I can't redistribute the asset collections directly (it's not my art),  I want to create an app that will automate all the asset downloading and store the assets on your hard drive. It will do the boring grunt work for you, saving each backer hundreds of hours of this painstakingly monotonous task.
This $5 app will be able to load Collection files (sold separately) which contain the download links for every asset in a Collection.  It will then proceed to iterate through this list of URLs until all the assets in the Collection have been downloaded, with a progress bar showing how far along it is in this task.
The app will work on Windows and on Macs. Linux users should be able to run the software using WINE or Virtual Box.
The Game Asset Collections offered
Via this Indiegogo campaign, I am offering five Game Asset Collection files (these are essentially databases of URLs pointing to image files) that will allow you to easily and quickly download the assets from the following isometric games, using the software that will be provided to all backers:

 Imperion (approx. 132 assets, sorted, $2.00)
 Settlers Online (approx. 1250 assets, sorted, $4.00)
 Forge of Empires (approx. 1740 assets, $4.00)
 Cityville (over 8660 assets, sorted, $23.00)
 Megapolis (over 15300 assets, $38.00)

As a general rule, pricing was determined as follows: $1 for every 400 assets, plus $1 if the collection is sorted (the artwork is organized into folders, for your convenience; this makes finding particular assets much easier and faster when you're making your maps). Please watch the following videos (preferably in fullscreen mode, which is only possible when viewing on the YouTube site) in order to preview the assets contained in each collection. Because there are so many assets to preview, they go by pretty fast, but feel free to pause the videos anytime to get a better look at particular assets that interest you. Note that some assets will appear pixellated because they've been "upsized" to match the thumbnail size (don't worry, these assets look fine at actual size). Other assets are actually much higher resolution than what the videos show, since I can only show smallish thumbnails due to time constraints.

 Note that this first video covers two collections, Imperion and Settlers Online.

 

 

 


 

The various collections are available as Add-Ons to your pledge amount. Simply add the collection/s that you would like to your $5 base pledge. This will automatically increase the amount of your pledge by the cost of the Add-On/s you desire. If you would like all the assets from all the games (totaling well over 27000 assets), pledge for the "I Want Everything!" pledge level to receive a discount.
IMPORTANT! All of the assets offered in this campaign are strictly for Personal Use Only. They are not to be used commercially or included in published works (even free ones).
 

MapForge
Many of you may already have a preferred image editor, such as Photoshop or Gimp, for creating your maps. For those who find such programs to have too high of a learning curve, I suggest that you consider trying out my own MapForge map-making software, which is specifically tailored for map-making, provides a significantly lower learning curve, and offers support for isometric map-making with powerful and time-saving features. A slightly discounted MapForge license is available as an Add-On to your pledge, for those who would like one (but note that these are limited in quantity).
MapForge is map-making software that was successfully funded on Kickstarter in 2017. The program now boasts over 180 (!!!) content Add-Ons available for it from leading mapping-content providers. Twenty-one of these Add-Ons are specifically for isometric map-making.
For those new to MapForge, please visit the above links for more information about the software (it's simply too much information to repeat here). The FAQ for the original KS campaign is also a useful source of information.
The TL/DR version
MapForge is easy-to-use software for Windows and Mac OS that makes high-quality maps for printing, or for use in virtual tabletop software (e.g., Roll20, Fantasy Grounds, etc.).
Can be used for free (no license is required for low resolution output).
There are currently 47 free mapping content Add-Ons for MapForge (~2 GB), and many more free Add-Ons are on the way, thanks to this Patreon campaign.
You can download and try the software out for yourself, to evaluate it and see if the program is what you want/expect it to be.
I'll be posting videos in this campaign's Updates to show examples of the sorts of maps you can make with the assets being offered, and will be using MapForge for this.

Closing Thoughts
Whether or not you choose to make a pledge to this campaign, I would greatly appreciate it if you could mention this project to friends or family members who might be interested. I've made it easy to do so; just click on one of the buttons below. Help spread the word far and wide.


Last but not least, I'd love it if you would follow Battlegrounds Games on any or all of these social media sites, so you can stay apprised of all the latest news and developments. And consider signing up to the MapForge mailing list.

Follow Battlegrounds on                      Facebook             Twitter             Pinterest
Thank you for checking out this campaign!

All rewards for this project are digital downloads, so shipping is neither a factor nor an added expense. Battlegrounds Games has over 17 years of experience developing and distributing software and other digital content. I will be using Google Drive to host/distribute the rewards, which provides a very robust and speedy delivery method with no bandwidth limits. All but one of my many prior crowdfunding campaigns have delivered on time, and in several cases earlier than expected.

story:
Is your kid not interested in learning chess? Behind a screen the whole time? Well, now it's time to change that. 
CrocoChess is designed to catch the interest of children as young as 3. 

 

CrocoChess, the fun, crocodile invaded game to learn chess.

CrocoChess is:

Educational – CrocoChess makes younger (3-7) children excited about chess. CrocoChess serves as an introduction to chess in 2 phases: first CrocoChess Junior, then CrocoChess Dice.

New – CrocoChess is the 1st chess game that introduces a toy to the chess game, also the 1st chess game that makes chess attractive for kids as young as 3 year old.

Real – Parents who worry their child is behind a screen all day, don't need to worry anymore. CrocoChess is a real, physical board game, made to have fun together.

 

 

 

Throw the dice and watch out for Mr. Croco. You can start learning chess the fun way. 

Players take turns throwing the dice, will it be Undercover Agent, Turn the board or ..? Watch out for Mr. Croco, when he snaps you have to sacrifice a piece. The CrocoCards deck is made up of cards that instruct the game of chess itself in an easy way.

 

The game gets more and more intense, each time Mr. Croco snaps, unexpected moves as Turn the board makes the game exciting until the last move.

 

The game was created by Christiaan (7) & Matthias (5) and further developed thanks to our beta testers Vincent Goutorovitch and family + Jody Rider and family. We think this game combines all the things we love about Mr. Croco, and put together this Indiegogo campaign because we can't build this without you.

So if you like games, if you are into crocodiles, or if you like to teach your children chess, please help us make this game a reality.  We think you'll love it as much as we do.

Regards, 

-Mr. Croco

 

How it works

1) CrocoChess Junior (3-5 years).
Watch out for Mr. Croco and reach the other side 1st!
Children learn about movement, strategy, different strengths and defending of the pieces.

2) CrocoChess Dice (5-7 years)
The dice adds variation as Undercover Agent, Skip a move, and Turn the board.
Checkmate is introduced.

The game is 
✓    kid and  beginner friendly
✓    super fun and easy to learn
✓    exciting until the last move, guaranteed

 

The game rules will be available in the following languages: 

✓ 

✓

✓

✓
 

HELP US BUILD THIS GAME
We wanted to put this project on Indiegogo because it's the fastest way for us to get the game into your hands and make improvements as a community.  We think this game is great, but we need your help making it even better.

So if you like games, if you are into crocodiles, or if you like to teach your children chess,  please back this project and help us build this game. 


With Croco love,

-The CrocoChess Team  (Matthias, Christiaan, Geraldine, Vincent, Jody, Sèmy, Constantijn, Imy, Gerardo, Mahafuz, Laurens)

 

For more information about the game: CrocoChess

Follow us on:  Instagram Facebook Twitter

Music: Bensound

 

Risks and challenges


Production of the game is simple: apart from the manuals, dice and packaging, it's a relatively straightforward product to make. We've selected the best manufacturers and shipping partner to dropship directly from China, making the supply chain as lean as possible. The biggest challenge for us is to get the different SKU's in the box, ready for shipping. Our sourcing agent in China will ensure all units will be shipped according to plan and will perform the necessary quality control. Our partners in China are big enough to make sure that no matter how many people pledge, everyone will get their CrocoChess copy. If you back this project, we want to be sure you can start playing CrocoChess the way we envisioned it.

This is why (for now) we're not offering different versions, t-shirts or complicated reward tiers that would make the distribution process take a lot longer and make it much more complex to ship. As Henry Ford once said: “A customer can have a car painted any color he wants as long as it’s black".

This is why we're not making any promises on delivery pronto, pronto we can't keep, we would like to assess feedback we receive from you first, improve the game where possible. We're keeping it as simple as possible: support our project and in return, we'll send you the coolest chess game ever!


Expected cost structure

Thank you!

 

A personal note..I'm deeply grateful for all the help I've received, developing this game. I can't mention everyone, but I'll have a go at it: Pika, for all your help and mentorship, the one I will remember: 'While the smart men think, the stupid ones cross the river.' Imy, you are an inspiring man and you've taught me so much about life. I will never forget the 3 pillars of life: 'Prosperity, Health, Happiness'.  Gerardo, thank you, my dear friend, I will never forget: 'Focus, focus, focus!' :). Vivek, thanks for your help improving my pitch. Geraldine, thanks for all your support, smart thinking and staying with me, even though I'm so demanding. Jody, for all your help calling companies. Eddie, thanks for your amazing contribution, and no, I will definitely not lose the fire! Zain, thanks for your amazing design work. Loinda, where would I be without you? :) The rest of the team, working day and night to make CrocoChess into a success, you're the best!

David and Jasvir of FactorForty, my second home, you have the gratitude of a loyal sparrow! Michael Zick, thank you for taking the time to coach me, cold calling is a piece of cake now. :) I still have the bottle of nice Bordeaux to drink in The Hague. Zua of IFAA! I turned Amsterdam upside down to find the best accountant, you're the man. Sèmy and Constantijn, for supporting me in the early days of the new venture, I wanted to give up, but you gave me the courage to continue, forever friends! Klaas, my last Coconut client, thanks for designing the first demo board prototype and never stop believing in my skills...you kept me afloat in difficult times. Martinus, Mike, Appsterdam led to more than I could anticipate: friendship! Thanks for supporting me in this entrepreneurial journey. My friends and family who believe in me, especially Saskia, this couldn't happen without you. My boys Christiaan and Matthias, you are teaching me a lot, don't beat me with chess too often.

The growing community of CrocoChess, especially the First50, thanks! Believing in something is hard when it's still in seed phase, I know, thanks for your support! 

Last but not least, my light, 10 years together on launch date, Friday May 11....You always serve as my greatest criticaster, if I can convince you, I can convince the world!

-Laurens

story:
Anti-stress relaxing puzzle for adults and children!

You need to combine all the colored small balls with the appropriate colored cells on a large ball and when the toy is assembled - the white cell remains empty.

It is made of ABC high-quality & hypoallergenic plastic and absolutely safe for children!

Ball shaped & comfortable grip for the hands!

The excellent gift for adults and children!

It perfectly develops children's motor skills and mentality!

 

Compact size and light weight!

 

The perfect toy and genuine relaxant will bring a lot of fun into your life!

story:
We’re a team of three creatives with big ideas for the minis market.

Our mission is to offer you new epic 28mm scale miniature figurine Battle Packs as fast as possible through these crowdfunding campaigns. Our much loved Enemy Minions Battle Pack received such positive feedback from the community that we’ve designed the new Enemy Champions Battle Pack.

This Champions Battle Pack includes 12 large 2" base miniature figurines. Packaged in our custom foam padded carry case your minis will be delivered safely to your doorstep. 

With your support we can begin manufacturing and get the set to you as soon as possible.

We appreciate your continued support on our quest to bring you epic new minis!

 

The Origin Miniatures Team,

Adam, Shaunna and Carlos

We offer FREE STANDARD SHIPPING in the US and Canada. Shipments of The Enemy Champions Battle Pack are currently made in the US & CANADA only. We do not ship to other countries.

WHAT'S INCLUDED IN THE ENEMY CHAMPIONS BATTLE PACK?

 

 

 

⚔️  12 LARGE 2” BASE ENEMY CHAMPIONS - Lead your minions into battle with these 12 highly-detailed Enemy Champion miniatures. 

 

⚔️  DURABLE & 100% RECYCLABLE PLASTIC ♻️  - The models are made from 100% recyclable PPS engineering grade plastic. Designed with the highest level of detail possible at a 28mm scale. Strong enough to withstand hours upon hours of adventures.

 

⚔️  PREASSEMBLED & READY TO PAINT - These unpainted figurines come to you slate gray. Their surface readily bonds with primers so you’ll be painting in no time. Unleash your creativity and paint your own unique characters.

 

⚔️  READY FOR TABLETOP BATTLES - Their large 2” bases conform with official battle grid game mats as well as dungeon tiles. Their scale allows them to be used with other popular miniatures. 

 

⚔️  PREMIUM PROTECTIVE CASE - Your minis will be well taken care of during transit and storage in our foam padded deluxe case. Each fantasy character has its own comfy compartment ensuring that your paint job remains flawless.

 

PERFECT SIZE AND CONSTRUCTED FOR EPIC BATTLES!

Feel the tension brewing on the battlefield with these realistic minis. Our characters are at a 28mm scale, large enough for beautiful detail. With 2" bases they are perfect for official battle mats or dungeon tiles.

 

DESIGNED FOR PAINTING

Ideal for painting enthusiasts and beginners alike. The plastic-injected models bond easily with brand name primers. Customize your characters and enjoy expanding upon your painting skills and impress your friends with these unique characters.

SPIDER QUEEN

The Spider Queen is pure evil. She has a penchant for piercing the hearts of those transfixed by her fair yet monstrous form. She's spiteful and sadistic to her core, with a callous lack of regard for life - even when it comes to her own kind.

 

WRAITH LORD

Although sensitive to sunlight, the Wraith Lord's incorporeal nature makes it nearly impervious to most physical attacks. Its repugnance to purity rolls off of it in a thick, dark miasma that makes it hard for the living to heal if they're caught.

It takes pleasure in transforming opponents of pure heart into paragons of darkness through Specter Manifest. Only those armed with magic & silver survive an encounter.

 

RAVENFOLK MASTER

​Stealthy and deceptive, what this mysterious trickster lacks in physical strength, he more than makes up for with intelligence and cunning. As an expert at espionage, the Ravenfolk Master can be a formidable foe or... a valuable ally. 

 

VAMPIRE LORD

Once a lowly street urchin, pick pocketing for enough copper to secure an occasional hot meal in the town tavern, he threw himself in front of the Vampire King's caravan and pledged his eternal loyalty if only he might live a better life. As a Vampire Lord, he fights viciously to protect his new status and will stop at nothing to obtain more gold, more territory and more servants. 

 

LIZARD KING

Stand back! You don't want to be at the end of the Lizard King's ritual axe. Venture too far into his territory, and you might make a great feast for his hungry tribe. These Lizardfolk have developed a voracious appetite for humanoid flesh, and prisoners are the perfect entree.

 

BANDIT CAPTAIN

The Bandit Captain is guileful and wily. He won't hesitate to lie, cheat, or steal to get his way, but his crew believes his heart is made of gold. His boisterous personality has earned him quite the reputation around town.

 

GNOLL PACK LEADER

The Gnoll Pack Leader has no semblance of a conscience. His pillaging pack attacks seemingly randomly with a frightening frenzy that could be likened to locusts. Under his orders, they leave nothing behind but flattened fields, burned buildings, and gnawed dead.

 

ORC WARCHIEF

Revered among his own kind for his brutality on the battlefield, the Orc Warchief leads his warband with ruthless bloodlust. His savage subordinates have but a single goal in mind: domination of the realm and death to all inferior races.

 

ALPHA WEREWOLF

He may be fluffy, but he's NOT friendly! Other werewolves cower under his command. The Alpha Werewolf's keen hearing and smell make him a perceptive predator, and he rips and tears his prey apart ferociously.

 

BUGBEAR WARLORD

This powerful master of mayhem intimidates weaker bugbears and enemies alike. The Bugbear Warlord loves carnage. There is little loyalty among the not-so-merry band he leads, but they will fight fiercely in hopes of attaining glory in the afterlife. 

 

YOUNG BLACK DRAGON

By land or by boat, you can't escape it. The Young Black Dragon delights in cruelty, and excels at swallowing up unwary visitors to the dark, damp forest that shelters its growing hoard.

 

SKELETAL MINOTAUR

Dare to enter its labyrinth and it will awaken in an instant. The Skeletal Minotaur takes the shortest path towards its targets with a simpleminded desire to extinguish all life. It is silent, but for the sound of its creaking bones and clanking armor.

 

DIGITAL CONTENT WILL BE AVAILABLE AS DOWNLOADABLE FILES

 

THE ENEMY CHAMPIONS PAINTING GUIDE

Hit the ground running and don't let a creative block stop you from having fun painting your new minis.

You'll receive the digital download of our Painting Guide. This comprehensive guide demonstrates the way our artist envisioned each of the 12 characters looking in full color, front & back!

 

CHARACTER STATS & LOOT CARDS

Bring your champions to life! The custom character stats and loot cards take the miniatures to a whole new level. Seamlessly incorporate them into any encounter. You'll gain access to the digital download of the cards of all 12 characters. Optimised for mobile phones it'll be a breeze to use during gameplay.  

 

CHARACTER STATS CARD EXAMPLE

 

CHARACTER LOOT CARD EXAMPLE

3D PRINT YOUR OWN ENEMY CHAMPIONS!

Gain exclusive access to the STL files of our Enemy Champions. It's the perfect reason to get that 3D printer you've had your eyes on :)

 

Note: The license allows you to print the STL files for personal, non-commercial use only. The files come without supports.

1. THANKS FOR SUPPORTING US! ($1)

Thanks for supporting our campaign! You'll gain access to backer only updates and be able to follow the project from start to finish.

 

2. STL FILES & DIGITAL CONTENT ($25)

The Digital Download of the STL Files of all the Enemy Champions Miniatures, Painting Guide, Stats & Loot Cards.

 

3. BATTLE PACK ($55)

Includes one set of the Enemy Champions Battle Pack, Digital Download of the Painting Guide, Stats & Loot Cards.

 

4. BATTLE PACK & STL FILES ($70)

Includes one set of the Enemy Champions Battle Pack. Digital Download of the STL Files, Painting Guide, Stats & Loot Cards, 

ONE STEP BEFORE MOULD CREATION. YOUR MINIS ARE READY TO GO!

The miniatures have already been professionally 3D printed and prepped to be used to create the stainless steel moulds. Our manufacturer is waiting for confirmation to begin production. With your support we can start producing the Enemy Champions.  

 

What better way is there to captivate your imagination than adventuring with friends through limitless fantasy worlds filled with magic and adventure?

Do you remember the exhilarating feeling when you watched your first epic fantasy film or turned the last page of a fantasy novel that you happened across?

We created Origin Miniatures for anyone who loves escaping into the world of fantasy. Whether it be a brief respite or a fully fledged campaign that spans an entire year. Our miniatures are a tool to spark your creativity, free your imagination and encourage you to create unique adventures to share with friends and family.

Our small US based business focuses on creating unique and highly detailed miniatures that bring your encounters to life!

 

We would like to thank the incredibly talented digital sculptor Sebastiano Di Grazia who modelled these Enemy Champions Miniatures as well as our Enemy Minions Miniatures. We appreciate your dedication and hard work throughout the project. Visit his store to see more of his amazing miniature figurine STLs. Click here to see his miniatures.

Having successfully funded and launched our Enemy Minions Battle Pack we are continually improving our manufacturing, fulfilment, and distribution process.

There are a lot of moving parts with crowdfunding campaigns, and timing is often one of the biggest obstacles, especially for smaller businesses such as ourselves. You can expect a production & delivery time of around 3-4 months. 

Fortunately, with our strong relationships with industry leading manufacturers and leveraging the Amazon Fulfilment Network, our campaigns will move along as smoothly as possible. Rest assured we'll manufacture your minis to the highest quality possible and deliver them to you safely. 

  • Get your Enemy Champions faster by helping to spread the word about this campaign.
  • Share this campaign on social media.
  • You can also use the official Indiegogo social sharing tools at the top of this page. 

Thanks for your support :)

We're excited to begin manufacturing your minis and get them to you asap!
story_txt:
We’re a team of three creatives with big ideas for the minis market.
Our mission is to offer you new epic 28mm scale miniature figurine Battle Packs as fast as possible through these crowdfunding campaigns. Our much loved Enemy Minions Battle Pack received such positive feedback from the community that we’ve designed the new Enemy Champions Battle Pack.
This Champions Battle Pack includes 12 large 2" base miniature figurines. Packaged in our custom foam padded carry case your minis will be delivered safely to your doorstep. 
With your support we can begin manufacturing and get the set to you as soon as possible.
We appreciate your continued support on our quest to bring you epic new minis!
 
The Origin Miniatures Team,
Adam, Shaunna and Carlos

We offer FREE STANDARD SHIPPING in the US and Canada. Shipments of The Enemy Champions Battle Pack are currently made in the US & CANADA only. We do not ship to other countries.
WHAT'S INCLUDED IN THE ENEMY CHAMPIONS BATTLE PACK?
 

 

 
⚔️  12 LARGE 2” BASE ENEMY CHAMPIONS - Lead your minions into battle with these 12 highly-detailed Enemy Champion miniatures. 
 
⚔️  DURABLE & 100% RECYCLABLE PLASTIC ♻️  - The models are made from 100% recyclable PPS engineering grade plastic. Designed with the highest level of detail possible at a 28mm scale. Strong enough to withstand hours upon hours of adventures.
 
⚔️  PREASSEMBLED & READY TO PAINT - These unpainted figurines come to you slate gray. Their surface readily bonds with primers so you’ll be painting in no time. Unleash your creativity and paint your own unique characters.
 
⚔️  READY FOR TABLETOP BATTLES - Their large 2” bases conform with official battle grid game mats as well as dungeon tiles. Their scale allows them to be used with other popular miniatures. 
 
⚔️  PREMIUM PROTECTIVE CASE - Your minis will be well taken care of during transit and storage in our foam padded deluxe case. Each fantasy character has its own comfy compartment ensuring that your paint job remains flawless.

 

PERFECT SIZE AND CONSTRUCTED FOR EPIC BATTLES!
Feel the tension brewing on the battlefield with these realistic minis. Our characters are at a 28mm scale, large enough for beautiful detail. With 2" bases they are perfect for official battle mats or dungeon tiles.
 
DESIGNED FOR PAINTING
Ideal for painting enthusiasts and beginners alike. The plastic-injected models bond easily with brand name primers. Customize your characters and enjoy expanding upon your painting skills and impress your friends with these unique characters.


SPIDER QUEEN
The Spider Queen is pure evil. She has a penchant for piercing the hearts of those transfixed by her fair yet monstrous form. She's spiteful and sadistic to her core, with a callous lack of regard for life - even when it comes to her own kind.


 
WRAITH LORD
Although sensitive to sunlight, the Wraith Lord's incorporeal nature makes it nearly impervious to most physical attacks. Its repugnance to purity rolls off of it in a thick, dark miasma that makes it hard for the living to heal if they're caught.
It takes pleasure in transforming opponents of pure heart into paragons of darkness through Specter Manifest. Only those armed with magic & silver survive an encounter.


 
RAVENFOLK MASTER
​Stealthy and deceptive, what this mysterious trickster lacks in physical strength, he more than makes up for with intelligence and cunning. As an expert at espionage, the Ravenfolk Master can be a formidable foe or... a valuable ally. 

 
VAMPIRE LORD
Once a lowly street urchin, pick pocketing for enough copper to secure an occasional hot meal in the town tavern, he threw himself in front of the Vampire King's caravan and pledged his eternal loyalty if only he might live a better life. As a Vampire Lord, he fights viciously to protect his new status and will stop at nothing to obtain more gold, more territory and more servants. 

 
LIZARD KING
Stand back! You don't want to be at the end of the Lizard King's ritual axe. Venture too far into his territory, and you might make a great feast for his hungry tribe. These Lizardfolk have developed a voracious appetite for humanoid flesh, and prisoners are the perfect entree.

 
BANDIT CAPTAIN
The Bandit Captain is guileful and wily. He won't hesitate to lie, cheat, or steal to get his way, but his crew believes his heart is made of gold. His boisterous personality has earned him quite the reputation around town.

 
GNOLL PACK LEADER
The Gnoll Pack Leader has no semblance of a conscience. His pillaging pack attacks seemingly randomly with a frightening frenzy that could be likened to locusts. Under his orders, they leave nothing behind but flattened fields, burned buildings, and gnawed dead.

 
ORC WARCHIEF
Revered among his own kind for his brutality on the battlefield, the Orc Warchief leads his warband with ruthless bloodlust. His savage subordinates have but a single goal in mind: domination of the realm and death to all inferior races.

 
ALPHA WEREWOLF
He may be fluffy, but he's NOT friendly! Other werewolves cower under his command. The Alpha Werewolf's keen hearing and smell make him a perceptive predator, and he rips and tears his prey apart ferociously.

 
BUGBEAR WARLORD
This powerful master of mayhem intimidates weaker bugbears and enemies alike. The Bugbear Warlord loves carnage. There is little loyalty among the not-so-merry band he leads, but they will fight fiercely in hopes of attaining glory in the afterlife. 

 
YOUNG BLACK DRAGON
By land or by boat, you can't escape it. The Young Black Dragon delights in cruelty, and excels at swallowing up unwary visitors to the dark, damp forest that shelters its growing hoard.

 
SKELETAL MINOTAUR
Dare to enter its labyrinth and it will awaken in an instant. The Skeletal Minotaur takes the shortest path towards its targets with a simpleminded desire to extinguish all life. It is silent, but for the sound of its creaking bones and clanking armor.

 

DIGITAL CONTENT WILL BE AVAILABLE AS DOWNLOADABLE FILES

 
THE ENEMY CHAMPIONS PAINTING GUIDE
Hit the ground running and don't let a creative block stop you from having fun painting your new minis.
You'll receive the digital download of our Painting Guide. This comprehensive guide demonstrates the way our artist envisioned each of the 12 characters looking in full color, front & back!

 
CHARACTER STATS & LOOT CARDS
Bring your champions to life! The custom character stats and loot cards take the miniatures to a whole new level. Seamlessly incorporate them into any encounter. You'll gain access to the digital download of the cards of all 12 characters. Optimised for mobile phones it'll be a breeze to use during gameplay.  
 
CHARACTER STATS CARD EXAMPLE

 
CHARACTER LOOT CARD EXAMPLE



3D PRINT YOUR OWN ENEMY CHAMPIONS!
Gain exclusive access to the STL files of our Enemy Champions. It's the perfect reason to get that 3D printer you've had your eyes on :)
 
Note: The license allows you to print the STL files for personal, non-commercial use only. The files come without supports.

1. THANKS FOR SUPPORTING US! ($1)
Thanks for supporting our campaign! You'll gain access to backer only updates and be able to follow the project from start to finish.
 
2. STL FILES & DIGITAL CONTENT ($25)
The Digital Download of the STL Files of all the Enemy Champions Miniatures, Painting Guide, Stats & Loot Cards.
 
3. BATTLE PACK ($55)
Includes one set of the Enemy Champions Battle Pack, Digital Download of the Painting Guide, Stats & Loot Cards.
 
4. BATTLE PACK & STL FILES ($70)
Includes one set of the Enemy Champions Battle Pack. Digital Download of the STL Files, Painting Guide, Stats & Loot Cards,

story:
Short Summary

  • Holding is a ground-breaking economic board game where players use their imagination and their negotiation, improvisation and anticipation skills. Get in on the ground floor with this generation’s answer to next generation of economic games!
  • I want to use the Indiegogo campaign to create a way to take the game to the final stage – making it available in brick-and-mortar stores and creating an e-shop. My primary motivation is to create a game that suppresses the luck factor to the greatest possible extent. The main success factors in the game will be negotiation, alliance, strategy and logical thinking.

 

          

 

Key features

  • Trade – you have a free hand to trade anything in the game with very few limitations.
  • Make deals – is one player too strong? Gang up on them and take them out.
  • Graphics – over 80 beautiful hand-drawn illustrations.
  • RPG elements – the game features eight unique characters and you can use their skills to protect or expand your business.
  • Handful of opportunities – 25 companies to buy, 20 countries to expand into, four service sectors, a bank, a casino, universities and much more. You can defeat your opponents in any number of ways.
  • Unexpected events – these can affect your business a great deal.  A Communist coup, war, civil unrest, Nazism… anything can happen. Holding has the right answer. Is it enough to own insurance companies and sell insurance to all your opponents or just to some of them? You decide!

    

             

How it works

Goods

If you want to start building your Holding, you can choose which way to go. Your first option is to buy companies and enter markets in selected countries. Every country needs different raw materials – some need tobacco, some oil, some cars or a combination of those. Only you choose the countries you will expand to, if you prefer to wait and buy more companies or expand as soon as you can. But be careful – every country is profitable in a different way, some more and some less, so don’t hesitate too much to enter the market. Leaving a country after you’ve entered its market costs you a lot of resources so you should think twice about where to expand or if you’d better wait.

 

        

 

 

 

                          

​Services

Another way to beat your opponents is to build an empire in the service sector. If you are not successful or you feel that the market for goods is not the way to go, you can choose from these companies

Post Office – every player needs postal services, especially when operating in more than one country. If a player decides to use it, the service has to be paid for, so why shouldn’t that money go to you? Naturally, the more countries the player controls, the more money is paid.

                            

                  

Law Firm – it is useless if you only have one, but if you hold on, invest and buy them all, you can roll the dice twice and choose which roll to use. This is a huge advantage over your opponents.

                             

Audit – every owner of a manufacturing company needs auditors. There are three audit spaces on the game board. If you buy them all, you will be able to charge a fortune for your services. And the more companies your opponents have, the more you charge them.

     

 

Insurance company – if you own one, you are protected from unexpected events. If you own all of them, you can sell insurance and you alone decide to whom and at what price you sell.                                                           

                                                       

Disasters

Disasters, unexpected events like war, Communism, monetary reform, civil unrest – all of these are terrible for business. Unfortunately, they can happen to you in Holding, too, just like they can happen in the real world. You can insure against them. If you don’t, you can expect:

Civil unrest – one company of every player is destroyed.

Socialism – taxes have increased, the Tax Office charges 30% instead of 10%.

Strike – your employees want to get a raise and it will cost you 5,000 for every company.

War – countries need more money to fund the war. It costs you 5,000 for every country where you work.

Communism – class warfare. The player with the most cash will lose half of their money.

Nazism – a random player will lose half of their cash.

Currency reform – every player will hand in 30% of their cash.

Natural disaster – every company has been damaged, players pay for repairs.

                

 

Characters

Next important part of the game are characters, which you can buy, they can be very usefull to win the game, you have to buy it, at university

Director– knows how to save money on the employees, which can always come in handy

Investor – invests more effectively than others

Bussinesman – can negotiate better conditions, always pays less than they should

Politician – can always give reasons for why they deserve the money

IT expert – always gets more out of technology than others

Banker – an experienced banker knows how to get a loan with the best possible terms

Lawyer – an experienced lawyer is their own advocate and needs only a little help – you just need one law firm in order to roll the dice twice

Thief – this unscrupulous knave has been around the block a time or two and knows how to work the system without having to pay the price

          

            

                     

                 

Other stuff

 

  

 

My story

I’m a university student majoring in economics, and ever since I was a little kid, I have enjoyed games where you make deals, trade and make money. My friends and I played economic and strategy games for many years, but we got tired of its lack of depth and dependence on rolling dice, so I decided to create a brand-new game. Welcome to Holding!

 

               

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • In Campaign I am raising 25 000 USD, its enough to complete game
  • You will get wonderful game with many options, fantastical graphic. The game, where success depends only on your decisions.

The Impact

    • Be part of first economic game, which is all about strategy, logic and thinking, not about luck.
    • Ideal Christmas gift - we are are shipping before Christmas

     

    You can also check our website www.holdinggame.com

IT expert – always gets more out of technology than others
Banker – an experienced banker knows how to get a loan with the best possible terms
Lawyer – an experienced lawyer is their own advocate and needs only a little help – you just need one law firm in order to roll the dice twice
Thief – this unscrupulous knave has been around the block a time or two and knows how to work the system without having to pay the price
          
            
                     
                 
Other stuff
 
  
 
My story
I’m a university student majoring in economics, and ever since I was a little kid, I have enjoyed games where you make deals, trade and make money. My friends and I played economic and strategy games for many years, but we got tired of its lack of depth and dependence on rolling dice, so I decided to create a brand-new game. Welcome to Holding!
 
                
 
 

What We Need & What You Get

In Campaign I am raising 25 000 USD, its enough to complete game
You will get wonderful game with many options, fantastical graphic. The game, where success depends only on your decisions.

The Impact



Be part of first economic game, which is all about strategy, logic and thinking, not about luck.
Ideal Christmas gift - we are are shipping before Christmas

 
You can also check our website www.holdinggame.com

story:
The wait is over. 4Pong is here.

The highly anticipated campaign is finally here and ready to kick-off! We're super excited and equally proud of the work everyone has put in to make this happen. We're now officially ready, set, GO! to bring this beauty out to all of you.

 

4Pong is designed to be the Next Generation Party Game. The game is more fun and more challenging than traditional Beer Pong. It's perfect for Tailgating, Man Caves, simple House Kick Backs, and more.

Order now to get $40 off your 4Pong Set!!!

Play Your Way

There are a lot of different ways to play 4Pong. We intentionally designed it for your interpretation. There are no hard rules-- just like Beer Pong, it's house rules. But, we do have some suggestions of our favorite game play modes that we have played so far:

  • Head to Head - 1vs1 style game, each player alternates shooting balls
  • 2vs2 - Each team takes 2 shots, if both balls make a cup, that team gets a bonus shot
  • H-O-R-S-E - Call your shot, make your shot, and see if your friends can too
  • Melee - Our Favorite - Two big teams rapid firing until 4-In-A-Row is achieved

 

 

Our goal was setup to fund the first 1,000 units and the 6 molds needed for production. The final product will look slightly different, as we made a few design changes to improve the overall experience. These include:

  • Raising the backboard 3 inches (This will help you with rebounding the shots)
  • Changing the ball hopper piece to a cross hatch design (This will allow you to see the flow of the ball drop)
  • Improving the foldability of the backboard (This will make it easier for you to transport)
  • Adding a folding feature to the bottom tray (For those wall mounting the unit, this will fold up nicely to take up less room)

Once our goal is met, we will order a final prototype from our manufacturer, quality test it, and start production. Tentative timeline below.

story:
We're Gobico Games and Kuzushi Seasons will be our fourth published game. It's an expanded version of Kuzushi, our best-selling crowd pleaser that we self-published earlier this year.

It's pronounced "coo-zoo-she"

Based on iconic seasonal flowers found in Japan, Kuzushi Seasons pits 2, 3 or 4 players against each other in a unique game of positional control. Simple rules lead to beautiful complexities in this abstract area control tile placement card game. It's smart, fun, approachable and addictive.

  • Pocket size 2in box turns into a 20" board
  • Build the board as you play 
  • 2, 3 or 4 Players
  • 20-30 Minutes
  • 80 Cards
  • 4 Different iconic seasonal flowers of Japan
  • 3 Different unit types
  • Play free-for-all or in teams of 2 vs 2

How to Play

Card placement and area control is all resolved orthogonally to other cards. So up, down, left and right only. Players try to control more of the board through influence from the base cards they play on each turn. Then they check up, down, left and right of the base they place to see what player (if any) has a majority of base cards around it. If no one has more bases than anyone else around it, that square is uncontrolled, and any flag there is returned to its owner, which they can again either as a base or a flag as required.

This makes for a dynamic board that gets built out into a square as play continues (6x6 for 2 players, 7x7 for 3 players, or 8x8 for 4 players). Once the boundaries are established, play continues until all the board is filled. The winner is the player who has the most cards of their color on the board. If there's a tie, the player with the largest "island" of their color cards touching is the winner.

More Players for More Fun

While 2 player play feels like a highly-portable abstract strategy game like Go or Othello, adding a 3rd or 4th player opens up more social and strategic elements. Adding more players makes you want to make deals, chase the leader, dabble in betrayal and other tactics that make game even more fun without having to learn new rules or change the setup.

Rules

Start the game:

The first player places a city card with their color face-up. Split the rest of the cards by color, each player should have 19 2-sided cards. Starting with the 2nd player, take turns placing cards to build and fill a board:

  • 2 players build a 6x6 grid
  • 3 players build a 7x7 grid
  • 4 players build an 8x8 grid

On your turn:

  1. Place a base card orthogonally adjacent to any other card (of any color) OR flip over one of your flag cards to make it a base card.
  2. Place flag cards to mark any orthogonal spaces you control adjacent to your new base. A space is controlled by whichever player has the most adjacent bases. If no player has a majority, any flag on that space is returned to its owner's deck (they may use it again later).

Once a board dimension is established (eg 6 wide), no cards may be placed outside that edge.

The game ends when the board is completely filled with cards or a player runs out of cards.

To win, fill the board with more cards of your color or be the first player to play all of your cards.

Your game may end in a tie and we think that's OK. If you want to break a tie, the player with the most connected cards of their color (orthogonally, of course) be declared the winner.

Reviews

"Kuzushi is a sublimely simple abstract with the sort of minimalism that will really appeal to some players, myself definitely included. It’s a perfectly portioned helping for two, providing a few minutes of quick strategy. Considering its price point, form factor, and portability, I think Kuzushi can easily fit into anyone’s collection (and pocket), and will add plenty of game opportunities for those who appreciate its accessible design." — Andrew Fisher for Gameosity

"Kuzushi is one of the best pocket games I have played. It would make a great gateway abstract to introduce people to the genre, who may be interested in abstract games, but don’t want to get into ones that have lots of rules or piece movement variations like Chess or Hive. Though let me say, even if you are into abstracts (like I am) that Kuzushi is still worth being added to your collection, as it is quick, very portable, and a great price." — Ryan Sanders for The Inquisitive Meeple

"Kuzushi is a pleasantly peculiar example of smart design decisions. A true pocket-sized abstract strategy game is hard to come by (sorry, Hive) and Kuzushi is a lovely thing to pull out for those in-between times. If you enjoy abstract strategy games (or, like me, have an ongoing fascination with the very small) Kuzushi is a fun treat to add to your library." — Kurt Refling for Meeple Mountain

"Just wanted to hit you up and say how much I love your game! ... I played it with my dad (who beat me his first two games) and I truly believe that this is an instant classic among such legends as chess or checkers." — Trent F

"It's a great game -- I love it!" -- Dave's Mom

 

 

What Makes it Different?

  • Every aspect of the game's design is purposeful.
  • Great balance between players. The "first player advantage" found in most turn-based games has been reduced through the game's design, and was tested by human and computer players like a zillion times.
  • Kuzushi Seasons is simple to play but difficult to master. We've spent a lot of time getting a classic board game feel -- the more you put into it the more you get out of it.
  • The visual design is simple, iconic, and easy on the eyes. The colors and images are all very accessible for players with visual impairment or color blindness.
  • It's super portable -- there's definitely space for it in your collection. But this isn't just for size. The cards are easy to hold, easy to remove or flip, and have a low impact on the environment.
 
 

What to Expect

We deliver quality products that we're proud to stand behind. We're running this project on Kickstarter because we hope to get enough funding to place a big order, get a deeper discount, and get some profit to grow as a company.

Contact

Dave Balmer / Gobico Games

Web gobico.com
Twitter @gobico

Risks and challenges

This is our 4th game with the same manufacturer. They deliver on time and with very high quality. The largest risks would relate to unexpectedly mega-high volume. To reduce this risk, we've over-estimated all ship times and also have contingency plans to ensure we come as close as possible to our delivery date estimates.
story_txt:
We're Gobico Games and Kuzushi Seasons will be our fourth published game. It's an expanded version of Kuzushi, our best-selling crowd pleaser that we self-published earlier this year.It's pronounced "coo-zoo-she"Based on iconic seasonal flowers found in Japan, Kuzushi Seasons pits 2, 3 or 4 players against each other in a unique game of positional control. Simple rules lead to beautiful complexities in this abstract area control tile placement card game. It's smart, fun, approachable and addictive.
Pocket size 2in box turns into a 20" board
Build the board as you play 
2, 3 or 4 Players
20-30 Minutes
80 Cards
4 Different iconic seasonal flowers of Japan
3 Different unit types
Play free-for-all or in teams of 2 vs 2
How to PlayCard placement and area control is all resolved orthogonally to other cards. So up, down, left and right only. Players try to control more of the board through influence from the base cards they play on each turn. Then they check up, down, left and right of the base they place to see what player (if any) has a majority of base cards around it. If no one has more bases than anyone else around it, that square is uncontrolled, and any flag there is returned to its owner, which they can again either as a base or a flag as required.This makes for a dynamic board that gets built out into a square as play continues (6x6 for 2 players, 7x7 for 3 players, or 8x8 for 4 players). Once the boundaries are established, play continues until all the board is filled. The winner is the player who has the most cards of their color on the board. If there's a tie, the player with the largest "island" of their color cards touching is the winner.More Players for More FunWhile 2 player play feels like a highly-portable abstract strategy game like Go or Othello, adding a 3rd or 4th player opens up more social and strategic elements. Adding more players makes you want to make deals, chase the leader, dabble in betrayal and other tactics that make game even more fun without having to learn new rules or change the setup.RulesStart the game:The first player places a city card with their color face-up. Split the rest of the cards by color, each player should have 19 2-sided cards. Starting with the 2nd player, take turns placing cards to build and fill a board:
2 players build a 6x6 grid
3 players build a 7x7 grid
4 players build an 8x8 grid
On your turn:
Place a base card orthogonally adjacent to any other card (of any color) OR flip over one of your flag cards to make it a base card.
Place flag cards to mark any orthogonal spaces you control adjacent to your new base. A space is controlled by whichever player has the most adjacent bases. If no player has a majority, any flag on that space is returned to its owner's deck (they may use it again later).
Once a board dimension is established (eg 6 wide), no cards may be placed outside that edge.The game ends when the board is completely filled with cards or a player runs out of cards.To win, fill the board with more cards of your color or be the first player to play all of your cards.Your game may end in a tie and we think that's OK. If you want to break a tie, the player with the most connected cards of their color (orthogonally, of course) be declared the winner.Reviews"Kuzushi is a sublimely simple abstract with the sort of minimalism that will really appeal to some players, myself definitely included. It’s a perfectly portioned helping for two, providing a few minutes of quick strategy. Considering its price point, form factor, and portability, I think Kuzushi can easily fit into anyone’s collection (and pocket), and will add plenty of game opportunities for those who appreciate its accessible design." — Andrew Fisher for Gameosity"Kuzushi is one of the best pocket games I have played. It would make a great gateway abstract to introduce people to the genre, who may be interested in abstract games, but don’t want to get into ones that have lots of rules or piece movement variations like Chess or Hive. Though let me say, even if you are into abstracts (like I am) that Kuzushi is still worth being added to your collection, as it is quick, very portable, and a great price." — Ryan Sanders for The Inquisitive Meeple"Kuzushi is a pleasantly peculiar example of smart design decisions. A true pocket-sized abstract strategy game is hard to come by (sorry, Hive) and Kuzushi is a lovely thing to pull out for those in-between times. If you enjoy abstract strategy games (or, like me, have an ongoing fascination with the very small) Kuzushi is a fun treat to add to your library." — Kurt Refling for Meeple Mountain"Just wanted to hit you up and say how much I love your game! ... I played it with my dad (who beat me his first two games) and I truly believe that this is an instant classic among such legends as chess or checkers." — Trent F"It's a great game -- I love it!" -- Dave's Mom

 
 What Makes it Different?
Every aspect of the game's design is purposeful.
Great balance between players. The "first player advantage" found in most turn-based games has been reduced through the game's design, and was tested by human and computer players like a zillion times.
Kuzushi Seasons is simple to play but difficult to master. We've spent a lot of time getting a classic board game feel -- the more you put into it the more you get out of it.
The visual design is simple, iconic, and easy on the eyes. The colors and images are all very accessible for players with visual impairment or color blindness.
It's super portable -- there's definitely space for it in your collection. But this isn't just for size. The cards are easy to hold, easy to remove or flip, and have a low impact on the environment.
  What to ExpectWe deliver quality products that we're proud to stand behind. We're running this project on Kickstarter because we hope to get enough funding to place a big order, get a deeper discount, and get some profit to grow as a company.ContactDave Balmer / Gobico GamesWeb gobico.comTwitter @gobicoRisks and challengesThis is our 4th game with the same manufacturer. They deliver on time and with very high quality. The largest risks would relate to unexpectedly mega-high volume. To reduce this risk, we've over-estimated all ship times and also have contingency plans to ensure we come as close as possible to our delivery date estimates.

story:
Set in a post apocalyptic world destroyed by climate change, Tremor is a 2-to-4 player strategy game where you redesign and rearrange the board every turn. In Tremor, you play as ancestral animal spirits, trying to save their species from a disaster ridden world. 

Tremor can be played as a competitive or as a 2 vs 2 cooperative team game. It’s easy to learn and hard to master, making it suitable for all skill levels. Games generally last between 30–60 minutes depending on how seriously you take your strategy.

 

 

 

We are extremely proud to reveal some of the new thematic art that has been unlocked thanks to all of your support. This will replace the art in the prototypes you may have seen elsewhere. 

 

 

 (Images made using prototype art)

The Extra Large Player Aid Card summarises the actions available to you every turn. Being open to changing the sequence of your actions from turn to turn will be essential to moving forward. The board state changes every round, so being flexible is key. You can also supplement your turn with Animal Abilities, Climate Cards, Earthquakes and by leveraging Catastrophes.

The backside of the Player Aid Card has a diagram for every disaster. Manipulating disasters is how you get an edge. We've made these sheets as big as we can (20cm x 20cm), because it's great to see at a glance what your options are, and how the disasters work.

 

For FULL RULEBOOK Click Here:

 https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hjGvnWWSHc0CBR...

 

We have some exciting stretch goals lined up for the IndieGoGo campaign. Be a part of making Tremor better! Right now we have the Jungle Expansion available as an add on, but if we can get to $25,000 AUD we'll be including it in all Indemand games for FREE.

 

“The beauty of the game is strategizing around ever changing landscape – you might think you’ve got your next turn sorted and the next moment you are blown off course by hurricane winds, washed further away from your target by tsunami waves, or caught in a landslide and there’s no escape from reality.  Each player decides what disaster will strike and where – you can use the elements to your advantage or you can throw your opponent in the middle of a raging tempest, now that’s fun!” - Medusa Gaming

 

"I had an absolute blast. They taught it really well, it was fun to play, it was quick to learn and it has a good message. PLUS, I got to play as a penguin, which I’m always a big fan of." - The Dice Men Cometh, Southern Hemisphere's leading Board Game Review Podcast. 

 

"This is an amazing idea with a wonderful message to it. The only feedback I have is where can I get a copy? I love everything about this. Absolutely the most exciting game in this contest so far.” - Michael Robinson, Beat the Robinson's Board Game Review, Board Game Workshop Competition 

 

“The artwork is really, really gorgeous on this game...I like that fact that it comes with a TONNE of different options as far as the different characters go, they all have their own unique abilities and unique different tokens...they went the extra leg and gave everybody their own unique icons and abilities that all feel very, very different.” -Unfiltered Gamer

 

“It was super fun! I got to both screw people over, and screw people over when they tried to screw me over... back. The inception level layers of screwing each other over got pretty deep!” - Evin, Blood on the Clock Tower.

 

A really cool ‘maze-like’ game. The ability that you can twist all the different tiles around to change the maze for other players to make it difficult, or lure them into a false sense of security only to use one of your special powers and then flip it, mixed with the ability to save up special of disaster abilities with the rolling of the die, means you have to think on the fly and created this interesting mix of skill and luck that was really cool. - Shannon, Creator of Lucidity & Runika.

 

“Really, really fun game. Lot’s of decisions, lots of stuff you can do, and even if you’re falling behind you can always come back and win.” - Rodney, Boardgame Design Journal.

 

"This game is aimed at the strategist. And probably anyone with a taste for ‘chaotic neutral’. The game reminds me a lot of Pandemic but without the co-operative element. Allowing a long-term build of strategy and planning leaves a lot of room for trickery and faux-pathways. My favorite element of the game is the Earthquake, for its subtle crescendo towards wide-spread panic across the game board." - Ann-Marie, Geek Mom

 

""Great, timely theme, fantastic art. Very strategic - love the dynamic play surface.”  - AnnaMaria Jackson-Phelps, Girl's Game Shelf. 

 

“I love the concept of the game, I think it’s really timely with what’s happening in the world at the moment. I really love the strategy behind it. My first game I almost won, but it’s surprising how quickly the tables can turn. You think you’re going to win and then all of a sudden the board shifts and changes. Great game, really fun to play, really easy to learn.” - Daniel, WYRDO Games.

 

“Tremor is a great game for many reasons: Player interaction, relevant theme, and the different types of strategies you can take during the game to win, it’s fantastic! If you’re a game lover, this is a must for you.” - Telomander Game Reviews

 

So many times we pull a game off the shelf, mindlessly remove its contents, go about the board or roll the dice or play the cards and inhabit its universe while worrying about only how we're going to win. We munch on chips, sip on our drinks, relax in our comfortable chairs in our home's warmth during the winter or air conditioning during the summer, never thinking the designer may be trying to tell us something with the game we've bought. The message you've given us here is one we've heard for the past couple decades, but it's presented in a depressingly beautiful way. Not only is its table presence gorgeous, but the tragic prediction it makes of what kind of planet we leave behind should not be dismissed as you go about the game. - Board Game Workshop Design Contest 2018  

 

 

 

 

 

 

Combined Shipping: We are working with with our fulfilment partners to offer combined shipping discounts. You will not be paying the full shipping price again and again, only a few additional dollars for each additional game. 

A Retailer Package is available, please contact us at thecurlybros@curlybros.com

At Curly Bros Games, we're committed to two things: Giving you the best product we possibly can, and Sustainable Business Practices. 

Tremor has been going through play-testing and refinement for nearly two years, and we're confident at this point it's a balanced asymmetric strategy game with a great tempo. 

In terms of the actual product itself, we're committed not only to using some of the most reliable and experienced board game manufacturers, but to make sure they are FSC certified. That means that all wood/cardboard products have been ethically sourced from sustainable forests. We will also be doing our best to ensure we use as little plastic as possible in our games. 

Our partners TreeSisters are not only planting a tree per game funded, but are guiding us through the process of finding the highest quality ethically sourced materials. 

After the campaign, we will provide confirmation from TreeSisters of the number of trees planted, and their location.  So far we have committed to over 1600 Trees.
