story:
Game Rules & How to Play

The Hero Zero RPG game is a competition board game based on a famous multiplayer online game, where 2 to 8 players take on the role of ridiculous heroes in the absurd world. As a competition game, players compet  against the game and each other, but sometimes they need to  work together to battle enemies, explore locations, or start an alliance against other players.

The Hero Starter set has 3 locations (Humphreydale, Dirty Town Centre and Granbury) and 4 scenarios. Each location should take 30 minutes when played in 2 player mode, 45 minutes for 3 players, and around 70 minutes for 4 players. The whole game takes between 90 and 210 minutes. So grab some sodas and chips for the evening and have fun!

The first thing you have to do is choose which scenario you will play: Trophy Race - whoever gets to the end first wins, Emergency Service - you win when you finish a certain number of tasks, Razzling Master -you win when you finish a certain number of duels, and Villain Hunter - win when you defeat a certain number of villains.

Next, you deal 1 of 6 Heroic Challenge cards to each player. This is an optional task on the side to complete that gives you extra prizes!

Now you choose the Hero you want to play with. You can play a Male which is generally Stronger but has less Stamina, or a Female character which has less Strength but more Stamina.

In the Starter version you have 4 Heroes. Each Extension Kit gives you one unique Hero. Place your Hero card on a Hero board and use number markers to fill in your Strength and Stamina stats.

What is on a Hero Board? The numbers 1 - 4 - item slots  /  H -Hero card slot  /   S - Sidekick slot

Each player also receives 5 gold coins.
Determine who starts the game by throwing a Green dice. The player who roll the highest number will start the game.

When exploring each Location you will come across different tasks and events. Here are some spots you can see on the map:

Fighting System

The most important task in the game is to collect gold coins and donuts, so you can improve your character's chances in Duels and Villain battles. One way of getting them is to complete tasks in "Heroic deeds' and "Call" cards. Another way is to win them in duels with other players on the way to glory. Each time you meet another player on board or whenever you step on the Duel field, you can attack the other player to win gold coins.

The fighting system is very simple and based on multiplying number on (red dotted) dice by the Strength factor. When this exceeds the Stamina of an opponent, he will is defeated. One easy way to determine the length of a fight is by dividing the Stamina of one player by the Strength of the other player, and the answer will give you the exact number of points you need on a dice to win or lose.

Lets say your hero is facing a rather easy Villain along your way.
Your statistics are: Strength -: 10 and Stamina - 14. (40 / 10 = 4) It means you need only 4 points on the dice to win. Boss stats are: Strength - 2 and Stamina - 40. (14 / 2 = 7)  It means that it will need 7 points on the dice to win.
When fighting Villains, a player always roll first. Villains are played by any other player.

Another way of calculating fights is by multiplying the number on (red dotted) dice by the Strength factor as you play. When this exceeds the Stamina of an opponent, he will be defeated.

The player who wins rolls the Red dotted dice again to find out how many coins he recieve as reward. If he roll a Dodge symbol, no reward is given. Better luck next time.

Another place where you can fight Villains are in Dungeons. You will receive gold coins for each fight you win and a special coin or donut prize for each Villain. They can be accessed on the Location board’s field or with action cards (Heroic deeds or Call). The fighting system is the same.

When you enter a Dungeon, you fight to the end. If you win against the first Villain, you continue to the second and third. If you lose, nothing happens, another player takes their turn on the Location board. If you win against one or two Villains, they are gone from the Dungeon board and whenever someone else fights in the Dungeon, he start with the last Villain you fought.

The Dungeon is renewed when all Villains are defeated.

If you think you can’t handle a Villain, you can reset one slot by spending a donut.

Shopping at the Second-Hand Shop

When you have enough gold coins or donuts, you can enter the Second-Hand Shop and spend some on new items or Sidekicks.

Here you have 4 items to choose from. Whenever you enter the Second-Hand Shop, you can only sell one item and buy one item per turn. Each time someone buys an item, it is replaced by a new one from the Item deck. The Buy and Sell price is shown on the card at the bottom right corner. The higher price is the Buying price, the lower is the Selling price. Some Items can’t be sold and therefore their Selling price is 0, meaning you won’t get any gold coins or donuts in return.

If you have enough donuts and think that the shop’s offer isn’t a good deal, you can reload all items by spending one donut.

This game includes also ping-pong paddles, 3 plastic cups, 3 balls, and a face painting marker. You can only imagine what for!

 

Risks & Challenges

Firstly, we would like to acknowledge that there is always a risk when supporting a new publisher, especially a first timer. On the other hand, we can assure you that all of us have proven track record of work in publishing, printing, and distributing various PC games or magazines.

You can be assured that everything we do is done with passion and professionalism. From our previous projects in Poland, Czech, Slovakia, Hungary, and Germany, we gained experience in printing and distributing to huge audiences over many years. Andy, our front-runner, has worked as a graphic designer and account manager for publishers around Europe for over 8 years.

We have been in dialogue with our licensor and manufacturing companies for several months, and are ready to produce and deliver the game as soon as it is successfully launched on Indiegogo. Production and delivery should not take more than 2 months, which means you can have your game by the end of November 2017.

We know that some factors that are beyond control, things that can delay the project. This is why the game will be printed in Europe, and the risk of shipping delays and anything that is otherwise usually encountered when printing in Asia will be minimal. Also, we will be able to personally visit manufacturers while they print and assemble our game.

A few months before we clicked the LAUNCH button, we made sure that the tiniest details had been planned and our project was complete before posting it. In terms of fulfilling orders and shipping, our delivery company is a long-term partner. Most packages will be sent from Poland and Germany to keep postage costs and delivery times down.

If you have any questions about us or this project, please feel free to contact us directly or via social media.

The player who roll the highest number will start the game.When exploring each Location you will come across different tasks and events. Here are some spots you can see on the map:Fighting SystemThe most important task in the game is to collect gold coins and donuts, so you can improve your character's chances in Duels and Villain battles. One way of getting them is to complete tasks in "Heroic deeds' and "Call" cards. Another way is to win them in duels with other players on the way to glory. Each time you meet another player on board or whenever you step on the Duel field, you can attack the other player to win gold coins.The fighting system is very simple and based on multiplying number on (red dotted) dice by the Strength factor. When this exceeds the Stamina of an opponent, he will is defeated. One easy way to determine the length of a fight is by dividing the Stamina of one player by the Strength of the other player, and the answer will give you the exact number of points you need on a dice to win or lose.Lets say your hero is facing a rather easy Villain along your way.Your statistics are: Strength -: 10 and Stamina - 14. (40 / 10 = 4) It means you need only 4 points on the dice to win. Boss stats are: Strength - 2 and Stamina - 40. (14 / 2 = 7)  It means that it will need 7 points on the dice to win.When fighting Villains, a player always roll first. Villains are played by any other player.Another way of calculating fights is by multiplying the number on (red dotted) dice by the Strength factor as you play. When this exceeds the Stamina of an opponent, he will be defeated.The player who wins rolls the Red dotted dice again to find out how many coins he recieve as reward. If he roll a Dodge symbol, no reward is given. Better luck next time.Another place where you can fight Villains are in Dungeons. You will receive gold coins for each fight you win and a special coin or donut prize for each Villain. They can be accessed on the Location board’s field or with action cards (Heroic deeds or Call). The fighting system is the same.When you enter a Dungeon, you fight to the end. If you win against the first Villain, you continue to the second and third. If you lose, nothing happens, another player takes their turn on the Location board. If you win against one or two Villains, they are gone from the Dungeon board and whenever someone else fights in the Dungeon, he start with the last Villain you fought.The Dungeon is renewed when all Villains are defeated.If you think you can’t handle a Villain, you can reset one slot by spending a donut.Shopping at the Second-Hand ShopWhen you have enough gold coins or donuts, you can enter the Second-Hand Shop and spend some on new items or Sidekicks.Here you have 4 items to choose from. Whenever you enter the Second-Hand Shop, you can only sell one item and buy one item per turn. Each time someone buys an item, it is replaced by a new one from the Item deck. The Buy and Sell price is shown on the card at the bottom right corner. The higher price is the Buying price, the lower is the Selling price. Some Items can’t be sold and therefore their Selling price is 0, meaning you won’t get any gold coins or donuts in return.If you have enough donuts and think that the shop’s offer isn’t a good deal, you can reload all items by spending one donut.This game includes also ping-pong paddles, 3 plastic cups, 3 balls, and a face painting marker. You can only imagine what for! Risks & ChallengesFirstly, we would like to acknowledge that there is always a risk when supporting a new publisher, especially a first timer. On the other hand, we can assure you that all of us have proven track record of work in publishing, printing, and distributing various PC games or magazines.You can be assured that everything we do is done with passion and professionalism. From our previous projects in Poland, Czech, Slovakia, Hungary, and Germany, we gained experience in printing and distributing to huge audiences over many years. Andy, our front-runner, has worked as a graphic designer and account manager for publishers around Europe for over 8 years.We have been in dialogue with our licensor and manufacturing companies for several months, and are ready to produce and deliver the game as soon as it is successfully launched on Indiegogo. Production and delivery should not take more than 2 months, which means you can have your game by the end of November 2017.We know that some factors that are beyond control, things that can delay the project. This is why the game will be printed in Europe, and the risk of shipping delays and anything that is otherwise usually encountered when printing in Asia will be minimal. Also, we will be able to personally visit manufacturers while they print and assemble our game.A few months before we clicked the LAUNCH button, we made sure that the tiniest details had been planned and our project was complete before posting it. In terms of fulfilling orders and shipping, our delivery company is a long-term partner. Most packages will be sent from Poland and Germany to keep postage costs and delivery times down.If you have any questions about us or this project, please feel free to contact us directly or via social media.

story:
Atomic Armour is a unique tabletop wargame that uses plastic 1/100 (15-18mm) scale sci-fi tanks. Players collect, assemble and paint a cohort of three to fifteen tanks and then battle across a prepared table with a friend in the name of their glorious city or nomadic engine clan. 

A desert dwelling engine clan is caught out in the open and speeds to repel the attack.

Atomic Armour is played between two alternating opponents who maneuver their cohorts across the table, transporting cargo, securing objectives and shooting at one another in an attempt to whittle down their enemy's numbers and gain advantage.   

In the first game turn, the defending cohort sets up and the attackers race onto the table. 

Unit facing matters greatly in the game as units have weaker Armour to their sides and rear. Each shot has a chance of causing significant damage: Immobilizing the target, shooting off the turret or causing the tank to explode in a nuclear fireball that stays on the table!   

A picture from our early play testing at the beginning of 2020 with 3D printed tanks.

Games of Atomic Armour scale from three to as many as fifteen tanks each. Using a table 3×3 feet to tables as large as  6×4 feet. Though you can use household objects for terrein (books, tins, boxes, etc.) a table with purpose built trees, rocks and rivers can look incredible.   

This first Indiegogo campaign for Atomic Armour is raising funds to order sprues of our first product: The Genghis Main Battle Tank. We have already self-funded the significant cost of the injection molding tool and can order its manufacture and order the first batch of sprues after we have reached our goal.

This means we need your support to make the game a reality and get it into your eager hands. We know with the early support of players, Atomic Armour could become a popular and widely played game across the world with a long list of great units, background and more! 

A render of the Battlebox starter set, with cargo cubes, tokens, combat modules and more!  

You can order a single tank, a small cohort of three tanks or (best of all) the Battlebox starter set that contains six tanks, two unique turrets, two sets of combat modules and a set of printed tokens. This great value set is everything you need to play the game with a friend. 

The first tank for Atomic Armour is the Genghis Main Battle Tank. It is an all-rounder with three standard weapon options, slots for two combat modules and a space for Cargo. Any tank with a turret space in Atomic Armour can take  any turret, so the genghis has infinite flexibility. 

The Renders above show the three weapons that come with the standard sprue as well as a few different combat modules (one in the turret and one in the front hull) that can be used to grant your tank different abilities, bonuses and tactical options.  

In the pictures of the Genghis 3D prints above, you see the rear of the tank is a draw that slides open and closed so you can place smaller units inside the tank and transport them. The turret and combat modules each have holes for magnets so you can easily magnetize your tanks.  

The Genghis MBT will be sold in injection molded plastic. The components are clipped from this sprue and glued together. The tank comes with a cargo cube and three hatch options (one open, two closed), it comes with separate wheels so they can be glued in any configuration.  

A cohort of gladius-wielding tanks advance across an open field to assault their enemy.

We have lots of ideas for the future of Atomic Armour; the Genghis is only the first in a long line of products we want to create for the game. For the first year of releases we will focus almost exclusively on tanks and ground vehicles as well as small disposable drones and tank upgrades. Added to this we will constantly add to our online rulebook; improving our rules and releasing more background for our world. We intend to run a series of Indiegogo campaigns to release waves of new units, a simple plan can be found below, showing the major releases.

Wave 1 – September 2020 Indiegogo Launch

  • “Genghis” Main Battle Tank – Heavy Turret, Marker Turret, Missile Turret 

The Genghis is the all-purpose tank used by almost all cohorts for its versatility and reliability.

Wave 2 – November 2020 Indiegogo Launch

  • “Shakka” Scout Tank – Light Turret, Combat Module Turret

Fast but lightly armoured the Shakka can easily flank or act as a dangerous glass cannon.

  • “Hannibal” Transporter / Mobile Artillery

​The Hannibal can be outfitted to transport or can mount a range of artillery weapons.

Wave 3 – February 2021 Indiegogo Launch

  • “Boudica” Light Assault Vehicle

A small fast, tracked vehicle able to carry cargo or a single human in heavy armour.

  • “?” Patrol Walker 

A small walker with light weapons that can reliably guard objectives or fight in dense terrain. 

  • “Hadrian” Hex Fort – Support Turret, Reinforced Hull Turret

An immobile but heavily armoured Bunker that can cordon off areas of the battlefield.    

Wave 4 – May 2021 Indiegogo Launch

  • “?” Tank Destroyer  

A well armoured highly accurate tank that can take hull mounted weapons.

  • “?” Support Tank – Repair Turret

A tough, slow, purposeful tank that has abilities allowing it to support the cohort.

  • “?” Gunship

A hovering gunship that can rapidly reposition to avoid fire or attack vulnerable spots quickly. 

Wave 5 – August 2021 Indiegogo Launch

  • “?” Heavy Transporter – Undefined Turret

A large transport with a cargo of six and armour to make sure it gets were it is going.

  • “Leonidas” Heavy Battle Tank – Undefined Turret 

A big scary battle tank that will terrify your enemies but perhaps bankrupt your complex…

  • Extended Hardback Rulebook

The first Hardback print of our rulebook with lots of new art, hobby material, stories, and campaign rules. The basic rules will always be free, you will not need to buy this book to play.

Jotun prowls through the ashy ruins of a destroyed city searching for valuable technology.

Our Rulebook is available for download by clinking the image above. This is just the first version of our rules and through the coming year we intend to add to them and emend them. Our rules will always be available to download for free online even when we print them one day.

 

We have a great, engaged following on Facebook. Consider visiting our page to receive regular updates through the year and beyond on the progress of Atomic Armour.  

 

The Atomic Armour YouTube Channel currently has one video but we will soon post regular videos there of assembling, painting and gaming with our products. 

 

We understand that when people support us on Indiegogo it can feel like a risk, but, without those first great costumers and their trust we will never make Atomic Armour a reality. 

The primary cost is our sprue; Injection molding can be an expensive thing to start with. ​We have already self funded the cost of our tools and we have secured quotes from UK manufacture, Dudley Associates. Dudley Associates have worked with other miniature companies and have the ability to manufacture everything in house. We will also be able to visit their facility regulary and can trust them to do a magnificent job. 

All that remains now is the order itself which we will make once we have funded and scale to demand. We want plenty of control over the production of our products and so will be manufacturing everything locally and avoid using Chinese companies abroad as it can lead to issues in shipping, import and quality control.   

We will also be packing our products ourselves in our small UK warehouse and be shipping with a variety of capable fulfillment companies depending on the address of the delivery.

All planned costs have factored into our funding level and we know we can fulfill our perks when we reach our goal.

story:
Mr Pink Pants is an adventure game that requires some seriously weird imagination to play. It's a 2-4 player game. Each player draws a card until they receive a situation card. The player is then supposed to solve the situation using the item cards they collected from the deck of cards. In addition to situation cards and item cards are mystery cards that make you miss a turn or just grab any players card.

Any player that cannot solve the situation using their item cards is out of the game. The last player standing is obviously a winner. Did we tell you that there are magic beans in the game ? Ok , we've said too much. Kong. OK bye.

 

 

We are Shravya and Abood and we are Graphic and Industrial designers who recently graduated. We had been working on this card game for 3 months and now have successfully finished it. But we need your help to bring Mr Pink Pants to life so he can entertain you and buy us a couple of beers (he's an adult) and some wet food for our cats ! So please please support our campaign.

We need your help to raise funds to meet minimum quantity requirements to start production of the game. Any profit we make is definitely going into creating more products, games, cat food and of course, beers !  

 


Risks and Challenges

 

Since its a card game, the risks related to production are non existent. We just need your help so we can start production and deliver the game to you all as promised. Fingers crossed.
 

Follow us on 
https://www.instagram.com/mrpinkpants/
https://www.facebook.com/Mr-Pink-Pants-14886385...
https://www.twitter.com/mrpinkpant
https://​tumblr.com/blog/mrpinkpants

story:
Blockistry

is a puzzle game that takes you to a journey becoming an Alchemist of dark matter. You are given 4 identical blocks that you'll be using to construct chemical elements for a new universe. The Alchemist's work is far from easy and you'll encounter countless problems that develop your logical thinking and spatial perception.

 

 

The challenges get more difficult as you progress through the game and the fun doesn't stop even after you complete all the 50+ included in the booklet.

  • Improves your spatial perception, geometrical and logical skills
  • Keeps you entertained for hours 
  • Challenges from beginner to expert
  • 50+ challenges included

 

 

 

MISSION

EDUCATION BELONGS TO EVERYONE.

Here in Finland education is something taken for granted, but the truth is that the situation in the world is far worse than we come to think of it. More than 72 million children around the world remain unschooled. The lack of schooling and poor education have negative effects on the population and the whole humanity itself. The children leave school without having acquired the basics, that greatly impedes the social and economic development.

Here's how Blockistry comes to help. The game itself is designed to train spatial perception and logical thinking both of which are universal skills for learning. Beside this also fifty percent (50%) of net profit from the sale of all Blockistry products is given to nonprofit organizations around the world to help children get better education.

WHAT & HOW IT'S DONE?

  • With the help of the backers I will be able to start manufacture Blockistry on a bigger scale
  • Start partenerships  with different schools and nonprofit organizations
  • Invest more on marketing campaigns
  • Finish my other design for smaller children, that also helps learning.

 

About the designer

Hi my name is Eetu. I'm just a regular guy with a creative mind and a believe that you can make a change. The original idea for Blockistry started few years ago when I found scrap wood pieces at local school workshop where I was working at the time. I discovered something out of the ordinary in certain wood pieces and quickly found how these geometrical shapes could be used to create different structures. The idea grew into an actual game and little by little increasing number of people became interested in it.

First version of Blockistry has been sold around the world and now it's time to start the change. I want to invite you to join me to help make education possible for everyone and tease your brain while doing it. 

 

Come join me and become the Alchemist that changes the world!

 

WIth Love,

 

Eetu Taivalantti

Game designer &

CEO/Founder  Blockistry Ltd.

story:
Gamer's Chest is a unique modular system from Be Wood that will help you organize and improve any board game 

Shipping

We offer international delivery to any part of the world.

Our product is EU customs friendly. No additional customs fees or VAT will be charged to you.

This All-in-One Tabletop Game Organizer is an ultimate set consisting of items every gamer finds necessary. There is no need to search for all these things separately.

Especially for you, we have collected this in one place in the most convenient, versatile, and compact set.

You can purchase a standard set consisting of Dice Tower with Arena, 1 Dice Box, 4 Coasters, 12 Simple Tiles, 2 Bank Tiles choosing any designs you need.

You can also customize your set as you wish choosing any possible combination of components and their designs. You can fill your Gamer’s Chest with any components for the same amount of pledge.

A pledge manager will be used after the project is complete, and it will give you the opportunity to choose the options of your All-in-One Tabletop Game Organizer.

Internal height/capacity of the tower: 8.45 inches (214 mm)

Dice Box: 1.18" thick (30mm)

Simple Tile: 0.4 "thick (10mm)

Bank Tile: 0.8 "thick (20mm)

Coaster: 0.2" thick (5mm)

The Gamer's Chest folds and unfolds in seconds. Thanks to its compactness, spaciousness and portability, it will allow you to take your favorite game with you wherever you go.

 

Our product will save you all the hassle and inconvenience that can distract you from the game and allow you pure enjoyment of the gaming process.

You no longer have to think about such things as:

· where to store the game elements

· how to organize the playing space

· where to put the dice for the game

· how to make the dice rolls as unique as possible

· and even where to put your favorite drink during the game

 

Thank you very much for your review, it is awesome!

 

You get a completely assembled set for exciting game time. You can choose a standard Full Set which consists of:

· Dice Tower with Arena - 1pcs

· Simple Tiles - 12pcs (any design)

· Bank Tiles - 2pcs (any design)

· Dice Box - 1pcs

· Coasters - 4pcs

or you can purchase a personalized set with the components you need in any design and in any possible quantity for the same amount of pledge.

You can also add on any number of available components increasing your pledge by the appropriate amount.

After the project is complete a pledge manager will be used and you will have the opportunity to tell us the specs of your Gamer’s Chest and add-ons.

All add-ons will also be available through the Pledge Manager after the Indiegogo project closes.

You can add on any number of Simple Tiles, Bank Tiles, Dice Boxes and Coasters increasing your pledge by the amount below. You'll tell us the details in the Pledge Manager.

There is no additional shipping charge for add-ons.

Wenge, Oak, Cherry

 

23 kinds of possible engravings give a you a choice for your imagination. They are presented in the picture, and you can choose at the end of the project when you receive a survey.

 

You can see the bigger images of engravings 

HERE

 You can see the bigger images of engravings HERE

Engraving can be placed on its front part, which will add atmosphere to your gameplay.

You can order a black artificial leather dice tray mat. The mat will add style to the entire structure. The mat also mutes the sound of the rolling blocks, if you prefer.

So Be Wood's Dice Tower is not just a dice tower ...

But a multifunctional gaming accessory that is also a safe place to store all the elements you need to play.

Its design in the style of the Middle Ages will add the spirit of the era to your games and allow you to completely immerse yourself in the world of the game.

 

Clean up the clutter on your gaming table once and for all with Gamer's Chest!

Our organizer - a product of meticulous engineering thought, and love for what we do - is made of environmentally friendly wood, a material that, with its naturalness and uniqueness of patterns, will not leave any gamer indifferent and will add new colors to the gameplay.

This is not an ordinary tower you are accustomed to. It has its own very convenient and exciting features:

Dice Tower closes with a magnetic latch to secure the game components in it from falling out. Its function is to improve reliability, namely to prevent accidental opening of the tower. 

Keep in safe

The latch has two degrees of protection: the rotation of the plate of the upper part of the tower ridge and the magnet. When assembled, the dice tray serves as the top cover of the tower and reliably fixes the latch.

Until you remove the tray-cover, the latch cannot be rotated. 

The tower can be used separately, and at the same time, it serves as storage for all of organizer's components.

In the standard Full Set it accommodates a combination of:

· Dicebox - 1 pcs

· Simple Tiles - 12 pcs

· Bank Tiles 2 pcs

· Coasters - 4 pcs

You can create your personal configuration with any possible combination of modular gaming accessories in any designs. You will tell us the details in the pledge manager.

Dice Tower dimensions:

·  Folded - 5.51x6.37x10.63 inches (140x162x270 mm)

·  Unfolded - 5.51x6.37x9.84 inches (140x162x250 mm)

Internal height/capacity of the tower: 8.45 inches (214 mm)

Dice Tray dimensions: thickness of 0.98 inches, the radius of 3.19 inches (25mm thickness, 81mm radius)

A special slope is made at the top of the tower so that the dice will dive into the hole on any throw. 

Drop your dice!

The top cover of the tower serves as a tray for catching dice rolling out of the tower. It resembles a lowered suspension bridge in front of the castle gates, to which the guards run out to defend their castle. In the game, these are rolling cubes that decide the fate of your game.

Have you ever blamed yourself for a bad roll of the dice? With our tower, you can forget about it and let it decide your fate. 4 levels inside the tower improve the randomness of the results of throwing dice, making them rotate uniquely and change the drop values.

Install in a second

The distance between the levels (2 inches) is sufficient to roll any number of dice, and they will not get stuck inside.

The levels are very easily installed in special grooves inside the tower, then they are ideally folded on top and covered with a dice tray.

 The Dice Tray is conveniently mounted to the tower using two pairs of magnets.

Just light touch to add

When assembled, the dice tray serves as the top cover of the tower so that the toothed protuberances of the tray fit perfectly into the protrusions of the tower and are also held by 3 pairs of magnets.

Right place for all items

BE WOOD modular tiles is a magnetic modular hex tile system that you can use with board games and role-playing games.

Each tile has magnets installed on the sides of the hexagon so that they can connect to each other and create an interlocking system.

Tiles are multifunctional!

 

You can mix and match tiles in a way that suits you.

Hexagonal tiles have the same outer dimensions and can be conveniently folded for storage and transportation in the Dice Tower. 

Each tile is provided with a label so that the magnets’ poles are connected to other magnets.

There are 12 Simple Tile designs and 4 Bank Tile designs in total. They are shown in the photo, and you will choose the end of the project when you receive a survey from us.

Simple Tile Dimensions: 0.4 "thick, 2.28" radius (10mm thick, 58mm radius)

Bank Tile dimensions: 0.8 "thick, 2.28" radius (20mm thick, 58mm radius)

This dice box is of the same size as the dice arena and it has removable partitions inside which divide it into 4 segments. 

The prices the for Dice Box XL start from $30 in Alder, $32 in Maple and Cherry and $35 in Oak.

Its hexagonal shape perfectly matches your tabletop tiles. It also has thumb notches, so the box is easier to open without spilling out the contents. 

The lid of the box is securely held by magnetic latches that will not open even if dropped. At the same time, it can be opened quite easily with your thumb. 

The box is deep, and the inner border holds the lid securely in place.

Dice Box Dimensions: 1.18 "Thick, 2.28" Radius (30mm Thick, 58mm Radius)

Inner Dimension: 0.87 "

The coasters are made from the same woods as your other components. Each stand has cork inserts to help protect the wood from condensation or water damage.

Their hexagonal shape and dimensions are the same as table tiles, allowing them to blend perfectly on the gaming table and fold into the Dice Tower for storage and transport.

 Coaster Dimensions: 0.2" thick, 2.28" radius (5mm thick, 58mm radius)

 

All components of the BE WOOD modular system are available in a 4 types of wood. One glance at the page will give you all the information you need about what will look best on your desk. 

Take it to your home

Maxym Begun (product owner, production), Andrey Slyadnev (product owner, marketing, sales, production), Kirill Poezdnik (marketing, creative director, visualization),Our small company has been in the business of producing woodwork and decorations for quite some time.

At first it was just a hobby but a huge number of ideas and projects as well as passion for this craft allowed us to turn a hobby into something much more substantial.

Working in a team and sharing ideas with each other we always strive to create beautiful and unusual things that would bring positive emotions to their owners.

 

This project is promoted by GREENWEB - digital marketing agency.

There is no need to search for all these things separately.Especially for you, we have collected this in one place in the most convenient, versatile, and compact set.You can purchase a standard set consisting of Dice Tower with Arena, 1 Dice Box, 4 Coasters, 12 Simple Tiles, 2 Bank Tiles choosing any designs you need.You can also customize your set as you wish choosing any possible combination of components and their designs. story:
Simpl

Hi. We're Rambo and Morris and we have created a beautiful and elegant deck of cards, Simpl. 

 

This deck was created and tailored specifically for the minimalist-minded. Unnecessary details were excluded, empty space was retained, shapes and positioning have been meticulously determined and are evenly spaced. We designed Simpl to be beautiful yet usable. Corner symbols remain to easily identify what cards are in your hand. Middle symbols remain to clearly show what card has been played on the table. 

 

The cards are made in traditional poker sizes, 2.5" X 3.5" with an S30 smooth finish. Whether while playing or displaying in your home this deck is designed to subtle and beautiful. Simpl is available in two versions:

Classic White

Matte Black

 

If this project speaks to you please consider backing it and bringing Simpl to life. We know you will thoroughly enjoy it.

 

- Rambo & Morris

 

Sample Decks

We have received our sample decks and they turned out better than we could have ever expected! We are excited to share them with you. Check our updates to see more photos of our sample decks.

 

Stretch Goals 1 - $5,000

Thank you to all our wonderful backers! We appreciate the early support we've received from all of you and look forward to sending you Simpl. Because of all of you, we funded in 87 hours, blowing our expectations completely away! We are now excited to introduce our first stretch goal. We have already designed 54 Simpl cards (including Jokers) and we are able to print 55 for each deck. If we reach our goal we want each of you to help decide what the 55th card should be! The first stretch goal will be $5,000. When we reach it we will make a list of you who backed us up to this point and a survey will be sent out to only you. The survey will have multiple options for you to vote on and have a voice in what would make the best 55th card! 

Again, we deeply appreciate all the support we have already received. We have much more planned and are excited to reveal them in our next stretch goals!

Stretch Goal 1.5 - $7,500

We were originally planning on having our next stretch goal at $10,000 but we decided to have a bonus goal in-between to do something a little different from most campaigns. We want to show our appreciate to our backers with hand-written thank you notes. We know it's not much but we just want you all to know how thankful we are. Everyone who backs before we hit $7,500 will get a personal handwritten note from us!

Stretch Goal 2 - $10,000

In our survey sent out after our first stretch goal we chose a specialty card to be added to the deck. The highest voted card was the 4 suits. The next highest voted card was the blank card. Because we think that the blank card adds an eloquent and minimal touch to the deck we want to add to the deck as well. If we hit $10,000 we will include a blank card to each deck.

 

Classic White

 

Matte Black

 

Hearts

 

Clubs

 

Diamonds

 

Spades

 

Jokers

 

Backs

 

Risks & Challenges

There's a lot that goes on behind the scenes and there are always going to be challenges to overcome. Hopefully, we won't have any but if we do we will keep everyone updated.

Due to the cost of manufacturing, we face the risk of needing to mass-produce the deck in order to be profitable. We have set our goal limit to a range reasonable to produce your deck and still be profitable.

Due to the pandemic, there is a possibility of delayed manufacturing and shipping. We have planned and are confident we will be able to deal with this challenge.

story:
Open Legend Fantasy Bestiary

Open Legend Fantasy Bestiary brings 100 fantasy monsters and creatures to your table, from pests like giant rats and goblins to world shaking demons and dragons. Along with interesting lore and stat blocks for every single monster, this book comes with custom artwork for Boss monsters, as well as tips on how to run them.

Additionally, before posting this project, we went ahead and made the full playtest Bestiary complete with 100 different stat blocks. You may access it here online for free, or grab the PDf by pledging: http://homebrewery.naturalcrit.com/share/H1G-aG51Q

 

Why fund this?

We're a small group of 3 unknown, independent publishers who wish to share our work with the world. To do so in the best possible light, we need to be able to afford the artwork and programs required to make this the best book it can be.

Some examples from the book so far:

 

The Kraken

 

Kobolds

 

Rewards

Here is a list of all available rewards:

$5: Playtest Bestiary PDF

$10: Open Legend Fantasy Bestiary PDF, Playtest Bestiary PDF

$20: Submit your own monster; whether you have only an idea or a full statblock with lore, we will add it to the book for certain + all previous rewards

$40: For your own submitted monster, we'll create a hand drawn map of its lair, populate and detail it to be ready to run, and then send the scanned file to you + all previous rewards

$80: Guaranteed artwork for your submitted monster + all previous rewards

Stretch Goals

$10000: 25 new monsters 

$15000: Open Legend Fantasy Bestiary will be published to Roll20, along with tokens for every single monster

$20000: 25 new monsters, printable tokens for every monster in the book

$25000: All of the BOSS monsters will receive their own lair map, available for free as a separate file

$30000: 50 new monsters

$40000: A short adventure will be written along with each lair map, ready to play

Where do my funds go?

50% of the money we receive will go towards the artwork and programs we need to make this book happen, while the rest will go on taxes and to us. As the campaign has a flexible goal, it fully depends on the amount of money we raise from it how much artwork we'll be able to afford.

Risks

As we are a small group of unknown publishers, there are no recommendations or previous works; this is our first big project. As such, by pledging you put your trust in us to complete it; in return, we try to be as transparent and direct as possible.

The main risk involved in backing this project is a possible 1 to 2 month delay if we reach too many stretch goals. We, however, guarantee that it will be fully finished by June 2019 at the very latest; most likely by March.

story:
https://analoggamestudios.com/wp-content/upload...

 

#demiDancer will be available to backers on this Kickstarter site who provide us with an address in Canada or the United States.  Shipping to your address will be added after the project funds successfully and will be charged according to the table below:

Manufacturers have given us timelines that would have the game printed and packaged in January, 2020, after which they are shipped to our warehouse and then repackaged and shipped out to you for arrival approximately by Spring 2020.

Your reward(s) will be shipped to the address that you provide us, through a professional global end-consumer fulfillment and shipping agency that includes the customs fees for Europe. We will not be attempting this ourselves, but have budgeted for professional packing and delivery to you by a reputable company. 

 

The main risks and challenges are typically with manufacturing, shipping and fulfillment and we will be working with the same providers who have served us so well in our Kickstarter projects.

The manufacturer that we will use is one that we're very pleased with and produced excellent quality board games for us before. Both 'Centrix' and 'Gnomes at Midnight' received many compliments from our backers for their high quality components, so we don't want to mess with that success.

These games were successfully shipped and all our backers received their games. We relied on Quarter Master Logistics to make sure that the games were delivered quickly and without mistakes and we will use Quarter Master Logistics again for '#demidancer', because they are the best.

We love this game and are so excited to share it with everyone and we have the experience to start, manage and complete this project right up until the last happy backer receives their reward and is playing it with their bestie.

story:
Hello!
My name is Tamir Koren from Israel, Im 20 years old.
I managed to qualifiy for my first Pro Tour\Mythic Championship through a Legacy MCQ on mtgo playing UW Stoneblade! This has been a dream for me for the past few years. Unfortuantly for me the location is Richmond Virginia USA which is extremely far.
I wish I could afford this on my own however I have been unable to work in the past few months due to a knee surgery.
Itll mean the world to me if you could help me achieve my dream of participating in the Pro Tour and will get me a step further in my goal to becoming one of the best MTG players :D

If anyone has any questions regarding anything Id love to help!
Im in need of 3000$ for flights and a place to stay.
Any and every donation would be a huge help!
As well as sharing ;)
I thank you all for taking the time to come in here and read this!

I appreciate everyone of you more than I can describe in words!
Have a Great day, week, month. year and life!
Chase your dreams because if you do they will become reality :D

story:
Short Summary

As a twisty puzzle and crossword enthusiast I have decided to combine both of my passions into a portable,light and fun toy named QubOrd. Qubord is a handmade modification of the world known Sheng Shou 5x5 cube. The ShengShou 5x5 cube is a perfect-size 5x5 that has exceptional inner and outer layer turning ability. ShengShou 5x5 has a sturdy feel. Pops and lockups are rare. The pieces that are made are not made with the same plastic.  The plastic made for the ShengShou has a smoother finish and polish to it.  The pieces in particular are a little more flush with the other pieces.  Overall, the mechanism is fast and smooth and that’s a good thing. Hence, I have chosen to modify this particular cube which is suitable also for speed cubing. Should this campaign succeed I intend to modify several other well-known cube mechanisms to cover every need.

The 5 x 5 cube twists vertically and horizontally like the puzzle cube with blank colored squares, and the object is to form words by solving clues which lead to the answers on the sides- instead of matching colors. The words do not cross each other and are formed only horizontally. The answer words are placed in the grid from left to right. However, the letters on the pieces force the solver to become aware that each one can be in one of four orientations, thus increasing the total number of combinations. This adds to the difficulty of the puzzle but not astronomically (bear in mind that a 5x5 cube has 283 trevigintillion possible combinations!). In a standard Rubik's Cube, the player must match up colours on each side of the cube. In the QubOrd, the player must place the letters on each side with no repetition,in order to answer the given clue. This cube is one of the most difficult of all  cubes because as well as having to know the basic cubes concepts you also have to possess a broad general knowledge. Unlike normal crossword, any turn of the cube can wipe out work you just did.The clues for each word comes to a laminated card coloured accordingly to each side it represents.

Solving a QubOrd comes in two parts.  Firstly, the forming words aspect.  Solve the clues which lead to the answers. Each letter has an exact position on the grid.Secondly,the 5x5 cube solving aspect.

 

What We Need & What You Get

What we really need is to put QubOrd into production.In order to do that we need your support.This product is for you and you only.We do not plan to stop here,the best is yet to come,but like Aristotle's wrote in his Nicomachean Ethics “The beginning seems to be more than half of the whole". Hence, we need a good start!

The QubOrd you get comes in two levels of difficulty: Basic  and Hard.

On the Basic pack the clues are quite straightforward and require average knowledge on one of the available themes/subjects (History,Geography,Science,General Knowledge ). 

On the Hard pack the only difference is that the clues require extensive,in depth knowledge on the selected subject.

Lastly, we offer a Kids Pack as well, in which all words are exactly the same on every side of the cube and ,obviously, the clues are quite straightforward and basic.Its an introduction of our young fellows to the QubOrd world.

Τhe clues for each word have been handpicked very carefully and they vary in difficulty.

Each cube comes in a scrambled state,  unless otherwise asked. The reason for doing so, is that QubOrd is not a typical,classic 3-D combination puzzle,but has an educational nature as well.User will not practice and improve his/her knowledge if the answer just lies there.The whole purpose of the apparatus would be lost!

 

The Impact

QubOrd  is not the projection of the Crossword puzzle on CUBE!Is an actual hand modified sticker cube that  will challenge the skills of the most experienced cubers! It is a breathtaking result for both Crossword and cube aficionados. It requires excellent skills in problem- solving, broad knowledge and concentration.

It is ideal for: 

  • Practicing and improving your memory and coordination skills.

  • Testing your mental skills,knowledge  and challenging your patience.

  • Stress Relieving.

  • Both children and adults of all ages.

  • Playing indoors or outdoors.Its portable design makes it convenient to play anywhere

  • A great gift and collector's item for any cube and crossword enthusiast.

 

Stretch Goals

 

Indiegogo Promo Offer

 

Risks & Challenges

There are always challenges and unforeseen obstacles that arise when trying to bring a product to life. There are so many moving parts that must be managed. With this being our first product launch, we can say that we are giving our best in this process and have developed systems and processes to mitigate the risks and obstacles that will arise. We will work hard to ensure that we deliver what we promise and to go the extra mile whenever it is possible. Thanks for believing in us!

Thanks!

With Indiegogo and your QubOrd pre-orders, we have the amazing opportunity to design and modify a product without compromise. It's a product we think is needed and we hope you'll love.  We thank you in advance for your support. Finally, we hope you'll tell your friends and turn them into QubOrd wanters as well.

story:
Story

 

With Lucky Draw, our mission is to bring families back together again. With social media and video games, it seems like family is beginning to slip away. Lucky Draw is an exciting, family game of luck, for all ages. If you love all of the classic card games, than Lucky Draw is the game for you.

 

How to play Lucky Draw

 

Object of the game is to get all your cards turned over in the round and get a point. First player to get five points wins the game!!!

First you need 2 to 4 players. Choose a player to deal cards (each round there is a new dealer going clockwise from first dealer). Deal each player 10 cards face down. Place remaining cards in a pile face down. Leave room next to it for a discard pile. Next place cards in 2 rows of five. The top row being 1 through 5 and the bottom row being 6 through 10. Next each player must choose a different color, red, yellow, blue or green. Each round players can choose a different color. Player to left of the dealer begins round drawing from the top of the deck. If the card drawn is their color and number they need, place it in the correct spot face up (example if you draw a 3 card place it in the third spot from the left on the top row) and pick up and turn the card that was in that spot. If this is the right color and number you need, continue until you get a card you can't use. If you get a card you can't use but the card is one that the player who's turn is next can use, hand it to them and this begins their turn. If they can't use it, place it in the discard pile and they begin by drawing from the deck. Continue playing until a player gets all the cards turned over. This player gets a point. The remaining players get one more turn to see if they can go on a roll and turn the rest of their cards over. If any players do, they get a point. After that round if any players have any cards unturned they must turn over the rest of the unturned cards. If a player has all the cards they need in or out of place, they also get a point. Reshuffle cards and begin a new round. The first player to get five points wins the game!!!

There are three special cards. Stop, reverse and wild. The Stop card ends your turn. The Reverse card makes play go in the opposite direction. The wild card can be used for any spot you need. If you go to put a wild card down in the spot you choose and the card you pick up already was the right color and number, place it back in that spot face up and move wild to another spot. Continue until you get a card you can't use.

Goals

 

With our basic funding goal of $6,000, we will be able to produce the game, fulfill the commitments to our backers with quality packing and shipping. We will be able to finance our future orders and advertisement. With additional funding, we will be able to manufacture additional  games and expand advertising, so we can get this awesome game to everyone!

 

Risks and Challenges

 

The main risk that we currently have will be financing the project. We have a Trademark as well as the Copyright on Lucky Draw. Board Game Manufacturing Company will be producing Lucky Draw. They have given us an estimate of 60-75 days to make and ship the game. We pray that our project is funded so everybody is able to experience the excitement of this game

story:
Llamasters is an entertaining party game with an Augmented Reality option to provide you, your friends, and your family with lots of funny moments, laughter and memories!

 Players will play against each other and each player can try to trip up others using different strategies and action cards — like Spitting Llama or Oracle Llama. Give it a try and watch these friendly llamas captivate you and your friends with different personalities! They spit, they dance, support or even piss you off. 

 

 All with one simple goal - to make you laugh and get you closer to your family and friends. 

 

Llamasters is a game suited for all ages and with an augmented reality option, it connects different generations to make playing easy, fun, and accessible.

Come and join the royalty!

Salute!

You can check out the complete rules: http://llamasters.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/0...

If you are out of the game and you are playing the game with AR, you will still have another chance to win!
 

How?

Open the Llamasters App and use it to scan the deck and find out which card is coming up next. Keep an eye out on the cards, because the right card will let you back into the game!

 

Uninterrupted Gameplay!

If you are using your phone you will not interrupt the game because the only people using smartphones are players that are out!

And if you don't want to, you don't have to use the Augmented Reality (AR) option. The game is still a lot of fun! 

If you don't find it check our website: llamasters.com

 

 So! If you are playing the game with Augmented Reality you will have:

More than 1 year in the making

Making a party game takes a lot of hard work! Because Llamasters is not your typical game and features AR component, our team has worked hard for over a year to bring it to this point.

This is our passion and we take it all very seriously, which is why we invested a lot of personal time and money into this game. Creating Augmented Reality (AR) pieces is a pricey endeavour, but we didn’t mind because we only wanted to create something fun yet unique.

We also built it on two different platforms (Android and iOS) and spent a lot of time testing to make sure that anyone wanted to have access to Llamasters. Developing the AR portion of the game was tedious and took a lot of experimenting and testing.

Once all the technical stuff was done, we spent countless hours developing content to build our Kickstarter campaign. We even tested different risk management plans to ensure the greatest success for the game!

While we reached great success already, we are still in a need of support. This is your chance to help us and support us to keep going and growing.

Also!

We wouldn’t be here without the help and support of so many people around us. Today we want to recognize and say thank you to 100 testers that used their personal time to help us test Llamasters game and share their user experience with us. This invaluable feedback helped us make the game even better. Thank you. ❤️?

[If you are interested to see our progress, please scroll down to the bottom of the page and check out some fun photos.]



 

Why do we need a crowdfunding campaign?

We’ve created this amazing game which combines real-life card game with augmented reality and we want to make it better for you! If we reach our goal we will add more features, let’s face it, add more Llamas. 

However, we don't have enough resources to make this game available to other people! Without backer support, the game will be limited to only our friends and family.


What will we do first?

If our campaign is successful and we reach our Kickstarter goal then the first thing we would do is improve our game to bring you more fun. That’s right, more fun! We want to make it fun and exciting for everyone. So our first task of business would be to:

 

 Augmented Reality (AR) Development - As soon as we have raised enough funds we will start developing new AR features for the game.  Augment Reality development is extremely expensive and time-consuming, which is why we have to take it one step at a time. And also the reason why we need your support! So we can develop as many new AR features and enhance user experience!

 (First Turn Battle)

 

 Fun & Functionality AR Llama Animations - Yes, our llamas are fun but want to make them even more fun by adding llamas that would do fun stuff! For example, some llamas would dance, some would make you laugh, and some will come alive in your room. We also want to add more functionality by creating certain animations. 

(Character Animations - Scroll up to the Augmented Reality section to check the Killer Sloth character animation)

 

The more money we raise, the more complex our AR features will be! The more complex they are the more fun they are! We want to make LLAMASTERS a completely fun and unique experience, and that’s why we need your help. 

 

With your support, 

you will help bring a unique game to the market, which in some ways you actually help create, and thus you then become a part of the game and something very cool, fun, and unique. 

 

Thank you so much for your support. We look forward to making you a part of our project. 

 



 

Our story

During the quarantine we were bored. Yup, really bored. But more than being bored we missed our family and friends. We missed playing board games together, and just having fun and laughing together. Let’s face it, relationships are the most valuable things we have in our lives and quarantine made it obvious that we took them for granted. A simple board game was no longer possible. A fun night with friends was a pipe dream.

After realizing this we decided to find a way that would bring us closer together, help us nurture our relationships and also have loads of fun! This was the premise Llamasters was built on. A way to connect all of us even more! It’s so important that we laugh, especially during these difficult times, and Llamasters is all about making you laugh!

Like great chefs in the kitchen, we tried to combine the best ingredients that sometimes don’t seem like they go together but instead they create perfect harmony. You know what we mean - like a salted caramel ice-cream. You’d never think to put salt on the caramel, but boy it’s delicious. When creating this game we took the same approach. We paired the two amazing ingredients to create something unique and fun. We took a fun card game and combined it with augmented reality to take your entertainment to the next level.

Regardless if you are a teenager, an executive, parent or a grandparent, Llamasters will provide you with a special and unforgettable experience.

We had so much fun playing this game with our friends and family that we wanted to make it available to everyone. We’ve never done anything like this before so we need your help and support. As we all play together we can make improvements as a community and create a kingdom like no other.

So, if you want to play with us, get to know a bunch of crazy Llamas, and maybe even have a custom llama created just for you, please back this project and help us build this game.

Salute,

Maya,Eli, George and Gabriel

story:
Risks & Challenges

As in every project there are risks and challenges to this one aswell but we have worked hard and sealed the deal with the manufacturing and shipping companies in order to fullfill the perks and  at the promised time although we hope to do it earlier than that. The designs have been sent to the manufacturing company and everything has been arranged in order to start production immediately after the campaign ends. If after claiming a perk you change your mind and don't want to support us anymore please contact us and we will refund you immediately,no questions asked.

Referral program:

Bring a friend to our campaign by using your unique referral link. Learn how to do it here.

How does the referral program works:

You don't need to be a backer of the campaign in order to participate in the referral program.
For every 10$ donation that a friend of yours donates you will get 2$ credit which you can then use to claim one of the perks or add-ons.
Calculations of your credit will be made and sent to you via e-mail after the campaign ends when you can also pick the perks or add-ons according to the credits you have earned.
Notes: If you dont gather enough credits to claim a perk you will need to spend to claim one and then use the credits for add-ons.
Credits will not be converted to real money and sent to you but are only meant for in-campaign perk or add-on claiming.

You can join our facebook group for discussions,updates and suggestions here

Thanks for being part of this project!

If after claiming a perk you change your mind and don't want to support us anymore please contact us and we will refund you immediately,no questions asked.
Referral program:Bring a friend to our campaign by using your unique referral link. Learn how to do it here.How does the referral program works:You don't need to be a backer of the campaign in order to participate in the referral program.For every 10$ donation that a friend of yours donates you will get 2$ credit which you can then use to claim one of the perks or add-ons.Calculations of your credit will be made and sent to you via e-mail after the campaign ends when you can also pick the perks or add-ons according to the credits you have earned.Notes: If you dont gather enough credits to claim a perk you will need to spend to claim one and then use the credits for add-ons.Credits will not be converted to real money and sent to you but are only meant for in-campaign perk or add-on claiming.You can join our facebook group for discussions,updates and suggestions hereThanks for being part of this project!

story:
A snippet of the gameplay about per- forming Hasik (Attack) and Salag (Defend)

 

Learn more about Lagim by downloading this rulebook

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

 

We are excited to continue our successful campaign and launch our first project here in Indiegogo Indemand.

Our card game was first introduced in the Philippines and was widely accepted and received numerous reviews from major media channels such as CNN Philippines, CNNLife Phillippines, GMA Network, and Manila Bulletin.

Our team has over 20 years of experience in illustration, design development, and production processes. Having produced and released the 1st edition locally in the Philippines gave us a fair amount of confidence in the quality and craftsmanship of the components. We have implemented improvements in game play and added components to the game to make it more complete and engaging.

Backers should have every confidence in receiving rewards of the highest quality. You can expect timely updates on our social media channels, newsletters, and website on how the project production is going and before and during fulfillment. Having said this, delays may sometimes occur due to unforeseen circumstances and changes such as shipping, custom and taxes, and other logistical restrictions.

We will be using Indiegogo's  pledge management feature for fulfillment and customer support  for our backers.

Find out more about Lagim™ at www.lagimcardgame.com

story:
Foleys playing cards

 

 

Hi every one welcome to the Re-launch of Foleys playing cards.

We understand we were over ambitious with our first project, we were trying to pull out all the stops with are first kickstarter. We wanted top quality cards with gold stamping and customs gold seals.

We also planned to use debossed tuck boxes with gold stamping text and logos. We also wanted to use  gold foil in the inside of the tucks. Over ambitious right?

 

This doesn't mean we don't want this in the future. (That's where stretch goals come In )

 We are still using custom decks, tucks and seals.  We  will have high quality casino stock from uspcc bee collection as we want the cards to be high quality and durable for the user. 

 

We will still be using the same card designs and tucks and seal design, but they will be  printed with pentone PMS 871 ink. The gold on the cards and tucks will have gold ink the same with any gold on the design of this project and instead of 2,000 card printing, will be making just 1,000. This is all to keep better control of cost and keep the price down.  

 

So you maybe wondering about the debossing and gold stamping?

 

As I previously mentioned we will aim for this in our future projects as we feel this will make us stand out.

Our stretch goals will be as follows

  • Gold stamped seals (this will be 40p per seal) 1,000 is £1400
  •  MetalLuxe for backs of cards (this will be £9.16 per deck 1,000 is £9,160) Another printing of 500 more standard. will be another £170 making up to 1.500 prints a total off £4,870
  • Traditional cut 10p per deck
  • Crushed stock 500 pounds.

If your wondering how will you get the new updates from the standard design. Don't worry it will be automatically changed to any goals we reach with no extra cost.. 

Are standard Print including custom tucks, seals and cards will be

  •  1,000 decks: £4,02 per deck, a total of £3.920 unless stretch goal is reached, then another 500 will be added.
  • The casino stock is included in the price above
  • Double backer for double lifts
  • Card design.

We have used Arrco face card design for the fronts as people tend to like close to the original look. But we have changed some colors and added are little marks and fully redesigned the pips

 

Tucks.

The tucks will be a stander print. with no embossing or gold foil.

This will be a stretch goal, and this will be announced and added to the pledge page once is unlocked or close.

This will be the look of the tucks, plus inside tucks will be gold foil.

 

Finally the seal will be a standard print, with a gold print. But also as an unlockable, the gold print will be gold stamp

 

Thank you for you time.

Any questions please ask.

Please note shipment could be sooner.

story:
To be held for the upmost importance:

The Perfect and Virtuous Supreme Leader Team calls out to all Supreme Daughters and Glorious Sons of the Republic to compete in a Mind Blowing, Exhilarating Experience meant to deplete our Inventory of Supreme Badges: for all those that show Supreme Skills and Abilities beyond that of a mere, wanna-be Leader will be granted Badges, Gifts and Titles, including the Ultimate Supreme Title of the Next Supreme Leader of the Republic!

To achieve such Glory, One must prove above the others and meet these prerequisites:

  • You are tasked to Lead in one of nine Districts of North Korea and cooperate with your brothers and sisters to bring Glory to its Economy in spite of:
    1.    Constant pressure resulting from internal politics and disputes
    2.    Pyongyang requests for additional resources needed for the Nuclear Program
    3.    Ever growing international sanctions from all the capitalist pigs all over the world and the ever changing business climate to which the Supreme Leader must react to.
    4.    Supreme Leader’s new Juche philosophy: in short you pay taxes for everything you own and you take full accountability over all decisions you take
  • You will be faced with Real World Events and Facts that require your decision: everything is based on Western Media News and Facts about North Korea from the last 50 years!
  • You will be given a Medal for almost every Virtuous Decision you take that pleases Supreme Leader!
  • Show your Supreme Leader Skill by having the most Glorious Amount of Medals sticking on your chest!

 

What’s inside the game:

The Map of North Korea with its 9 Districts, split in 9 different colors.
9 Power Grids that consist of 6x5 slots that serve as Power Grids for each District.

10 Unique Buildings, with prerequisites and ROI explained on each Power Grid that emulate North Korea’s exports (fact: 90% of all DPRK Exports are produced from these buildings).

The buildings require to be purchased and placed on Power Grids in every District and they all have their unique shapes, perks and prerequisites. Supreme Leader is certain you love Tetris and henceforth made it competitive and enjoyable in a board game format.

60 World Event cards (WE) based exclusively on real news about North Korea from western media sources, split in 3 TIERS, as follows:

Tier 1: No Sanctions – to have an easy game start, there are 25 unique events, based on real news about North Korea

Tier 2: Some Sanctions – the game progresses to Tier 2 when a Player built the first Nuclear Fuel Facility! Game gets harder, 22 unique World events that are meant to test the Players on the many skills needed to be a Supreme Leader.

Tier 3: Heavy Sanctions – Supreme Leader: Sons of the Republic against the World!

12 unique Game Ending events. Once the Nuclear Site is built, Players work to finish the Hydrogen Bomb, which ends with finding the Next Supreme Leader in a Massive Supreme Celebration and the best Badges are awarded!

57 Unique Pyongyang Quests (PQ) and 45 Unique Badges , based exclusively on real western media news about internal DPRK politics and Supreme Leader’s official biography. Upon completion of some of the Pyongyang Quests the players are rewarded an exclusive badge, unique for each accomplished Quest which has to be placed on his/her chest!

80 Supreme Leader Coins (SLCs), as in game currency. To achieve your goal, you will be provided with SLCs in return for the DPRK's currency (the DPRK Wons) your buildings make via export. The Wons are kept in the Pyongyang bank for safekeeping, while you will receive if deemed worthy SLCs and Badges for your hard work, to keep you focused on the goal. You were promised to get Won after you won.

 

45 Supreme Favor cards, via which you can use the Power of the Supreme Leader to do your bidding so that you can dominate your competitors!

 

Rules for Starting the Game

   1. Dress appropriately!

Be well dressed and pose ready to have many, many Medals clipped on your chest.

   2. Check your haircut!

The Players that possess one of the 28 approved haircuts receive one extra SLC at the start of the game. Game doesn't start until decided.

Rule above is only enforced if everyone at the table agrees the receiver's haircut matches one of the profiles from bellow.

 

   3. Generate your Right of Birth!

Each player has to generate his/her own Right of Birth in the Mount Paektu Bloodline (and picture with location) by using one of the Approved Bloodline Backgrounds, introduce themselves and explain the Great Plans they have for improving the Economy in the District  they will control.

The Upmost Example here:

   4. Check your Sex!

If a Player is a Daughter of the Supreme Leader, she starts the game with 2 SLCs less, but receives one Extra-Super Exclusive badge!

The Supreme DPRK KIMJONGILA badge is given to all Daughters at the start of the game. The sex you have is the one given by nature. No shameful capitalist ideas about sex alteration. -1 SLC at the start is taken from the person who considers doing so. Men start the game with default settings and will have to struggle to obtain the first badge.

  5. Game Start!

  1. Every Player is given the right to choose 1 of the 9 6x5 Power Grids.
  2. Each Player receives 7 SLCs. Other bonuses/ penalties from sections 2 and 4 from above must be applied now.
  3. You are given a free Molluscs Farm that must be placed somewhere at your choice on the Power Grid. The Supreme Leader made it compulsory that the first building everyone builds is the Molluscs farm, to feed the people.
  4. Each Player is given 4 Supreme Favor cards faced down
  5. First Round – you must decide:
  • Build or not buildings from the Approved List of Buildings
  • Bid against other Players for a World Event or Pyongyang Quest
  • Play Supreme Favors you have from hand if you have a badge!

Don’t forget to pay the Molluscs Farm tax at the end of the First Round to get a taste of Capitalism!

 

Explanation over Building Order:

All details (costs, revenue, prerequisites) are written on the Power Grid. Bellow is a verbose explanation over the general building rules.

  1. To Build any income generating building, Player must have adjacent to it a Molluscs Farm. A Molluscs Farm must have direct connection via one of the square faces to any other building. You cannot place a building on the Power Grid without it being directly connected to a Molluscs Farm. Diagonal connections are not allowed.

*This is because there are no cars in North Korea, therefore this is the only way to feed the workers.

  1. To build a Reactor Site or a Fuel Facility, the Player must already have under his administration a Coal mine and a Pig Iron Factory. To build the Reactor Site, there must already exist a Fuel Facility built and on the Power Grid in some District in the game!
  2. The Reactor Site can only be built after at minimum 1 turn passes after the Nuclear Fuel Facility is built.
  3. To Build a Bitcoin mine, the experience from coal mining is a requirement for successful Bitcoin mining as decreed by Supreme Leader, henceforth Bitcoin mine can only be built if Coal mine exists on the same Power Grid.

These are all the building rules!

 

Turn flow:

Every Turn is composed of 4 phases and start right after concluding “Rules for Starting the Game”

Phase 1. Every Turn starts with an Announcer reading out loud the World Event.

Players must then BID for taking over the World Event from the Announcer (anything can be used, i.e. SLCs, Badges, empty;( promises). The Winner is whomever the Announcer decides and he receives the bid from the Player he endorsed.

Phase 2. An Announcer must read out loud the Pyongyang Quest.

Players must BID for taking over the Pyongyang Quest from the Announcer (anything can be used, i.e. SLCs, Badges, empty;( promises). The Winner is whomever the Announcer decides and he receives the bid from the Player he endorsed.

Phase 3. Any number of changes on the Power Grid or trades between Player Trades are done now.

Players can build now any number of additional buildings or do swaps on the Power Grid.

  1. Build and place new buildings or make use of Supreme Favor Cards.

Important: The maximum number of Supreme Favor Cards that a Player can play per turn is equal to the number of Supreme Badges the Player is currently wearing.

  1. Receive and pin on your chest your Medals based on your Virtual Actions during Phase 1 & 2!
  2. Execute on World Events and receive the Supreme Gift and other benefits that are written on the back of the World Event card
  3. Bring the Supreme Gift from the back of the World Event card to the Friendship Exhibition for a Supreme Gift or roll a dice with 50/50 odds to receive 2 Supreme Favors.  50/50 odds because you shouldn't force Supreme Leader's hand like that!

Phase 4. Income and Taxation

All income from all Buildings and all the World Events is given only in Phase 4. Phase 3 must be concluded and everyone must pay attention during phase 4. No cheating! 1 SLC for being caught is given to whomever caught the cheater and taken from the cheater.

  1. Fist all income must be given. After income is received then all taxes must be payed: all building Taxes, Pyongyang Quest costs and other debts must be settled now, after income.
  2. Taxation: Supreme Leader applied Juche rules to stimulate competitiveness. 1 SLC is taken from all Players for all buildings they have on the Power Grid every turn, during this phase.
  3.  After Income calculations are done followed by appropriate taxation, turn ends.

 

 

What we need & what you get:

Perhaps there is a reason out there why we do not have awesome board games about North Korea in spite that there is a ton of artwork and mind blowing information out there, so much in fact that we couldn't find even one website that managed to gather an impressive amount! However, we did just that: we spent a lot of time gathering all fascinating news and stories about North Korea to offer you them to you in an awesome, hilarious and unique Board Game about North Korea, with well thought math formulas for everything.

Original gameplay, fun, exciting, educational and balanced.

We strongly encourage to play this game right before the start of a Party... the many benefits of being recognized as the Supreme Leader at a house party brings the whole experience to the Next Level! The Generals of the Supreme Leader are bonded to do his bidding for the whole night!

 

The Impact

Concluding the game, tagging your picture and sharing the experience will raise awareness about what Western Media says about North Korea and hopefully ease tensions… everything about this game is done in good humor, meant to promote World Peace and acceptance of different political views and ideologies.

 

Risks & Challenges

The risks we take to embark ourselves on such a project are difficult, impossible to estimate.

1. Will we be in trouble with the North Korean state? We hope not, the board game is intended as a work of fiction and not meant to induce bad feelings to anybody, on the contrary! You as the Player will have fun and learn about all the interesting stories Western Media published so far about North Korea! We are not inventing anything new, simply we take everything we know about North Korea and offer it in a board game format!

2. Is there a demand for a board game about North Korea? Do you envision how it would look like to see propaganda images of North Korea on a board game in your local board games shop? Let us know what you think!! Let's see what is possible. So far, we haven't received any positive answers from local shop retailers :-D

Only if our Indiegogo campaign is successful we will be able to deliver this board game to your door steps, therefore we count on your message and any publicity you can make for this, to promote this board game and bring this vision above a mere Prototype, to an actual finished, mass manufactured product. Ohhhh and we have soo many plans, for further extensions, additional content, ways to Glorify the Supreme Leader that wins a game event......... soo much, really. There isn't enough space here to mention it all!

We have the board game fully done and played the Prototype a ton of times!

It really is tons of fun and offers huge replayability -there is no way during one game to go through all the World Events - and really. Nothing feels better than being a Supreme Leader for the Night!! Just ask our girlfriends...

All we need to know is if YOU want us to really deliver this game to you. All you have to do is pledge to make it a reality.

3. We need to cover the costs for printing and shipping all over the world. Depending on the demand, we might have to rework the art, discuss deals with additional printing companies and so on.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Make some noise about this Campaign!!!! We need people to know that we as a human race are so, so, sooooo close to finally have a Board Game that makes you feel like a Supreme Leader!!
