Only if our Indiegogo campaign is successful we will be able to deliver this board game to your door steps, therefore we count on your message and any publicity you can make for this, to promote this board game and bring this vision above a mere Prototype, to an actual finished, mass manufactured product. Ohhhh and we have soo many plans, for further extensions, additional content, ways to Glorify the Supreme Leader that wins a game event......... soo much, really. There isn't enough space here to mention it all!
We have the board game fully done and played the Prototype a ton of times!
It really is tons of fun and offers huge replayability -there is no way during one game to go through all the World Events - and really. Nothing feels better than being a Supreme Leader for the Night!! Just ask our girlfriends...
All we need to know is if YOU want us to really deliver this game to you. All you have to do is pledge to make it a reality.
3. We need to cover the costs for printing and shipping all over the world. Depending on the demand, we might have to rework the art, discuss deals with additional printing companies and so on.
 

Other Ways You Can HelpMake some noise about this Campaign!!!! We need people to know that we as a human race are so, so, sooooo close to finally have a Board Game that makes you feel like a Supreme Leader!!

story:
Creature Feature Quarterly vol. 3 for OSE...

It has been a busy (and interesting) year for me. I have been getting a lot of commissioned work lately while still plugging away at my own monster-making efforts. And, I figured it's time to release a 3rd volume of Creature Feature Quarterly for the Old School Essentials fans.

In the past, I've used Kickstarter but this time I thought I would give IndieGoGo a try.

Backers will get to vote on what monsters make it into the new volume.

I have selected 40+ monsters for you to vote on. I have compiled them all into a PDF which is available on DriveThruRPG and my Drive (links below). The PDF includes images of the creatures, some descriptive text and a general HD value. There is a link in the PDF that will take you to a poll over on my Patreon.

Here's a link to the PDF hosted on DriveThru:
https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/327100/Creature-Feature-Quarterly-vol-3-OSE-SAMPLE-MONSTER-SELECTION
And my Drive if you prefer to use that:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1qmNlvDA6baOrSAMMG7N8GNgptp0_ixOv/view?usp=sharing

The final product will include 16 of the selected monsters. Each monster will get four pages each covering stuff like:

  • Extensive Fluff including Descriptions, Lore, Ecology, Adventure Seeds and some ideas for memorable Loot.
  • Paper Mini designs for EVERY monster! Designed for easy print and play so you can easily get them on your table quick!
  • VTT tokens for EVERY monster if you prefer to play your oldskool on Roll20, etc.
  • The PDF is formatted to be easily printed at home on A4 sheets as A5 facing pages. (DIY!)

 

Risks & Challenges

There is very little risk of the project not reaching completion because it is a compilation of materials already published via my Patreon. And IGG backers get to select which of the potential monsters get into the new collection. The only hurdle is getting it all laid out in LibreOffice (which has been a bit buggy lately), but I think I can handle it. I have ran similar campaigns in the past with no problems.

(the links below go to earlier volumes currently available at DriveThruRPG)

https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/307000/Cre...

https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/307842/Cre...

story:
Updating the way children study chemistry: Atomic Monster!


Video games are fun, aren’t they? They are full of flashy graphics and action, as well as both cool and cute characters. Kids are crazy about them!


But isn’t it a bit of a waste for them to memorize the names of characters and mechanisms in a fictional world?


Meanwhile, studying is made up of just words and pictures, and isn’t very interesting at all. There should be a way to make studying more interesting.

 

How can we make studying more fun?

Wouldn’t it be great if studying was as enjoyable as playing a video game?

With this in mind, we developed the card game Atomic Monster. 

 




Helping kids all over the world have more fun and get excited about studying is our mission.

 

What we were crazy about as children continues to interest us even as the years pass, and can even inspire us to learn more about a particular subject on our own.

 

“How do things burn?”
“What is water made of?”


When children ask these questions, it is easy to correctly explain these mechanism to them if they understand how elements are structured.

 


 

The periodic table of the elements only lists the letters of the atomic symbols and numbers. 


I chose to provide a more exciting design with the Atomic Monster card game.

 


 

The design of the English language version has been completed, and I have asked a professional translator to proofread the final product. 


All we have left is to print the cards themselves, so we started this crowdfunding project to cover the cost.

 

This project will be based on “all-or-nothing” funding; meaning we will only print the cards if we reach our goal to cover the complete cost of printing.

 

Atomic Monster battles are played out on top of this sheet. 


You’ll be surprised how eagerly children will look at and read each card, learning about the molecules.



 

A professional Japanese manga artist, whose work has been serialized in Weekly Shonen Jump, designed the monsters that appear on the cards.


 

Currently, there are cards for only seven atoms and 18 molecules, but our goal is to design cards for all the elements and compounds. 


Many elements are waiting their turn to become an atomic monster!

There is a possibility that it will take some time to print the cards. However, the Japanese version of the game has already been printed. Based on this, the initial cost is not expected to exceed 5,000 dollars. 


Great care will be taken in shipping internationally, but on the off chance that the set does not arrive, we will be sure to send you a new one.
 

If you like this crowdfunding project, please share it with your friends or family.

 

Even if you will not play Atomic Monster yourself, if you would like to see the game in the hands of students at a local school, or even your alma mater, please support the school pack perk!


I will send packs of the Atomic Monster game to the address of the school of your choice. 

 

Soon, you can see children get engrossed in the world of chemistry -- even in your own home!

story:
AN ALL NEW FAMILY HOLIDAY TRADITION...

SANTA’S SCOUT, AN ALL NEW FAMILY HOLIDAY TRADITION,  created to bring and keep families together with magical lasting memories. 

IT ALL STARTED WHEN... my inquisitive little boy looked up at Santa one year and asked “Santa, how do you REALLY see all good children in just one night on Christmas Eve?" As Santa gazed up at me with a twinkle in his eye and an amused smile, I knew it was time for me to help Santa to reveal his biggest secret yet! It was time for me to find a way to reinforce my young son’s belief in the magic of all that is Christmas! And, in this, we quickly discovered a new found family tradition that would unite us and provide Holiday joy and amazement like we never experienced before!   

THE STORY OF SANTA'S SCOUT...

Meet SANTA’S SCOUT… Santa’s navigator and greatest reindeer helper out!

With his yellow star shaped nose, he helps Santa to locate the homes of boys and girls on Christmas Eve. He confirms that children have been good and are heading to bed, then signals Santa to come ahead with gifts in his sled!

The story of Santa’s Scout engages children in a unique and exhilarating indoor-outdoor game to SEEK AND FIND Santa’s reindeer Scout, his greatest helper out, on Christmas Eve! Children and parents use magical LIGHT UP gifts given to them directly from Santa to help Santa’s Scout locate their house. Children will have an amazing visual encounter and see Santa’s Scout outside with truly engaged imaginations!

Yes, children SEE Santa’s’ Scout!

 

Every year children and families will look forward to this unique and festive Holiday Family Tradition. Embrace the Magic of Santa’s Scout...SEEING IS BELIEVING!  

 

 

HOW IT WORKS...

 

THE VALUE...

 

THE OPPORTUNITY...

This is an opportunity for you to be a part of something new, unique and special!

The Santa’s Scout Activity Kit includes everything that you need to create lasting Christmas memories for your family including:

  • One child’s adorable LIGHT UP Scout Reindeer
  • One adult’s LIGHT UP Special Star (with wireless remote and user guide)
  • A beautifully illustrated family Storybook
  • Hanging accessories and batteries all included

There is true value in Santa’s Scout that can positively impact us all, so I have invested countless hours and personal funds to create this project.  In my final push to help Santa to deliver Santa’s Scout to the public this year, I turn to YOU, my potential backer, to make this dream a reality for so many to enjoy. As a backer, you will have exclusive access to the first production run and an opportunity to own the Santa's Scout Kit in advance AT A DISCOUNTED RATE!

The purpose of the Santa’s Scout Campaign is to support the production and delivery of an ALL New Family Holiday Tradition for families to enjoy just in time for Christmas 2019 this year! By supporting this project, you will help Santa to deliver this magical experience to children everywhere and be the first to receive your very own Santa’s Scout Activity Kit!  All Campaign funds will go towards manufacturing, marketing and delivery costs for Santa’s Scout with a launch date of November 2019. 

Solid timely progress is being made on this project as follows:

 -The concept, logo and book are complete

-The patent, copyright and trademarks are all filed, approved and received 

 -The prototype is complete, inspected and certified, with initial production underway 

 -PARTNERING WITH BEARS FOR HUMANITY  (www.bearsforhumanity.com), a mission driven, reliable and reputable organization to provide manufacturing and production of Santa's Scout Activity Kits.

With the funds through orders collected from this Campaign, final steps will include:

-Completion of production of Santa’ Scout Activity Kits to be delivered to well deserving families like yours this Holiday season!

STAR REWARDS....

As a supporter of this special project, you deserve recognition and reward!  Each contribution made, no matter how large or small, is very much appreciated and will help us to bring this special project to light! ENJOY!

 

JOIN THE MISSION....

As parents, we understand the challenges of life balance and the importance of ensuring quality family time.  As the founder of Family Holiday Traditions LLC, I am dedicated to the promotion of family unity by creating and sharing meaningful Traditions to bring and keep families together.

PLEASE JOIN THIS MISSION AND ENCOURAGE OTHERS TO JOIN AS WELL!  HELP TO BRING A NEW AND MEMORABLE HOLIDAY TRADITION TO FAMILIES AND ENSURE THAT ALL CHILDREN CAN EXPERIENCE THE MAGIC OF ALL THAT IS CHRISTMAS BY EMRACING SANTA’S SCOUT!

story:
Hack and Dash is a two-player card game that feels like a board game, ready to go right out of the box. Instead of using a bulky game board, this portable game uses cards to randomly create one for you. Making games feel fresh and unique each time you play!

Set moments after clearing a fabled dungeon, whose name has been forgotten by time, you'll command a band of heroes through diverse landscapes as they return home to their faction's guild hall. Be careful out there, as you'll be challenged by opposing heroes looking to seize your treasure for themselves!

Players will begin by separating the cards in the box.

Then each player receives a set of hero cards (Ebony or Ivory).

Next each player will choose one of the four unique guild halls to represent the faction of thier heroes.

Then the game board is assembled. After which play will begins!

Players will then take turns back and forth playing action cards from their hands in order to move their heroes along the game board.

When playing an action card, the number of white pearls printed on it denotes how far a hero can be moved. These pearls are located to the right of the art window on the action card's face.

Play continues like this until a player has achieved one of three possible win conditions.

(a) Be the first player to land a fourth hero card onto your Guild Hall card.

(b) Be the first player to reach eight Victory points.

(c) Be the player with the highest score if the Action deck runs out of cards. A player’s score is the total number of hero cards they control on their Guild Hall card, plus the number of Victory points they’ve accrued, plus the number of cards they have remaining in their hand.

Your first game will take roughly thirty minutes to complete as you follow along with the rules. Once you've got a grasp of the basic concepts, games should last between fifteen to twenty minutes each.

 

       

 

Hello! My name is Anthony Marimpietri, one of the co-founders of Moon Gear Games LLC. I grew up through the nineties and early 2000s playing many different table top games. Games including Magic the Gathering, Pokemon (the first few sets), Dungeons and Dragons 3.5, Dragonball Z card game (the version produced by Score Entertainment), Mage Knight and Decipher's Star Wars Customizable Card Game.  After being honorably discharged from service in late 2013, I have passed my time by developing and tinkering with Hack and Dash and other games.

Michael Collins, another co-founder of Moon Gear Games LLC, has known me for nearly 16 years. His background is in the trucking industry (local deliveries and OTR) and having served in the US Navy in supply. He's been invaluable to the project by asking the right questions concerning our logistical needs. In his spare time he enjoys playing strategy games (Axis and Allies) and city builder games.

 

   

 

Mike and I are reaching out to you for help in raising $12500 in funding. With this amount of funding, we'll be able to fulfill our commitment by delivering a copy of Hack and Dash to you and other backers, bring Hack and Dash to a wider audience and continue developing more games.

Our Perks currently include delivering one copy, two copies or four copies of the game to you. We want the game to stand on its own merit and quality. If you have any reasonable ideas for Perks you'd like us to offer, please share with us and we'll look into what we can do on our end.

Each copy of the game will include 90 digitally printed, poker sized game cards on 12pt stock (similar to the durability and feel of many card games on the market, like Magic the Gathering or Force of Will), a set of rules and a tuck box for storage. Production and fulfillment will be handled through Superior POD, a New York based print-on-demand company. If you would like more information about them, please visit their site at https://www.superiorpod.com. Manufacturing and fulfillment are currently slated to wrap up by October 1st, 2019. You may not receive your copies by this date. This date is when we want all backer obligations out for delivery.

If we are unsuccessful in raising our funding goal, all money raised will be refunded to our backers.

 

    

 

Whether this campaign is successful or not, this entire experience has impacted us over the past few years. We've learned a lot along the way and brought it this far. With your help we'll be able to take Hack and Dash further by getting the game into the hands of card game players, onto the shelves of local game stores and build the brand of Moon Gear Games.

 

    

 

Crowd funding by nature has elements of risk, both seen and unseen. This applies to us and you as a potential backer. Let us outline the risks from our end.

  1. The game's illustrations and graphic designs are not 100% complete
  2. Complications during production
  3. Complications with delivery

Solution to Risk #1

In March, we had up to that point completed the card frames and the illustration sketches. With these elements available, we were able to have a quality control print run made. Ten test decks were  manufactured in this run. After checking for how the colors came out and the quality of the card stock, we were able to formulate a time table for the remaining illustrations/graphic design components. The plan currently is to have these components finished by late June 2019/early July 2019. As pieces of finished illustrations are completed, we'll update our backers accordingly.

Solution to Risk #2

Production delays and manufacturing defects are a reasonable thing to worry about once the design files leave our hands. If there are any delays, we'll notify our backers as soon as we are made aware of them. With regards to manufacturing defects, we'll work through each issue on a case by case basis to adequately correct any problems that may arise.

Solution to Risk #3

Package loss and address changes are a reasonable thing to worry about once the manufactured games have been passed from Superior POD to their shippers. In regards to package loss, get us involved. We'll work with Superior POD to either locate your package or supply a replacement. As far as address changes, we ask that our backers keep us informed with accurate addresses so packages are not sent to the wrong location.

 

     

If your unable to contribute, you can still help us in a big way. Get the word out! Tell your friends. Your family. Share our campaign across social media and please provide us your thoughts and feedback.

Twitter http://twitter.com/gear_moon

Facebook http://www.facebook.com/Moongeargames/

Our Website http://moongeargames.com/

We'll work with Superior POD to either locate your package or supply a replacement. As far as address changes, we ask that our backers keep us informed with accurate addresses so packages are not sent to the wrong location.
 

      

If your unable to contribute, you can still help us in a big way. Get the word out! Tell your friends. Your family. Share our campaign across social media and please provide us your thoughts and feedback.
Twitter http://twitter.com/gear_moon
Facebook http://www.facebook.com/Moongeargames/
Our Website http://moongeargames.com/

story:
Who We Are

We are the creators of simulation games for corporations (octigo.net). Our typical games teach how to cooperate effectively in business. However, we noticed that sometimes this effort is futile. It is sometimes impossible to keep sanity in some organizations and nothing can improve this situation. 

So we came up with an idea of a game, which does not teach at all, but allows for a moment to relax and feel comfortable knowing that others are in a worse situation than ours. So we created the Weasel card game.

What Is The Weasel Game

The game usually lasts for 30-50 minutes and it can be played by 2, 3, or 4 players. To play with 3 or 4 players you need to have 2 sets of cards.

How to play. The Weasel Game has only a few rules:

  1. In the first stage, you place two randomly selected stakeholders cards on the table.
  2. Each round you and your opponent place an event card. They must match proper colors printed on the sides of each card.
  3. After 5 rounds the players calculate the amount of points collected by each stakeholder.
  4. Some cards have special abilities.
  5. After finishing 5 rounds the second stage begins, in which we follow the same steps as in the first stage.
  6. The game is over after completing 3 stages. Then all players count points of collected stakeholders.

Above you can see example of game play (two piles of card around two stakeholders).

Why We Launched The Campaign

We would like to collect funding to translate the game into English with the help of a professional translator, print an English version of the cards and boxes, and arrange online distribution along with some promotion.

The game is already prepared and tested as a prototype. We are currently developing hand made drawings for each card and edit fluff texts for them in Polish.

What You Get

We offer you early access to the game, in PDF file, as soon as it is translated and once it is printed in paper form. The Weasel Game will be distributed in hard boxes containing two decks of event cards (72 cards in total) and 14 cards of stakeholders.

Risks & Challenges

As any other project, obstacles can arise unexpectedly. Potential set-backs may include production delays, shipping and sourcing problems. To minimize possible risks or unexpected issues, we are spending months researching, designing and testing, prior to launching prototypes.

Current status of the project is as follows:

  • We prepared and tested the prototype of the game
  • We have 50% of subtitles for the cards already prepared 
  • We have about 60% of drawings ready
  • We have an offer of a printing company for printing cards
  • We have a couple of ideas regarding a box for card decks, we still need to pick the best one

In the next two months, we will finish the subtitles and artwork, and print the Polish version of the decks. Then we are going to test them, again. 

Please also note, that the final product colors and design may slightly vary from the renders shown in the project description.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you do not wish to back our project financially, you may be interested in spreading the word. Just visit our fan page on Facebook and like it: https://www.facebook.com/gralasica/?ref=bookmarks

story:
Story

Since ancient times the laws of the war were honored in woods. 
Here any wanderer, looking for military valor, will find a worthy enemy. Fierce beasts lurk in the wild places, sirens sing their deadly song in boiling lakes and alchemists read the forgotten spells, which open new portals to alien worlds, somewhere in cursed tableland. 
Are you ready to invade alien woods and come out the winner?

Alien wood 

  Is a dynamic PvP game with simple rules and diverse gameplays, where you have to fight with strange creatures and use the crushing spells. 
  Choose one of the sides: Wild, Magic or Science. 23 creatures and spell cards in each class allow you to creat a lot of game scenarios and get the maximum of joy.

Press

Board Game Stories http://boardgamestories.com/news/fantasy/enter-alien-wood/

DDO Players http://ddoplayers.com/2017/03/24/alien-wood-card-game-up-on-indiegogo/

Devetos Gaming http://devetosgaming.com/alien-wood-card-game-indiegogo/

 

 

 

 

 

 

 We hope people will like Alien wood. In our game we want to say that magic lives in every person. The success of this game will help us to release new interesting projects. In our plans to release a comic about a fantastic adventures, and more board games!

Follow us https://www.instagram.com/wizlygrizly/

Contact us wizlygrizly@gmail.com

story:
Welcome to our land! We need your help to escape from a rainy and boring village to a sunny and funny paradise island called Panama. We should warn you, our journey will not be an easy walk and here is why:

  • four different difficulty levels,  
  • important number cards and tricky special cards,  
  • many strategies to let us move and make our opponents stop,  
  • only one plane to Panama and five teams of hamsters who want to be the first,  
  • so much fun and emotion that you could become obsessed with this journey,  
  • journey length about 30-60 min.

P.S. Pinky promise – it’s going to be fun! ;)

Captain's welcome speech

 

 

Together we can improve our journey to Panama island. Improvements can be unlocked in two ways:

1. By liking our facebook page https://www.facebook.com/hamstersofpanama/

or

2. By gathering certain amount of money  

How to play or, shall we say, how to outsmart your opponents:  

  1.  Get two special cards.  
  2.  Take as many number cards as you think is enough.  
  3.  Use special cards wisely.  
  4.  Calculate results.  
  5.  Check if level conditions are met and move toward Panama.

Detailed rules will be left in the box, you can read them anytime. Check out this demo video to learn how to play:

 

You have seen the most important things of our campaign, we hope you like it. That's enough don't read further unless you are interested why the heck we have created this board game.

The Hamsters of Panama idea was born when we were looking for a new, original, funny, strategic and venturesome board game. Maybe we were looking in the wrong places or maybe we were not stubborn enough, because we couldn’t find anything that met our wishes. 

So we decided to create a board game that could be described as new, original, simple but not stupid, funny but not childish, strategic but not too complicated.

First of all, we had to find a way to meet those criteria, and it was not so easy… For a few months, every day we were brainstorming and sketching different board games with different playing mechanics and the final result came when we looked through our ideas and crystallized their pros and cons. We concluded that the game should allow you to interact with other players; it should not be based only on luck (for example, rolling dices, pulling cards and waiting for the highest one); it should allow you to use your brain and make strategies; it should be dynamic; it should have different difficulty levels, and so on. 

The second step was to make our concept attractive and meaningful. And that was nottttt so easy too… We looked for something cute, furry and funny and this is why we chose hamsters. Later we started the illustrating process which was very long because it is one thing to have something in mind but absolutely other to put it on paper. 

Finally — after almost a year — we are ready to introduce our first fresh board game for your judgment.

We have launched this project on crowdfunding platform because it's the fastest and most effective way for newbies like us to present what we have made and to put it into your hands. We have played this game many times and we think that we have achieved our objectives and have made a great game, but we need your help to spread the word. 

We have more ideas on how to continue the „Hamsters of panama“ story if we will succeed.

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

The publication of a board game is a complicated process. We are newbies and this is our first board game project. Despite all of this we are prepared, very seriously, to meet all of our obligations and to avoid mistakes. Here are the steps we have taken in order to reduce risks, the likelihood of mistakes and delays: 
1 - We have completed pre-production. This includes having all mechanisms and graphic art over 98% complete; the remaining 2% will be achieved after taking it to manufacturer. We have already met the manufacturer, discussed the production quote and preliminary agreement. We just need funding to ignite the green light for production. 
2 - We use international shipping when we have a large number of orders to ship in a short period of time. 
3 - We are fully committed to transparency and communication with our bakers community . We will be updating you on a regular basis, answering any questions and reading your thoughts in the comments . 
4 - We're not offering t-shirts or other complicated reward tiers because this would delay the distribution process. We're keeping it as simple as possible to deliver this game to you as soon as possible. We hope that you are interested and like our idea as much as we do. We strongly believe that this game could generate a lot of good emotions and bring us all to Panama for at least 45 minutes.

Good luck from all the team

and the Hamsters of Panama :)

story:
Better your tabletop gaming experience with this five Elements Dice set - Fire, Water, Wind, Lightning, and Earth! And they are with Glowing Resin!

Each pledge is essential. Each of you can make our dream bigger. Simply share our things on any web-based social networking to help spread. We welcome you to be part of our project and let's do it!

Fantasy Dice is a unique design dice that dedicates to tabletop game lovers, dice collectors and toy maniacs who love fantasy design. It brings your fantasy of Magic, Sword, and concept of Elements mage to reality. With just one roll away! And they are with Glowing Resin!

It is a standard 16 mm dice with chamfer corner which gives Fantasy Dice a bit more momentum when you roll it. Fantasy Dice is made by injected glowing resin with different colors of finishes to obtain the Magical and Elemental feeling. All the sizes of carving lines and points are precisely tested out with many versions to present in 2 dimensions as a graph and 3 dimensions as an object. And they are with Glowing Resin!

Shadow Black

There are 3 ways to maintain the power of 5 Elements, using the mysterious dark energy from another world is one of them. The force of dark energy is different from our world and it's so strong that can keep the natural force of Elements unable to breakthrough. But great power also comes with consequences...And they are with Glowing Resin!

 

White

The Ancient power of Sage is able to seal the power of elements into bones or ivory and allow a caster to summon stable and controllable Elements' force to handle life or battle. However, the academy charges very high for even one Element dice. And they are with Glowing Resin!

 

Iron

The North men are very good at dealing with steel and metal. They use a different way to train mages and control the power of Elements. With the strength of their Chroma Iron, they are able to maintain the force of elements inside for nearly a century. And they are with Glowing Resin!

 

And Add-ons!

About the Add-ons, just add the right number to your pledge and we will come back to you in the survey! Please help us unlock the 2 final goals!

  • Standard 16 mm dice
  • Chamfer corner
  • And they are with Glowing Resin!
  • Finishes with protective coating

Design Process

We've have created a 3D-print prototype in order to achieve maximum quality, we are improving the graphics on our dice, in order to achieve the highest quality of laser cutting and visible to the eye lines and experimenting with depth of laser cutting, from 1 mm to 0.1 mm.

We have tried to paint some of the 3d print dice ourselves, but it is very difficult to paint the center area as it has many mini craters. We are not very good at paint things ourselves, that's why some of the prototypes are sent to some reviewer with painting expertise! We will update you on that soon! And they are with Glowing Resin!

That is why we need your help on Indiegogo! The molding for casting is really expensive due to the design complexity. And Fantasy Dice requires secondary processing in addition to the resin casting which is much higher than other products.  And they are with Glowing Resin!

Right now the final design is knocked down, manufacture for the dice are ready, all we need is your pledge! And they are with Glowing Resin!

Timeline

May 2017 - Come up with the idea

Oct 2017 - Stage 1 design with 2D graphic

Nov 2017 - 3D modeling, rendering, and video making

Dec 2017 - Start Funding on Kickstarter for 40 days

Jan 2018 - Molding and price deal of the final product

Mar 2018 - Finish production and start shipping

May 2018 - Get all your hands on Fantasy Dice!

About the Team

Lokson , Steve

We are a group of young people who love playing RPG and board games, sometimes even enjoy making creative and social related board games in Hong Kong!

We have a thought to make our own accessory for gaming cause we love fantasy game so much, sometimes greater than our love towards space or sci-fi games. We checked out online and there are not many Elemental dices that can attract our eyeballs, that's how Elemental Dices come out! And they are with Glowing Resin!

Risks and challenges

We can’t deny that there are risks backing a new company. We have worked hard to mitigate as many risks as possible. Most of the design has been done and 90% of the art has been finished.

As any ongoing projects, there is uncertainty in the process. For example, production delay is one of the major concerns. We have carefully considered the unknown in our planning, we honestly believe that we can deliver on time.

story:
Kavac's Bag of Fate:

Kavac's Bag of Fate is a small pouch with a leather strap that belonged to Kavac, the God of Trickery. He left his bag in the world of Ukodor for travelers to find it. When you look inside the bag you see nothing. From the outside, it appears to be a small Bag of Holding. If you reach into the pouch, you feel a deck of cards. The deck holds 20 tarot cards, once a card is drawn, the card reappears in the deck, making it possible to draw the same card twice. Once a creature picks up this magical item, they are bound to it. If you try to get rid of the pouch, it will reappear on your side. Only The Plague or The Wish card may remove the deck, but it must be given to someone else.

While holding the deck, you may pull 1 card every dawn. If you hesitate to draw a card, you must succeed an Int DC 15 save or you pick a card anyway. If another person attempts to pull the deck away from you, they too must succeed the same save or pick a card. Otherwise, as soon as you draw a card from the deck, its magic takes effect. The owner of the deck may willingly offer another player to pull a card from the deck.

Story:

This item was created to use in the Realms of Ukodor D&D 5e stream on Mixer. The overwhelming feedback we received is why this item is now available to the public. There are many magical items out there that could make or break your home game. The purpose of this deck is to add story elements to your game without totally breaking the campaign or story. Much like everything else in 5e elements of this magical item can be tailored to fit your house rules. We hope you enjoy.

Witness the Lightbringers of the Realms of Ukodor campaign as one of the players, Cerise pulls a card from the deck. See the chaos first hand in the clip below. This was on Chapter 72, and the players are currently level 16. You can catch them live every Wed @6:30pm PT on: https://mixer.com/Fabled42

 

 

Artwork:

The amazing artwork was done by the very talented DireQuest and can check out his other work here: https://www.instagram.com/direquest/

Inside the deck:

I don't want to share too much of this deck but here is the backside to the Favor card to show you what the style looks like.

story:
SUMMARY

Fun for adults and kids alike! JAFO is a card-based game, where things are changing faster than you can anticipate even as an adult. JAFO is great for all ages and will keep your family entertained for hours. Is the perfect way for children to learn about objects, categories and the relation between them. Speed and focus are of paramount importance. 

Constantly adapt your strategy and be the first one who finish his cards to win the game.

 

What is JAFO?

JAFO is a tabletop game which includes 132 different cards, divided in 4 big categories: JOB, ANIMAL, FRUIT, OBJECT. Every card is represented by a word, written in the upper part and a category, written at the bottom. The word belongs to one of the four categories.

So when a player puts down a card representing a category (ex. ANIMAL), the next player has to play a card which has written in the upper part an animal (ex. “elephant”, “lion”, “dog”, “cat” etc.)

Once the Indiegogo campaign is funded, one of the goals will be to create some other packs that will bring more fun, because I already have many ideas about how developing and improving the original version of JAFO.

 

TYPE OF CARDS

NORMAL CARDS = card that can only be placed over the category it represents (example: “mechanic” can be placed over any card that has the “JOB” category at the bottom half).

SPECIAL CARDS 

CHANGE = card that has the 4 colors of the game in the middle and can be placed over any other card as long as it is your turn to put a card down.

  • If this card belongs to the category which is already down, then you can choose the category you want to play forwards. If not, the game will continue with the category shown at the bottom of your “CHANGE” card.

STAY = card that has the word “STAY” in the middle and can only be placed over the category it represents.

  • This card makes the next players stay a turn, unless it holds a STAY card that matches the category shown on the first STAY card.

+/++ = to pick up maximum 2 cards from deck, under one of the following conditions

  • If the player has a single +/++ card in his hand, he must show it and pick up just a new card from the deck. The +/++ card remain shown, so the rest of the players can see it, until next turn.
  • If the player has 2 +/++ cards in his hand, he must just show them and pick no new cards from the deck. The +/++ cards stay shown as well until next turn.

SUPREME CARDS = card that can be placed over other cards under different conditions, even if it is not your turn. The conditions are the follows:

MONEY = can be placed over any card representing a JOB

VETERINARIAN = can be placed over any card representing an ANIMAL

CHIMPANZEE = can be placed over any card representing a FRUIT

PASSION FRUIT = can be placed over any card representing an OBJECT

story:
Notice: You can visit this page after the campaign ends: https://luddum.com/sick-pirate-mutiny/


WHY I Launch This Project?

Hello everyone,

We're Minh Tran (Alex, a 30+ Tabletop Games Lover/Maker, a Digital Marketer, also a Father of a 6-month daughter) and Quan Nguyen (Kzan, a 26+ Rapper & talented Graphic Designer). We both started playing board games (chess, monopoly, magic cards, ...) quite soon since we were just children and over time, we have built up our big love on them. 

Among board games I've ever played, I'm extremely into party card games (particularly Social Deduction genre: Werewolf, Avalon, Coup, ...) due to the strong connection & interaction among players during the game. However, to be honest, I cannot find anything really crazy and fun enough for my parties & family events.

So one day in 2018, when preparing for the summer trip with my friends, an idea suddenly flashed through my mind, "why not create a completely new party game myself, something can bring us lots of joyful moments during the holiday?"

That's how Sick Pirate Mutiny project was brewing at early stage ... 

 

Why This Game Is Extremely FUN And UNIQUE?

  • You must use both your BRAIN (memory & guessing ability) and BODY (physical endurance) – it’s quite a CRAZY CHALLENGE!

  • You & your friends will drink a lot (you can agree on WATER or ALCOHOL, it’s up to you), but are not allowed to go to the restroom!

  • Eliminated players can still actively participate in the game.

 

Testimonials (What Others Say About This Game?)

  • Jay Austin - from United Kingdom: "What I love about it is it's a very interactive game and that it's a nice quick filler party game. We laughed loads and I think most would play again in the future"

  • Daniel Yocom - from Utah, United State: "We enjoyed your game! What people liked the most is the team play and the ability for even eliminated players to still be involved. There was much laughter while we played and I can say Sick Pirate Mutiny would have a better chance of being played than the Werewolf games"

==> Full review article: http://www.everythingboardgames.com/2019/08/sick-pirate-mutiny-kickstarter-preview.html

  • Jean-Michel MacLeod (Inod) - from France: "En associant le jeu de défis, avec celui de déduction teinté de pièges, et en secouant le tout par une approche coopération, Sick Pirate Mutiny s’avère très original. On donne de sa personne, tout en réfléchissant et riant énormément."

==> Full review article (in French): https://geektest.fr/test-jeu-de-cartes-sick-pirate-mutiny 

The Game Story (That May INSPIRE You)

Those who love thrilling stories about pirates during the 17th century, known as the Golden Age of Piracy, have probably heard of Blackbeard, an aggressive pirate ship frightening all merchants. But a few lucky sailors have been told Blackbeard’s biggest secret. It’s about a scary curse put on all Blackbeard’s crew, so they must forever suffer a defect in their bodies as punishment for their theft of Forbidden Treasures.

The only way to break the curse is for all crews to mutiny against Captain Sebastian Clark and his henchmen, then return all stolen treasures to beg for Blackbeard’s forgiveness…


Photo Gallery

Character Deck:

Command Deck: 

Reward Deck:

Punish Deck:

 

How To Play (Very Simple - Just Take 3 Minutes For Anyone To Learn)

  • There are 2 teams. Each team is given 1 Color Map.

 

  • There are 4 decks on the table: the Character, Command, Reward and Punish decks.

  • To start the game, each player draws 1 Character Card.

"The goal is to correctly guess every opponents’ Pirate Card. The team that first finishes this goal wins the game."

  • Each turn, you must draw 1 Command Card and decide if you DO or DO NOT complete it.
    • DO: Perform the listed action successfully and win a Reward Card. If you fail the action, draw Punish Card.
    • DO NOT: Return the Command Card to the bottom of the deck and draw a Punish Card. The more Punish cards you collect, the more you’ll reveal your hidden Character to others. Remember that some pirates can’t complete certain Commands

 

Why This Project Is Important To Us and You?

  1. Young generation today can spend the whole day on their hi-tech devices (smart phones, PCs, play stations, ...) but hardly pay few minutes to interact with others in person. The same thing happens to our beloved people (our friends, younger brothers & nephews). Meanwhile, board games are, honestly, kinda something too "traditional" or "complicated" for young people to participate. 

    So "why there isn't a Board Game BRAND for youngsters", we wondered, "... which can help them adapt to this healthier form of entertainment, reduce the time spent on technology, and thus have more chance (and time) to build social connections?" - That's also the LUDDUM STUDIO's mission ... and we wish to take the very first step by launching this game project: Sick Pirate Mutiny!
     
  2. If you're looking for a brand new form of entertainment for your parties & family events with certain hope that it should bring lots of joys & crazy moments to all participants (just like me 1 year ago), you should definitely consider this great game!

 

What You Will Get? (Our Stretch Goals)

  • Reach $2,700: "Bronze Version"

A Standard Edition (54 cards with UV-coating) includes:

1 x Character Deck (12 cards)
1 x Command Deck (12 cards)
1 x Reward Deck (14 cards)
1 x Punish Deck (14 cards)
2 x Color Map cards
1 x Rule book

  • Reach $5,300:  UNLOCK "Silver Version"

A "Silver Version" (72 cards with UV-coating | 18 cards extra) includes:

1 x Character Deck (12 cards)
1 x Command Deck (24 cards)
1 x Reward Deck (17 cards)
1 x Punish Deck (17 cards)
2 x Color Map cards
1 x Rule book

  • Reach $13,200:  UNLOCK "Gold Version"

A "Gold Version" (72 cards with UV-coating & Linen texture - your cards will look 10-times more elegant, beautiful and durable) includes:

1 x Character Deck (12 cards)
1 x Command Deck (24 cards)
1 x Reward Deck (17 cards)
1 x Punish Deck (17 cards)
2 x Color Map cards
1 x Rule book

story:
A President for Europe: The Boardgame.

Europe. The near future. All across the continent Europeans go to the polls to elect the first European president.

Six party leaders battle it out to either become president or have enough power after the election to begin to plot to topple the president and replace them.

Campaigning across Europe from newly independent Scotland to Cyprus, as a party leader you'll be constantly doing deals or backstabbing other party leaders to either get to the top or at least be on the winning side.

Then, post-election, there's a continent to be run, scandals to be confronted, a majority in the European Council to be maintained, and always with the next election looming on the horizon.

In the shadows is the Russia First! party, pursuing a different agenda from every one else. They don't care who becomes president, as long as they surrender to You-Know-Who in the Kremlin.

This is a game about politics and elections, but more importantly it's about haggling and doing deals. You don't have to know who Guy Verhofstadt is to play, although you'll get some of the jokes better if you do.

For €60, assuming we reach our target of €6000, you'll get the full boardgame, which includes:

The full-colour board of the political battlefield.

Rules.

Counters to track party seats

Vote cards outlining the many disparate groups who make up the European electorate (Including David Hasselhoff fans and people who think Jessica Fletcher is a serial killer) 

Presidential cards outlining the many dubious powers the president can use to remain in power.

Event cards that can help, hinder or just cause chaos, including a sex scandal involving the collected works of Jeffrey Archer and a bag of toffees.

Directive cards that the European Council can pass to help your allies and hinder your enemies. Unless they're the same people, which is quite possible. This is politics after all.

Member State cards showing which EU member states you hold in the European Council. 

A President for Europe was created by Jason O'Mahony, who lives in Ireland, has been involved in various European election and referendum campaigns, and writes about politics for various newspapers. 

The objective of the fundraiser is to raise €6000 to fund the publishing of 100 sets of the game. If the target is not reached the money pledged towards game sets will be returned to the contributors.

A President for Europe would be a great gift for that political junkie in your life. 

Caution: contains adult content. In an age of Trump, there is sadly adult content even in satirical boardgames. Don't blame us, we would have voted for Hillary.

story:
Short Summary

If you enjoyed playing the board game of Monopoly, you will love playing the fast-dealing, fast-paced Travel Board Game of VACATION SPIN.  

I'm Betty Deitch, Inventor of 2 U.S. Patented board games.  Vacation Spin, travel to 8 exotic destinations, with varying prices simulating real variables of travel.  Award winning Wall Street Spin game with varying prices, simulating ups and downs of the stock market.  My games have no dice, and spinner rotating around game board offers varying prices.  This is what is Unique!

My Passion is to travel.  My Dream is to make my Unique and Novel game become reality.  So as many people as possible can have fun playing this game of strategy with family and friends.  To encourage people to travel, or travel from home. You will be Spearheading this effort!

What We Need and What I will do next
Goal of $22,000 to manufacture 500 Unique and Novel games.  So you can have your Limited First edition!

When I reach my goal, I will have a new launch of my sold out Wall Street Spin Board game, which plays very differently.

The Impact

You would help bring my game come to Life!  I have worked long and hard on this.  Obtaining a U.S. Patent took a long time and was very expensive. Even Monopoly TM doesn't have a Patent.

Testimonial:  "Vacation Spin was a pleasure to play with friends. I loved that it gave me the feeling of going to different places in the world through my imagination.  I would choose to play this game again over Monopoly!" Rebecca K. on FunSpin.com

Testimonial: "I liked that the game provided competition and entertainment at the same time.  I think this game can also help bridge the generation gap."  Ron D.

Risks & Challenges

I have a manufactured prototype of Vacation Spin board game, so this is ready to be manufactured by an expert company in China.  They specialize in board games.  Takes about 45 days to manufacture, because this is their busy season.

I've previously manufactured and sold 3,000 Wall Street Spin board games.

Only challenge is the freight forwarding costs from China to U.S., which are Increasing.  I do have monies to take care of this, if costs exceed my fundraising. Takes about 60 days to ship here.  I've allowed for extra time, so these should be delivered as Holiday gifts to you and friends!

Other Ways You Can Help

  • You can help a lot to share my campaign by emailing friends and post on social media. Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Hey, we're Tim and Darby and this is SideHustle: The Party Game for Entrepreneurs. We’ll teach you how to play in a second but first, let me tell you a story about how a couple of friends had a crazy idea and decided to go for it... 

"What if this could be a game that anyone could play?”

We wanted to build a game to play with my friends that didn't take up the entire night, get stale after just a couple of rounds, and was actually a productive use of our time.

After months of play-testing rules and game mechanics with over 60 entrepreneurs here in Austin, TX, we launched on Kickstarter and are currently in the final stages of prototyping the game.

We are continuing our crowdfunding effort by making the SideHustle available for pre-order on Indiegogo InDemand to raise funds for a larger order quantity due to the unprecedented events caused by COVID-19.

SideHustle: The Party Game for Entrepreneurs

We created SideHustle because we wanted an engaging way to bring the fun of entrepreneurship to our friends, family, and co-workers.

You’ll discover it's not just about playing the game. It’s who you become in the process.

So, here’s how it works...

Shipping

We're happy to announce that SideHustle will soon be available to ship almost anywhere in the world!

Here are estimates of shipping costs based on regions.

Unites States: $10 - $15

Canada, United Kingdom: $15 - $20

Australia: $25 - $30

Sweden, Netherlands, Belgium, Germany, France, Denmark: $15 - $25

Spain: $20 - $25

Italy: $25 - $30

Risks & Challenges

Manufacturing a high-quality game like this is a big undertaking that involves a lot of scheduling, prep time and extremely high attention to detail. We're be working with industry-leading manufacturers to ensure all parts are arranged properly, from getting the right premium paper for the cards to the timer and die to the packaging materials. Our challenge includes ensuring each and every SideHustle game is finished to the quality of workmanship we are promising to backers and delivered to your door in the time we specified. Once the games are manufactured, we will have them delivered to our warehouse in the United States where we will ship them to our backers across the world.

Your Support Means Everything

Can't contribute but still want to help? Spread the word about SideHustle to your friends and family on social. The Indiegogo share tools make this easy :-)

We're be working with industry-leading manufacturers to ensure all parts are arranged properly, from getting the right premium paper for the cards to the timer and die to the packaging materials. Our challenge includes ensuring each and every SideHustle game is finished to the quality of workmanship we are promising to backers and delivered to your door in the time we specified. Once the games are manufactured, we will have them delivered to our warehouse in the United States where we will ship them to our backers across the world.Your Support Means Everything
Can't contribute but still want to help? Spread the word about SideHustle to your friends and family on social. The Indiegogo share tools make this easy :-)

story:
Introduction

You are with your loved ones on a sailboat spending a beautiful summer day. Suddenly you notice dark clouds approaching, and soon you are already in the middle of a stormy sea! Your only hope is to work together to maintain control of your boat.

Fools at Sea is a card game that aims to solve problems on the boat before time runs out. Players act as a team towards a common goal, so the game is either won or lost together. Players have to swap tool cards to solve problems while reacting to different situations, so sound and laughter cannot be avoided!
 

How it works

At the beginning of the game a draw pile is created, containing trouble cards, surprise cards and six win cards. The pile is divided evenly among the players and placed face down on the table. All players also receive equipment cards, which they keep in their hands.

A timer is set at five minutes and all players draws the first card from the draw pile. All players play at the same time. Trouble cards represent problems with your boat’s gear, the weather or your crew. When drawing a trouble card, you need 1-3 equipment cards to solve the problem. You of course don’t have all the tools in your hand, so you will have to pass the equipment around to the right person. After solving the problem, the trouble card is moved to the discard pile and the player may take the equipment cards back into their hand.

As in real life, surprises are to be expected and interrupt the flow of the game through unexpected chores. These are represented by the surprise cards. Win cards are also mixed through the draw piles. Six win cards form a beautiful picture and ends the game.

Swapping cards requires hectic communication and will test your and your friends collaboration skills. Consideration for other players and good communication skills are required to play this game.
 

The Rewards

24 equipment cards

45 trouble cards

15 surprise cards

6 win cards

15 scenario cards

1 captain card

All packed up in a beautiful box with playful design.

 

The Origin Story

Fools at Sea was created by a group of entrepreneurial friends of the Junior Chamber International Airisto. When sailing through the unpredictable waters of the Finnish archipelago they realized: this would make an awesome game!

Beside fun and games, the Junior Chamber of Commerce aims to have a concrete impact on society. Through different projects it brings together the right people to solve problems and raise awareness. Examples of earlier projects include ‘Passion for the Baltic Sea’ to raise awareness of the dire situation of the sea’s water quality and the ‘Christmas tree collection’, collecting Christmas gifts for underprivileged kids. All activities are organized on a non-profit basis and on a voluntary basis.

JCI Airisto is active in a region spanning far around the city of Turku and into the Finnish archipelago. The archipelago is what makes this region unique, as it comprises 20,000 islands as well as a national park. This makes it the world’s most island-rich archipelago!
 

Why Indiegogo, though?

As a non-profit organization involved in a wide range of societal issues, but not in the game industry, we missed the access to the right people. But we do know a lot of people who know people who know people. Some of them boating enthusiasts, others game enthusiasts. This makes Indiegogo an excellent opportunity to reach you who loves fun.

We are proud to bring such a fun game to the masses and now also to English-speaking board game enthusiasts!

Risks and challenges

The production pipeline is ready, we are ready to plug it in and turn it on. The prototype is ready and put to the test among friends and family. In the process, we have gotten some suggestions for improvements which we will implement before shipping them out to our dear backers.

The aim is to sell 3000 pieces of the game across the world. However, we guarantee to ship at already 1000 pieces. And you know, the average person knows about 600 people. Our Junior Chamber has 60 members, and as we all sell a few copies to our closest friends, plus buy a few as gifts, your copy will be shipped, guaranteed!

story:
Watch our video above to see the latest prototype of Post Like POTUS: Hair Force One Edition. You'll see the unboxing, the words and names on each die, and some of the outrageous tweets the dice can make!

 

Overview

We know words. We have the best words. Now you can have them too!

We've collected our new POTUS' best words , all of them the actual words that he's infamous for saying multiple times in multiple contexts. We're now turning the control of those words over to you, so you can create your own outrageous tweets and Post Like™ the Orange Twit™ Bird himself! Turn the Orange Twit Bird's words against him and his team, or you can use the blank stickers to write in the name of your own friends or enemies!

Play is simple and fun: Roll the dice to create your own almost-like-the-real-thing social media updates, and Post Like POTUS by posting the text and/or a picture of your dice roll to Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, etc. with the hashtag #PostLikePOTUS. You'll be able to search for that hashtag to see the posts created by others too!

For even more fun, get your friends together and Match the Name! Remove the orange name die, and one player rolls all the other dice. She then reads aloud the post, substituting "blank" where the name would be, e.g. "Overrated blank is a weak, worthless clown. Total disaster!" All players then secretly write down the friend/enemy/co-worker/politician/etc. who best fits in the blank. The dice roller shows her answer and restates the post, filling in the blank with her answer. The other players each show their own answers in turn, also filling in the blank, and the dice roller wins one point for every answer that matches theirs! Play continues clockwise, so each person gets to roll and win points, and the high score wins! For more fun, try removing the blue noun/insult die instead! 

(Suggested by a backer, not by us: If everyone in the game is of legal drinking age and not driving or parenting or operating heavy machinery or operating on humans/animals, then you could each pick your favorite word on the dice -- and every time your word is rolled, yell it out and take a drink! "Putin!!!!!!!!" [Always drink responsibly, folks, and absolutely never drink and drive!])

Post Like POTUS is a parody for entertainment purposes. We hope that's obvious, but we wanted to say it explicitly, in case there's any question about that. We're honestly, genuinely trying our best not to use any names as part of our branding that would get us in trouble legally. We and our playtesters think this little game is a riot, and we just want everyone on both sides of the aisle to have a small bit of fun in this political climate.

Post Like POTUS is being published by Pickle Hopped Games. We are the indie game company behind the successfully-Kickstarted Dolly's Bookworm™ game that encourages children to love reading books, now available at Amazon. We've also published the patented card game that simulates the stock market, Market Maker®, used to train interns at a major financial services company.

We've got experience designing, building, and publishing games - and in running successful crowdfunding campaigns that deliver what we promise to our supporters.

As you can see in our video, we've got the prototype done. We have determined the exact words and names to use and the number of blanks to include, and we've got all the component size and art details sorted out. We've got two confirmed quotes for printing from game printers that have a track record of successful delivery. Note that these games are being printed in China - just like POTUS' brand of shirts and eyeglasses as well as his hotels' pens, shampoo, body wash, moisturizers, shower caps, laundry bags, show bags, pet collars, pet leashes and bath towels! (fact check)

 

Our Campaign

We aren't in this to make a lot of money. We're in this to put smiles on the faces of people who are finding little to smile about in these dynamic times. Whether Democrat, Republican, Independent, or third-party, many of us agree that laughter can be empowering, therapeutic, and well, maybe able to bring us together even for a short while.

Join us! Be a supporter by backing one of our perks and be the first to play Post Like POTUS: Hair Force One Edition! Who knows? If we're successful, maybe we'll be able to follow up later with Post Like Carlos Danger: Sexting Edition!

To help get the ball rolling, we're offering an essentially zero-profit game perk for the first backers of our campaign. Our MSRP (manufacturer's suggested retail pricing) will be $29.95, and we're offering the regular game perks at more than 20% discount, just $24 including US shipping!

​As well, since play testers have really loved our Orange Twit Bird character, we've put him on exclusive t-shirts for this Indiegogo campaign. These are pretty funny, but they won't help us reach our goal of getting the game printed, so we're only offering them as add-on perks. Get them while you can!

!

 

The Impact

We want this campaign to have a bigger impact than just fun, though. These are serious times, so we want Post Like POTUS to make a difference, too. If we make our $5000 campaign goal, we will donate $1.00 for every backed game perk to your choice of charity!

One option is the ACLU Foundation, the four-star-rated charity of the American Civil Liberties Union (@ACLU), who "spearhead innovative and groundbreaking civil liberties litigation and public education" and "protect and defend the rights of millions of people across the nation." Help us help others!

Another option is RAINN (@RAINN01), "the nation's largest anti-sexual violence organization", rated three stars by Charity Navigator. The Rape, Abuse & Incest National Network "operates the National Sexual Assault Hotline at 1.800.656.HOPE and rainn.org and publicizes the hotlines' free, confidential services; educates the public about sexual assault; and leads national efforts to prevent sexual assault..."

The third option is the four-star rated National Resource Defense Council (@NRDC). From their mission statement: "We strive to protect nature in ways that advance the long-term welfare of present and future generations. We work to foster the fundamental right of all people to have a voice in decisions that affect their environment." 

 

Risks & Challenges

To be successful, we need to raise enough to print at least 500 copies of this game. The large dice are the biggest expense at about $0.75 each or ~$4.25 for the six. Add in the box, instruction manual, stickers, printing/boxing costs, shipping across the Pacific Ocean to an Amazon warehouse for fulfillment, then picking/packing/shipping to you, and the charges add up.

Our biggest risks are in the timeline. Printing games can take up to 3 months, and in our last campaign, our games were held up by the 2015 West Coast port closures. Hopefully those issues won't affect us this time, but please forgive us if they do.

The t-shirts will be printed by CafePress, which has a multi-year history of delivering custom-printed products quickly and with high quality. We've successfully used them ourselves for our popular Scientific Methodists line of merchandise that celebrates science, scientists, and the scientific method.

In short, with our prototype in hand and the artwork 80% completed, if we make our funding goal, we're 100% confident we'll be able to fulfill all the perks!

 

What Happens If We Don't Make Our Goal?

If you all have backed our perks, but we just barely miss our goal amount, we'll do our best to cover the difference ourselves, bring Post Like POTUS to life anyway, and fulfill your perks. If for whatever reason, we aren't even close to our goal, then we'll gladly/sadly refund your perk money (minus any fees we incurred). Hopefully this won't be a problem, and instead we'll be printing and fulfilling thousands of games for all of you!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone has the resources to back our Post Like POTUS campaign. If you're in that camp, but you like what we're doing, you can still help us a lot!  

  • Get the word out on social media and make some noise about our campaign! We'll be successful when people share our campaign far and wide with others who like our game and back us. Please share our Indiegogo link or the short version http://PostLikePOTUS.com. When you share with others, use the hashtag #PostLikePOTUS and at-mention our new accounts, @PostLikeGame on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram!
  • To make this easy, you can use the sharing icons at the top of this page, next to the BACK IT button!
  • Also, consider supporting us today with just $1. Although this will only be a small help toward our goal, this will let you stay connected to our backer-only information and updates on our campaign. Hopefully you'll come back later and be able to support a perk before the campaign ends!

 

If You've Read This Far...

If you've read this far, we know you're going to love rolling the dice and playing Post Like POTUS: Hair Force One Edition! Choose your favorite perk and back us now! Hopefully together we'll give hundreds - maybe thousands??!?! - to charity, too. Thank you!!

 

(Copyright 2017. Post Like, Post Like POTUS, Hair Force One Edition, Orange Twit, the orange twit bird, Pickle Hopped, the hopping pickle logo, Dolly's Bookworm, Market Maker, and Scientific Methodists are all trademarks or registered trademarks of Pickle Hopped LLC. All rights reserved.)

story:
Get Organized is a fun, easy-to-learn, card/dice game, created by the co-inventor of Trongs - the finger-food utensil
(as seen on shows like Shark Tank and winner on Invention USA). 

About the game GET ORGANIZED:
     - 2 to 5 players
     - About 10-30 minutes per game
     - Easy/quick setup and cleanup 
     - Packs small for travel
     - Fun for the whole family... well, maybe not for the kids ;)

VIDEO TUTORIAL OF THE GAME

What's in the box?
     - Over 80 poker-sized cards on heavy stock with an air-cushioned finish.
     - Bullets (Wooden nickels with bullets on them)
     - Play Money ($100 poker chips) 
     - 5 six-sided (D6) dice
     - Game Instructions

Quick summary of game play:
Each player begins with one of each "Industry Card" in play, which has a point value. 


 

Players want to collect additional Industry Cards before their opponents so they can take over the industries, gain more points and win the game.


Each turn starts with the player collecting money and then choosing whether to save their money or purchase bullets and/or Industry Cards.  Then they may attack other players in an effort to take over more industries.  When a player takes over an industry, they get the benefits of owning it. 

For example, the owner of the "Money Laundering" industry earns money every time another player collects (because they must launder the money).  

Each time control of an industry changes hands, the new owner gets to pull a "Good Earner" card, which can played immediately, or saved to be used at any other time.

Here are just a few examples of Good Earner cards:


Ultimately, the goal is to have over 100 points at the end of a round. Player position is an important part of the strategy, because the person who goes first in a round becomes a target if they get to 100+ points. 

The player with the most Industry Cards in play at the end of each round is the "Rat."  They go first in the next round... which is usually a bad thing.  

Winning this game requires a balance of cash-flow management, attacking at the right time, and keeping count of other player's Industry Cards in play to avoid becoming the rat. 


Expansion Pack Included:
The game comes with an expansion pack to be added after basic game-play has been mastered.  The expansion includes character cards that give each player special skills and rat cards to be pulled by the rat at the end of each round.

Here is an example of  a Rat Card:

Want to learn more?  Here is the full instruction manual:
INSTRUCTION MANUAL DOWNLOAD

Hey, why not print a copy and try the game out?
FREE PRINTABLE VERSION  - (You'll want to use card stock to print the cards) 

 

Now I'm gonna make you an offer you can't refuse. 
HELP FUND THIS CAMPAIGN... OR ELSE!  :)
story_txt: Get Organized is a fun, easy-to-learn, card/dice game, created by the co-inventor of Trongs - the finger-food utensil(as seen on shows like Shark Tank and winner on Invention USA). About the game GET ORGANIZED:     - 2 to 5 players     - About 10-30 minutes per game     - Easy/quick setup and cleanup      - Packs small for travel     - Fun for the whole family... well, maybe not for the kids ;)VIDEO TUTORIAL OF THE GAMEWhat's in the box?     - Over 80 poker-sized cards on heavy stock with an air-cushioned finish.     - Bullets (Wooden nickels with bullets on them)     - Play Money ($100 poker chips)      - 5 six-sided (D6) dice     - Game InstructionsQuick summary of game play:Each player begins with one of each "Industry Card" in play, which has a point value.  Players want to collect additional Industry Cards before their opponents so they can take over the industries, gain more points and win the game.Each turn starts with the player collecting money and then choosing whether to save their money or purchase bullets and/or Industry Cards.  Then they may attack other players in an effort to take over more industries.  When a player takes over an industry, they get the benefits of owning it. For example, the owner of the "Money Laundering" industry earns money every time another player collects (because they must launder the money).  Each time control of an industry changes hands, the new owner gets to pull a "Good Earner" card, which can played immediately, or saved to be used at any other time.Here are just a few examples of Good Earner cards:Ultimately, the goal is to have over 100 points at the end of a round. Player position is an important part of the strategy, because the person who goes first in a round becomes a target if they get to 100+ points. The player with the most Industry Cards in play at the end of each round is the "Rat."  They go first in the next round... which is usually a bad thing.  Winning this game requires a balance of cash-flow management, attacking at the right time, and keeping count of other player's Industry Cards in play to avoid becoming the rat. Expansion Pack Included:The game comes with an expansion pack to be added after basic game-play has been mastered.  The expansion includes character cards that give each player special skills and rat cards to be pulled by the rat at the end of each round.Here is an example of  a Rat Card:Want to learn more?  Here is the full instruction manual:INSTRUCTION MANUAL DOWNLOADHey, why not print a copy and try the game out?FREE PRINTABLE VERSION  - (You'll want to use card stock to print the cards)  Now I'm gonna make you an offer you can't refuse. HELP FUND THIS CAMPAIGN... OR ELSE!  :)

story:
SHORT SUMMARY


• About the creator of the game:

My name is Anatoly Sloyko and I'm the developer of this game. I live in Kiev, Ukraine. I studied philosophy at the Kiev-Mohyla Academy. All my life I am an artist. I have done various installations and projects in various galleries and art-centers around the world. For example, in London at the Kinetic Art Fair, I exhibited the “Mahatmaplane” installation (another name “Balance”) - a four-winged flight simulator. Etc. Also I have a lot of experience as a creator and copywriter in various advertising agencies. Was engaged in the development of computer games as game designer.

Since my childhood I was admired by people who are able to bring something new into the world. Change the world. It is desirable, for the better. I, too, strive to be such a person. And I'm grateful to people who support cool ideas. Including mine.

 

 


• The Campaign:

We offer you a completely new type of board game. It can be as mass market as, for example, Alias, but at the same time it affects essentially deeper layers of human perception. The essence of the game in the competition for the best explanation of human qualities with the help of cards (405), a 12-gaming game cube and special modal cards (36), which allow to explain this or that quality from the position of God, chaos, evolution, superman, guru, fool, an alien, and so on. In the game, we actively use such topical concepts as "singularity", "neural network", "AI" etc. Disassembly of a human is a useful activity and a lot of fun. After all, living in the world of high technologies and creating an artificial mind, we, people, have not understood ourselves properly yet.


• Magnitude of what contributors will help us achieve:

In addition to the goal to deliver to you as users of this game the maximum emotions and intellectual pleasure from the analysis of contradictory human qualities, i.e. we have 2 missions:
• 1. Scientific research, through which it is possible to compile a "Map of Human Qualities" which are located in different segments, depending on the priority and vector of application. Here, each player can view himself as an element of the world neural network conducting this research.


• 2. AI educating.  Approximately realizing the dynamics of growth of AI capabilities, we see our mission in teaching neuro-networks moral and ethical categories on the example of analysis of both positive and negative human qualities. To the most powerful artificial mind clearly understood why watching a bloody action movie, people going out into the street quietly go about their business, and not imitate the heroes of such a film. We want to show to the AI true human personality ​​in all its multidimensionality.

  • Also this game is definitely useful for:

• Courses of acting,
• Psychological and psychoanalytic groups,
• Intellectual and philosophical clubs (circles)
• Language courses
• Education of adolescents
• Spiritual practices aimed at self-knowledge and transformation
• Intellectual development
• Courses of rhetoric
• Family leisure

If you want to make a contribution

  • What We Need & What You Get:

In order to release this game with a circulation of 1,000 copies, it is necessary to collect about 20,000 thousand dollars. Thus, each game will be in a beautiful and durable wooden box, with all the necessary attributes. Having established the production of the first game of the game - all copies of which will certainly go to our Bakers - we will be able to improve and reduce the cost of production, in order to make this game more popular and accessible in every country and every family.

  • Unique privilege for the first buckers of the Human Features game:
 
  • When you do $39 bucks you get ECO edition of the game in a paperboard box 300/36 card with 3 copies of game cube, made from special paper, which you have to fold up yourself (it is very easy), hourglass, and a standard game field + 10 of its copies on a thin paper to write down your scores. And you can determine language of your game from the available.

 

  • When you do $59 bucks you get CLASSIC edition of the game with a plastic cube in a paperboard box 405/36 card and a standard game field + 12 of its copies on a thin paper to write down your scores. And a hourglass. And, of course, you can determine language of your game too.

 

  • When you do $69 bucks you get PROFESSIONAL edition of the game with a plastic cube in a wooden box to keep you game more safety. 405/36 card and a standard game field + 16 of its copies on a thin paper to write down your scores. And a hourglass. And, of course, you can determine language of your game too.

 

  • When you do $89 bucks you get MASTER edition of the game with a glowing cube in a wooden box 405/36 card, and a standard game field + 18 copies on a thin paper to write down your scores. And a fluorescent hourglass. And, of course, you can determine language of your game too.

 

  • When you do $139 bucks you get HUMAN SOLE ENGINEER edition of the game with a glowing cube in a wooden box upper size 405/36 card, and and a Bigger size magnetic game field + 81 magnetic checkers + special stickers with suit and nominations for the cards. With the help of them you can build unique Map of The Human Qualities for each game you play.  + 20 copies on a thin paper to write down your scores, just in case you are too busy in a moment to build a map. And a magnet hourglass. Of course, you can determine language of your game too.

 

  • Please, look up for our updates. We've got some nice surprises - add-ons for you!

If the fundraising bar is not reached - then this game will be released anyway, just in a smaller number of copies.

  • The Impact

• For everyone who will support this game in the first place, it will benefit as a valuable tool for self-knowledge and self-improvement. As already said in the era of the development of artificial intelligence, people around the world would not be in a better position to know themselves: in all their glory and versatility of their qualities.

Perhaps this clever and fun game will give people more knowledge about themselves than tons of books on philosophy and psychology.


• We already have a ready-made prototype of the game and also positive feelings from its testing in different groups of people. (After which many people ask when it will be possible to play again?). And we are only at the beginning of this great experiment. Let's do it together!

 

  • Risks & Challenges

Perhaps the main obstacle is that this game is developed in Ukraine. What makes the delivery is relatively expensive. Whether this game was created in California, probably there would not be problems as such. But still in this, at first glance, the distance (at least from the US) there are pluses. For example, the availability of relatively cheap and skilled production. We will not order the details of the game in China. Maybe just a glowing cube and a magnetic hourglass). We will make efforts to produce these elements here in Ukraine. The advantage of our situation is the proximity of the European market with a large audience of intelligent and advanced consumers.

  • Other Ways You Can Help

This game, thanks to the illustrated cards with descriptions - is among other things also something like a book. Each of the 36 modal cards is devoted to one of the key concepts, essences or archetypes in the consciousness of modern man. Some of them seemed to be eternal. Some, such as "matrix" or "singularity" appeared relatively not long ago. This game is an excellent opportunity to replenish your thrift-box with actual memes and concepts. Therefore, we plan to create a few more special cards in the course of the company, which were stored in a post-pause order to indulge or irritate your imagination. We will be grateful to you for the repost of this project on IndiGoGo. Make some buzz about us, please!
